title: The New Boss
synopsis: Leslie Pool has just inherited the Greens & Grains after his father’s death and administers his peculiar brand of incompetence to a chaotic workplace, while trying to keep up with the town’s new big box megamarket, SuperValueMart.

title: The Miracle Worker
synopsis: Leslie Pool attempts to exploit a leak in the freezer that looks like Jesus to bring in more customers to the Greens & Grains. In the meantime, Carl begs Yolanda to let him spend more time with their son, Manuelito.

title: Health Insurance
synopsis: When the health insurance rates sky rocket, Leslie has to let one of his employees go in order to afford it for the rest of his staff. Not wanting to choose, he sets up a series of reality show-type challenges which ends up shocking everyone.

title: What Women Want
synopsis: Leslie  has trouble finding a date for the Elks Club dinner but then talks Ingrid into going with him which starts making Todd extremely jealous. Carl continues to beg Yolanda to allow him to spend time with Manuelito.

title: Bag It
synopsis: Leslie agrees to have Greens & Grains go head-to-head in a bagging competition with Super Value Mart, only to have half of his state championship team refuse to compete.

title: To Heir Is Human
synopsis: The anniversary of his father‘s death sends Leslie looking for an heir to whom he can leave the store.

title: First Time
synopsis: Ingrid decides to lose her virginity and looks to her co-workers to help with the task.

title: Dollar Day
synopsis: Leslie’s promotion to give away money in order to attract new customers inspires an armed robbery at Greens & Grains.

title: The Bromance
synopsis: When Todd proposes selling freshly slaughtered beef at the store, Leslie uses the new venture to cement their relationship as “best bros.”

title: Forever Young
synopsis: Discovering that Buck spent the night with his longtime crush, Amy Anderson, has left Leslie feeling old -- and he’s determined to do something about it.

title: Amy Strikes Back
synopsis: After Amy loses her job for having sex with her boss, Leslie hires her to work at Greens & Grains.

title: Illegal Alien
synopsis: When Ingrid’s participation a patriotic promotional calendar exposes the fact that she is an illegal alien, Amy sets out to have her deported.

title: The Ren Fair
synopsis: A Renaissance Days promotion that includes challenging Super Value Mart to a shopping cart joust threatens to put Greens & Grains out of business.

title: Turkey Bowling
synopsis: After losing the annual Grocers League Stickball game, Leslie learns that SuperValueMart’s new general manager, Mercedes P. Jones, has been brought in to do what her predecessor, Amy Anderson, could not – drive Greens & Grains out of business once and for all.

title: Sesquicentennial
synopsis: For Greens & Grains’ sesquicentennial celebration, Leslie dreams up a promotion that will take the store and its employees back 150 years to its founding by Jebediah Pool.

title: Star Trok
synopsis: Upon learning that Paramount Pictures has denied his request to host an official Star Trek convention at the store, Leslie decides to circumvent the studio’s decision by hosting a knock-off event for “Star Trok.”

title: Eye Can See Clearly...
synopsis: After much anticipation, Leslie reveals that he’s transformed the old Greens & Grains meat locker into an eye clinic run by former SuperValueMart employee-turned-ophthalmologist Don Bagley.

title: The Whistler
synopsis: After learning that the Greens & Grains charity car wash for the 4H Club fell far short of the amount SuperValueMart raised for the American Cancer Society – largely on the strength of Mercy’s connection to the Playboy magazine empire – Leslie begins having serious doubts about his own talents.

title: One Day At A Time
synopsis: After a security sting catches his mom, Mrs. Mednick, shoplifting a bottle of scotch from Greens & Grains, Richard tells Leslie to have her arrested in the hopes of teaching her a lesson about her drinking problem.

title: The Milkman
synopsis: After discovering that his customers are being forced to rummage through the dairy case in search of milk cartons that haven’t passed their expiration date, Leslie angrily confronts his milk deliveryman for answers.

title: Dances With Groceries
synopsis: While scanning the Greens & Grains parking lot with metal detectors looking for loose change, Carl and Leslie discover an arrowhead. After taking it to John Greene, a CPA and member of the Shawnee tribe, they learn that G&G is built on the remains of a Shawnee village.

title: The Handwriting On The Wall
synopsis: Mary, Rose and Pearl may be sent "up the river" after they go overboard defending "227" against a graffiti artist who then sues them for assault--and it seems even bleaker when the key to their defense is the testimony of a lone eyewitness--Sandra.

title: Fourth Time Around
synopsis: Mary and Rose help Pearl face the loneliness of old age by escorting her to a single's bar where she meets the man of her dreams--and promptly gets engaged.

title: Pillow Talk
synopsis: When Mary reluctantly agrees to partner with Sandra in the pillow-making business, she finds herself doing all the work--with Sandra reaping all the "benefits."

title: Mary Nightingale
synopsis: Lester turns into a real pain for Mary when he comes home from work early complaining of a stomach ache, but when she sneaks out for a pedicure, Lester is stricken with appendicitis--leaving Sandra to care for him.

title: The Great Man Hunt
synopsis: Alarmed that her biological clock is winding down, Sandra sets out to find a perfect husband to father her child, but when she strikes out with the available men, she decides to have a baby anyway--regardless of her marital status.

title: Got A Job
synopsis: Anxious to become an adult, Brenda (Regina King) takes on part-time work, but soon discovers learning how to juggle all her responsibilities is a full-time job.

title: Come Into My Parlor
synopsis: Brenda attempts to ensnare a boy's affection by inviting him to her Saturday night party, and following Sandra's sneaky suggestion, she tells him the party's on Friday night--but the scheme backfires when her parents go out for the evening, leaving her more alone than she planned.

title: The Wheel Of Misfortune
synopsis: Mary flies out to California to take a spin on the popular game show "Wheel of Fortune," but is shocked to discover a smug Sandra as her opponent--much to the dismay of hosts Pat Sajak and Vanna White.

title: Washington Affair
synopsis: Sandra's efforts to win the attention of a famous congressman (Robert Hooks) become muddled when Brenda's art teacher (Jayne Kennedy) catches his eye--yet in her pursuit she falls for another famous personality: Billy Dee Williams.

title: Temptations
synopsis: When Mary (Marla Gibbs) accepts the "glamorous" title of Chairwoman of the Church benefit variety show, she soon realizes it's really a dirty job and prays for a group like the "Temptations" to save the show.

title: Father’s Day
synopsis: A surprise visit by his Air Force dad prompts Calvin to bid farewell to the family in exchange for a new life abroad with his father.

title: Matchmakers
synopsis: In efforts to find Rose a permanent mate, Mary and Sandra resort to a video dating service that transforms Rose into a Tina Turner look-a-like which eventually leads to an embarrassing and hilarious outcome when she meets her match.

title: Check Snub
synopsis: When Pearl (Helen Martin) is refused her social security check because the computer lists her as deceased, Mary (Marla Gibbs), Rose (Alaina Reed) and Sandra (Jackée), join in the battle against bureaucracy, only to land themselves in jail.

title: Author, Author
synopsis: Sandra writes a steamy romance novel based on characters that are suspiciously similar to her friends at 227.

title: The Working Game
synopsis: Mary's new job with a travel agency takes her out-of-town on business with her boss, leaving a jealous Lester at home. Special guest appearance by Garrett Morris.

title: Rich Kid
synopsis: Mary takes a stand against the deadly drug, crack, when she discovers that a wealthy and generous new friend of Calvin and Brenda is selling the drug.

title: A Matter Of Choice
synopsis: Lester wins a major contracting bid, which enables the Jenkins' to begin looking for their dream home, when Lester discovers that the backers of the construction job are involved in South African investments.

title: Happy Twentieth
synopsis: Plans made by Mary (Marla Gibbs) and Lester (Hal Williams) to celebrate their 20th wedding anniversary result in disharmony when quarrelling in-laws come to town on.

title: Toyland
synopsis: Guest star Pee Wee Herman plays himself in this special episode in which he, Mary (Marla Gibbs), Lester (Hal Williams) and Sandra (Jackée) are held captive in a toy store and must resort to more than pop guns and bows and arrows to set themselves free.

title: Far From The Tree
synopsis: When Sandra (Jackée) cleans up her act and takes on a whole new identity for her visiting mother, special guest star Della Reese, she must split her personality to make another out-of-town guest, her "HUNK DU JOUR," happy as well.

title: A Good Citizen
synopsis: When Sandra (Jackée) alerts the police that she suspects her current love interest Justin (Sam Scarber) has stolen more than her heart, the detectives set up surveillance headquarters in the home of Mary (Marla Gibbs) and Lester (Hal Williams).

title: The Audit
synopsis: Guest stars Red Buttons and Ron Glass appear in this special episode of "227" which was taped 24 hours prior to airing. This almost-live topical episode, featuring Mary (Marla Gibbs) and Lester (Hal Williams) on their way to being audited by the IRS.

title: Archie The Gambler
synopsis: Archie comes home in a great mood bearing gifts of perfume for Gloria and bubble bath for Edith. However Edith becomes deeply disturbed to find out Archie won money while playing the horses after promising never to gamble again when his addiction got so bad that Edith threatened to leave him.

title: Henry’s Farewell
synopsis: Henry is moving away and Louise and Lionel are planning a going away party. Archie refuses to set foot in the Jefferson's home and George Jefferson refuses to have white people in his home. When the party is moved to the Bunker's, George makes an unexpected visit and finally meets the Bunkers.

title: We’re Having A Heat Wave
synopsis: A heat wave hits New York putting all of the Bunkers in bad moods and to salt the wound, the air conditioner breaks down. When the house next door is put up for sale, Archie puts together a petition to prevent more minorities from moving into the neighborhood.

title: We’re Still Having A Heat Wave
synopsis: Archie becomes annoyed with his new neighbors, Irene and Frank Lorenzo, whose constant singing filters into the Bunkers home prompting Archie to buy an air horn to combat the noise.

title: Edith Finds An Old Man
synopsis: While shopping at the supermarket Edith befriends a lonely old man, Mr. Quigley who ran away from the nursing home. Edith swiftly brings him home with her and Archie is less than thrilled to have a constant reminder of his own advancing years hanging around the house.

title: Archie And The Kiss
synopsis: While spending time at the Lorenzo's home, Gloria admires a statue replica of Rodin's 'The Kiss." Seeing the admiration in Gloria's eyes, Irene gives her the statue. However, when she brings it home, Archie is infuriated by it, citing that it's pornography.

title: Archie And The Computer
synopsis: A computer error leads Edith into collecting a small fortune in quarters sent to her in the mail by a prune company. When Archie discovers this, he immediately wants to keep the money and doesn't want Edith to say anything to the company.

title: The Games Bunkers Play
synopsis: Mike is all excited when the Lorenzos and Lionel are coming over after dinner for a game of 'Group Therapy.' Archie takes one look at some of the questions that are asked during a game and quickly rushes off for drinks at Kelsey's bar.

title: Edith’s Conversion
synopsis: Archie becomes concerned when Edith begins attending Irene Lorenzo's church. Edith also begins wearing a Catholic medallion and gets literature on how to be Catholic. Meanwhile  with the rising meat prices, Gloria brings home horse meat and makes it for dinner.

title: Archie In The Cellar
synopsis: Irene installs the new lock on the cellar door and Edith leaves for a baby shower leaving Archie home alone. Not having paid attention to Irene's instructions Archie locks himself in the basement. After finding a bottle of vodka, Archie spends a long night in a haze of a drunken stupor.

title: Black Is The Color Of My True Love's Wig
synopsis: Gloria buys a brunette wig and it immediately arouses Mike who desperately tries to get Gloria to wear it while they make love. However, Gloria is insulted which leads to a big fight that lands Mike to sleeping on the couch.

title: Second Honeymoon
synopsis: For her 25th wedding anniversary, Edith is planning a romantic second honeymoon getaway to Atlantic City, the same place they went on their first honeymoon. However  trying to keep it a secret and trying to get Archie to come along may be a challenge.

title: The Taxi Caper
synopsis: Archie's moonlighting driving cabs which puts him in harms way when a young man pulls a gun on him and demands his wallet. Down at the police station, Archie is eager to identify the suspect that is until a politician attempts to dissuade Archie by bribing him from pressing charges.

title: Archie Is Cursed
synopsis: Archie spouts off his ideas about women in sports and claims that men can play any sport better than women. Irene challenges Archie to a pool match where he is eager to prove his point that is until he discovers Irene has won pool tournaments.

title: Edith’s Christmas Story
synopsis: This Christmas season Archie purchases some fake nose and mustache glasses that were on sale but Mike also happened to go to that same store and hit that same sale. Meanwhile Edith returns from a doctor checkup and confides in Gloria the fact that she fears she may breast cancer.

title: Mike And Gloria Mix It Up
synopsis: Edith and Archie go out for the evening to a party that Edith's Cousin Amelia is having. When Gloria makes sexual advances on Mike, the two become embroiled in a huge argument in which Mike insists that the man is supposed to make the first move.

title: Archie Feels Left Out
synopsis: It's Archie's 50th birthday and Edith, Gloria, and Mike are planning a surprise party for him. Archie isn't so happy about celebrating his birthday when he insists that he's 49 but Mike confirms that he indeed is 50 years old according to his birth certificate.

title: Et Tu, Archie
synopsis: Archie is all excited when an old friend whom he used to work with, Joe Tucker stops by for a visit. When Archie discusovers that Joe has been attempting to land a job at Archie's work, Archie does what he can to sabotage Joe's efforts.

title: Gloria’s Boyfriend
synopsis: Gloria befriends George, who works at the local supermarket and happens to be mentally handicapped. When Archie discovers this, he encourages George to take a break at the Bunker's while he is still on the clock. George's father storms over to the Bunker's home with news that George has been fired.

title: Lionel’s Engagement
synopsis: Edith, Mike, and Gloria are extended a special invitation to attend Lionel's engagement party. However, Archie isn't invited. During the party, George is in for a big shock when it turns out that Lionel's fiancée, Jennie has interracial parents.

title: Archie Eats And Runs
synopsis: After enjoying a lushish dinner that Edith prepared, Mike arrives and breaks the news that the supermarket has isssued a recall on a certain brand of mushroom. Convinced that he has food poisoning  Archie rushes down to the hospital for treatment.

title: Gloria Sings The Blues
synopsis: In a total apathetic mood,Archie tries to find out what's wrong with Gloria until she snaps at him and storms off. Later, Edith gets to the bottom of Gloria's mood when she confides in Edith that she thinks that she has temporarily fallen out of love with Mike.

title: Mike’s Graduation
synopsis: Mike's graduation day is arrving and is a nervous wreck as he studies for his exams. Surprisingly, Archie acts nicely to Mike with hopes that after graduation, he will finally move out. However, Mike is offered a fellowship to get his masters degree thus living for one more year with the Bunkers.

title: Pay The Twenty Dollars
synopsis: Archie stops by Jefferson Cleaners to pick up some dry cleaning and pays with a twenty dollar bill. A furious George shows up at the Bunker's front door claiming the bill Archie passed to him was counterfeit. After arguing, Louise and Edith try to clear up the entire mess between George and Archie.

title: Ahumada Style
synopsis: Redbeard interviews Andrew Ahumada.

synopsis: Nitro crew spends the day with veterans and adaptive athletes at The Ready Lab

synopsis: Redbeard reports from live show at Christchurch New Zealand

synopsis: Redbeard & the Nitro Circus crew visit Franklin Farm & go golfing

synopsis: Redbeard & the Nitro Circus crew have fun on jetboats in New Zealand

title: Parks
synopsis: Redbeard helps Parks Bonifay to backflip a trike on Giganta ramp

synopsis: Redbeards interviews Nitro Circu Live cast about his own identity

synopsis: Redbeard and Nitro Circus Live crew has fun with snakes

title: Heavy Lies the Head
synopsis: After auction house Parke-Mason lands a coveted art collection  rookie dealer Graham Connor finds himself the new golden boy. But a smuggler from Graham‘s past threatens his hard-won success. Tensions mount when mogul Sam Brukner‘s collection sparks fierce competition between rival auction houses.

title: Whodunnit
synopsis: After the theft of a Pete Townshend artifact throws an auction into jeopardy  Graham must track down the stolen object while risking exposure of his own illicit past. Meanwhile  Graham’s rival Roxanna Whitman stoops to new lows in order to land a dying man‘s priceless art collection.

title: Mint Condition
synopsis: A couple finds millions in coins buried in their yard, triggering fierce competition between Graham and Roxanna. But when Graham gets lured to a party by Brukner, he must choose between two prestigious accounts. Meanwhile, Uzay and Demir meet with the Russian mob, setting up Graham as the fall guy.

title: Just Say Faux
synopsis: To up the value of the newly signed Swift collection  Roxanna resorts to fraud  but Swift‘s nephew smells a rat. Graham employs underhanded methods in order to seal the deal with Brukner. Graham  Uzay and Demir meet the Russian mob boss to sell the mask  but the deal goes disastrously south.

title: One Ton Depot
synopsis: After the Russian mob disaster  Graham and the smuggling gang lie low. But when Graham brings his girlfriend Elizabeth home for a family gathering  his double life threatens to surface. Roxanna  in her efforts to secure the Swift collection‘s integrity  finds herself the target of blackmail.

title: Ride Along
synopsis: The FBI closes in on Hassan  forcing Graham to risk his life to get Hassan and the antiquities over the border. In the process  he learns a terrible secret about the treasures. As Richard Swift continues to pressure Roxanna for control of the family‘s collection  she hires a P.I. to investigate him.

title: The Quatrefoil
synopsis: The FBI questions Graham as Hassan applies pressure on him to sell more illegal antiquities. Davenport hosts a bigwig fundraiser, causing tensions to rise as enemies and rival auction houses are thrown together. Brukner’s feelings for Roxanna grow, as do his ambitions to launch his political career.

title: The Name of the Game
synopsis: Graham tries to land the account of a controversial NFL player while Hassan risks capture in order to see his family. After Graham learns a secret about Roxanna and the Swift collection, their relationship takes a shocking turn. Prescott sets a trap for Graham that threatens his job at Parke-Mason.

title: The Interview
synopsis: Brukner’s political ambitions are threatened when past misdeeds surface on the eve of his auction. Roxanna finds damning evidence against Graham and must decide fast how to use it. Graham‘s troubles mount after Brukner learns Graham betrayed him  while Hassan‘s partners plot to eliminate Graham.

title: The Card Players
synopsis: In the season finale, Brukner takes brutal action against Graham. When Roxanna confronts Graham with the truth, they work together toward a resolution. Members of the smuggling gang plot to take out one another, with Hassan caught in the middle. A final confrontation leads to devastating results.

title: You deserve more in 2016. Vote Sam Brukner.
synopsis: You deserve more in 2016. Learn more about what Sam Brukner can do for you by watching the Sony Crackle Original, The Art of More. All episodes now streaming.

title: Official Trailer
synopsis: The finer things in life have a steep price—smuggling, double-dealing, murder—in this sneak preview of Crackle’s newest original series, The Art of More. This high-stakes drama exposes the dark side of New York City’s rich and powerful elite. All episodes now streaming, only on Crackle.

title: Season 2 Trailer
synopsis: New episodes now streaming. Take a peek at more of the money, greed and fraud that fuel the New York art and collectibles scene­—and its ties with terrorism. Stars Christian Cooke (Magic City), Kate Bosworth (21, Superman Returns), Cary Elwes (Saw) and Dennis Quaid (Vantage Point).

title: The Pecking Order
synopsis: Haunted by his girlfriend‘s murder  Graham gets caught in a dangerous FBI manhunt. Brukner plots to turn the tables on his growing enemies. Roxanna makes a risky power play at DeGraaf’s while forging ahead with the fraudulent Swift auction. From a Croatian hideout  Davenport hatches a new art scam.

title: Man On A Rope
synopsis: Roxanna clashes with her father as she rises at DeGraaf’s. Graham’s ambition to get back in the auction world lands him in the boxing ring. Using questionable methods, Brukner courts the talented curator Isabel Perry. When Davenport’s latest art conquest goes up in flames, he reaches out to Graham.

title: Hokori
synopsis: Roxanna’s resolve is tested when her new plans for DeGraaf’s backfire. Graham hustles to meet the demands of working for both Roxanna and the FBI. An old investigation threatens Brukner’s plans for his new museum. Davenport’s financial state forces him back into partnership with Graham.

title: El Calvo
synopsis: Roxanna gets entangled in a government manhunt while her brother-in-law Miles plots against her. After a misstep, Graham ramps up efforts to track fugitive Paul Rice. While dodging a federal investigation, Brukner clashes with Isabel over the museum. Davenport tries to pull Graham into a new con.

title: Better A Lion Than A Sheep
synopsis: Graham’s abduction leads to a confrontation with the very man he’s been hunting. Brukner gets an unexpected visitor just as he and Isabel grow closer. Roxanna reveals a dark family secret. Davenport finds himself in a risky position with a collector. The smuggler Hassan meets a shocking fate.

title: The Past Ain’t Done
synopsis: An auction of old photographs leads Graham to a disturbing discovery about his past. Roxanna tries to block Miles’s scheme to take over DeGraaf’s. With his daughter Olivia‘s safety at stake  Brukner is pulled into the FBI sting operation of Paul Rice. Davenport has a surprising proposal for Brukner.

title: The Tears Of A Clown
synopsis: As a macabre auction is underway at DeGraaf’s, Roxanna’s self-destructive behavior threatens her control of the company. Davenport lands a job working for Brukner’s new museum while things heat up between Brukner and Isabel. Graham takes drastic steps to avenge the death of a friend.

title: Stories We Tell Ourselves
synopsis: Against the backdrop of a contentious auction  Miles and Roxanna step up their battle to control the company. A shocking accident reveals the truth about Brukner‘s daughter. Graham’s plan to rescue Hassan’s family turns deadly. Tensions come to a boil at Brukner‘s museum fundraiser.

title: The Thirteenth Floor
synopsis: Roxanna fights for her position at DeGraaf’s following a takeover devised by Miles. As Davenport schemes against Brukner, an old swindle comes back to haunt him. The Paul Rice sting operation is complicated by the unexpected arrival of an enemy from Graham’s past.

title: A Half Inch
synopsis: In the wake of the FBI sting, Graham struggles to start over. Roxanna gets a surprise offer from DeGraaf’s, yet she can’t outrun her misdeeds. Brukner’s museum deal threatens to implode. Davenport and Graham form a new partnership, but Graham’s inability to bury the past ends in a violent face off.

title: Pilot
synopsis: A hot, confident divorcée cons her way into a teaching job at a local middle school in hopes of landing a rich husband.

title: Divorced Dudes
synopsis: Meredith (Ari Graynor) joins principal Carl (David Alan Grier) and his Divorced Dudes group to find a new husband. Ginny (Kristin Davis) plans to punish Meredith's lax teaching habits, but her scheme backfires.

title: Life Science
synopsis: To get the money for a new apartment, Meredith (Ari Graynor) bets on the school science fair. Ginny (Kristin Davis) and Irene (Sara Gilbert) vie over who gets to present the winner's trophy.

title: Daddy Issues
synopsis: Meredith (Ari Graynor) sets her sights on dating the father of her student Bronwen (Gracie Kaufman) - but has to get her permission first. Joel (Ryan Hansen) helps Irene (Sara Gilbert) navigate the world of online dating.

title: 6th Grade Lock-In, The
synopsis: During the annual sixth grade slumber party, Meredith (Ari Graynor) reveals her true feelings for Joel (Ryan Hansen).

title: Found Money
synopsis: Meredith (Ari Graynor) faces a moral dilemma when she's forced to choose between a ski weekend with her rich friends and the school's field trip to the state capitol. Principal Carl (David Alan Grier) impresses Joel (Ryan Hansen) with his knack for meeting single women.

title: Evaluation Day
synopsis: An important teaching evaluation threatens to cost Meredith (Ari Graynor) her job and the loyalty of her co-worker Irene (Sara Gilbert). Joel (Ryan Hansen) vows to help principal Carl (David Alan Grier) stand up to his bullying ex-wife.

title: Fieldtrippers
synopsis: As Meredith (Ari Graynor) uses a class field trip to track down a handsome employee of an Internet company, principal Carl (David Alan Grier) appoints Ginny (Kristin Davis) to fill in for him while he tags along.

title: Little Respect, A
synopsis: As two overbearing moms threaten to pull their son out of Nixon Middle to protest Meredith (Ari Graynor) and her lax teaching methods, Joel (Ryan Hansen) discovers Ginny (Kristin Davis) holds a grudge over an old slight.

title: Nix The Fat Week
synopsis: As Meredith (Ari Graynor) and Irene (Sara Gilbert) compete for the attention of a famous vegan chef, Ginny (Kristin Davis) coaches principal Carl (David Alan Grier) for an annual faculty race.

title: Yearbook
synopsis: Meredith (Ari Graynor) steps up to help Ginny (Kristin Davis) finish the yearbook and recover from a bad breakup. Principal Carl (David Alan Grier) coaches Kim (Caitlin Kimball) on the Teacher's Exam.

title: Bottle, The
synopsis: When her plans for her 30th birthday bash suddenly fall apart, Meredith (Ari Graynor) piggybacks on the party that Kim (Caitlin Kimball) was planning to celebrate passing the teacher's exam.

title: What’s Old Is New
synopsis: As Meredith (Ari Graynor) struggles to respond to her ex-husband's renewed interest, principal Carl (David Alan Grier) must confront his ex-wife when she arrives to administer the state standardized tests.

title: Pilot
synopsis: A rookie undercover FBI agent is teamed with a seasoned veteran to stop a terrorist arms deal, only to discover that his partner is the one being investigated by the Bureau.

title: Two Choices
synopsis: Barker and Ellis' investigation into a major drug deal uncovers a Chicago police lieutenant's deadly revenge scheme.

title: Nadia
synopsis: Barker and Ellis enlist a frightened prostitute in an undercover operation aimed at bringing down a sex slave ring run by the ruthless and well-connected son of a Romanian diplomat.

title: Infected
synopsis: Ellis and Barker race against the clock in an effort to save an eight-year-old boy who's been infected with a mysterious virus in a scheme aimed at forcing his mother to steal millions of dollars worth of valuable jewels.

title: Mercy
synopsis: The investigation into the murders of a pair of homeless Army veterans sends the agents to Chicago's skid row and forces Ellis to confront his own painful memories of the Iraq War.

title: The Bitsy Big-Boy Boomeroo
synopsis: Ellis and Barker must protect a nuclear scientist who has been marked for death to keep her from testifying at a top-secret government hearing.

title: Hothead
synopsis: Ellis and Barker investigate a shady corporate security firm where an undercover FBI agent has disappeared after being sent to investigate a series of high-profile murders.

title: Capone
synopsis: The brutal murder of a beat cop sends Ellis and Barker undercover to expose the connection between a ruthless gang and the Chicago Police Department.

title: The Walk In
synopsis: A double agent's tip leads Barker and Ellis to suspect a brilliant mathematician of passing missile secrets to the Chinese.

title: Tilt
synopsis: hen he and Ellis are sent to a high-stakes poker game to catch an infamous assassin, Barker is reminded of his unfortunate involvement in the assassination of an American ambassador and his daughter 15 years ago.

title: My Brother’s Keeper
synopsis: To avenge the murder of Conrad's former partner, Ellis and Barker exploit a rift between two brothers at the head of a notorious Chicago crime family.

title: Counterfeit
synopsis: When a sting operation goes sour and makes Barker the suspect in the murder of an alleged counterfeiter, he and Ellis set out to prove it was a setup.

title: No Turning Back
synopsis: Barker enlists his few friends inside the Bureau to help expose the rogue agents responsible for a series of crimes, including the murder of an American ambassador.

title: In Case Of Emergency
synopsis: After being thrown out by his wife  Mitchell appeals to the Winston brothers to put him up  while James worries that Charles doesn‘t think he‘s responsible.

title: The Big Three-Oh
synopsis: Upon turning thirty  Charles tries to prove he‘s not old by challenging a pair of teenagers at basketball.

title: Just Friends
synopsis: After Terri breaks up with her boyfriend, Charles, James, Mitchell and Dusty all compete for her attention; Charles is unhappy with the work of his attractive new editor.

title: The Player
synopsis: As James falls for a beautiful but elusive new woman, Mitchell joins a support group for the recently divorced.

title: The List
synopsis: In an effort to boost his career, Charles abandons his friends in order to spend time with a successful college roommate.

title: The Interview
synopsis: An old girlfriend offers Charles a new job in exchange for having sex.

title: Dusty‘s In Love
synopsis: Dusty‘s friends try to talk him out of marrying a woman he just met.

title: Family Affair
synopsis: Mitchell‘s father expects him to return home and take over the family business; Charles accidentally convinces NFL commentator Ronnie Lott to return to pro football.

title: New Beginnings
synopsis: As James counsels Mitchell on how to woo a prospective girlfriend, Charles squares off against a hard-nosed editor and Dusty gets a new sports car.

title: Scandalous
synopsis: Charles uncovers a squeaky clean athlete‘s scandalous behavior; Mitchell‘s sister comes to stay with him and Dusty.

title: Elephant Men
synopsis: Dusty looks for a stunt to improve his ratings as Mitchell‘s sister seeks Charles help fending off her ex-husband.

title: Kung Fools
synopsis: As Charles worries about offending pro football legend Jim Brown, Dusty and Mitchell enroll in a martial arts class.

title: Firewalk
synopsis: Charles must attend a motivational seminar with his boss as Dusty is kidnapped by an obsessed fan.

title: Road Rules
synopsis: A trip to a high school reunion bring back memories for Charles, James, Mitchell and Dusty.

title: Spring Time
synopsis: James is ambushed by some ex-girlfriends on The Jerry Springer Show; Charles asks his boss to help with a double date.

title: Let It Ride
synopsis: Charles‘s interview with a bookie revives a gambling habit that gets Mitchell into deep trouble with the mob.

title: Fantasy Camp
synopsis: Charles is sent to report on a Pete Rose baseball fantasy camp.

title: Leland Bray
synopsis: Tom’s (Ryan Eggold) search for the truth about his past leads to a new job working alongside a lethal assassin and former nemesis who’s looking to atone for his misdeeds.

title: Independence USA
synopsis: Tom (Ryan Eggold) and Nez (Tawny Cypress) investigate a secret Russian military base that’s training spies to infiltrate the United States.

title: Kevin Jensen
synopsis: Over objections from the White House, Scottie (Famke Janssen) sends Tom (Ryan Eggold) and his team to Kyrkistan to rescue an American journalist who’s been arrested for espionage.

title: Operation Davenport
synopsis: The CIA enlists Scottie (Famke Janssen) to capture a group of dangerous terrorists who’ve escaped from a black site prison in the middle of New York City.

title: Borealis 301
synopsis: Tom (Ryan Eggold) and Solomon (Edi Gathegi) go undercover to stop the hijacking of a commercial flight that’s delivering a CIA agent to China.

title: Hostages
synopsis: As a mission to ransom a businessman and his family exposes the kidnapper‘s plan to reconnect with a longtime associate  Tom‘s (Ryan Eggold) efforts to free Howard (Terry O‘Quinn) put him in Scottie‘s (Famke Janssen) crosshairs.

title: Whitehall
synopsis: After Tom (Ryan Eggold) enlists the FBI to gain Howard‘s (Terry O‘Quinn) release  they team up to expose Scottie‘s (Famke Janssen) secret plan.

title: Whitehall: Conclusion
synopsis: As Howard (Terry O‘Quinn) and Scottie (Famke Janssen) face off for control of Halcyon  Tom (Ryan Eggold) leads a raid to free mathematician Richard Whitehall (guest start Clarke Peters) and his quantum computing technology.

title: The Devil Resides In Human Souls
synopsis: Rin Okumura begins to worry about his future as his twin brother, Yukio, is starting school at the prestigious True Cross Academy.  Sent to a job interview by his foster father, Shiro, Rin encounters a demon-like creature causing havoc in the store.

title: Gehenna Gate
synopsis: Rin is thrown into turmoil when Shiro tells him that he‘s the son of Satan! Warning him that he must never draw it  Shiro gives Rin the Koma Sword  and hides him in the monastery basement. Outside  a fierce battle begins...

title: Brothers
synopsis: Vowing to become an exorcist  Rin is taken to True Cross Academy by the mysterious Mephisto  a friend of their late father. Later  Rin heads to the Exorcist Cram School  as Mephisto warns: You must keep that you‘re the son of Satan confidential.

title: The Garden of Amahara
synopsis: When Yukio takes on a case  Rin tags along with him to the Exorcism Supply Shop. There he meets Shiemi  a girl with ailing legs  tending to her garden. Yukio examines Shiemi‘s legs and finding demonic traces  speculates that the garden is the cause.

title: A Boy From the Cursed Temple
synopsis: Rin is always snoozing in class  much to star pupil Suguro‘s irritation. Suguro‘s striving to become an exorcist so he can restore his family‘s temple in Kyoto  and being classmates with such a slacker is more than he can bear.

title: The Phantom Chef
synopsis: The biggest headache of Rin‘s school life is his daily meals. On Yukio‘s advice  Rin starts cooking in the dorm kitchen  preparing lunch the night before. But in the morning  all the food has vanished!

title: A Flock of Plovers
synopsis: To overcome her shyness  Shiemi secretly vows to Make friends! But she‘s foiled by her klutziness. After displaying her Tamer skills in class  she finally asks Izumo to be her friend! Soon after  the Exorcist Cram School holds a boot camp.

title: Now a Certain Man Was Sick...
synopsis: Crushed by her failure to save her best friend  Izumo lashes out at Suguro! Their bickering escalates until the whole class is involved  and they‘re all sent to detention. Suddenly  the students are attacked by the ghoul Rin fought the day before!

title: Memories
synopsis: Fighting together for the first time, Rin and the others barely survive a harrowing attack. Suddenly, Mephisto and the cram school teachers are before them! Sensing something odd in Noihaus’s behavior, Yukio confronts the teacher, only to discover...

title: Black Cat
synopsis: After the excitement of being promoted to ExWire, Rin is soon disgusted with his load of homework. Then, Yukio is summoned for an urgent mission! The familiar of the Knights of the True Cross has gone berserk, and Yukio has to deal with the crisis.

title: Demon of the Deep
synopsis: Rin, Shima and Izumo have been sent on a mission, only to end up working instead. They meet a boy named Yohei and learn of the "Demon of the Sea." Yohei lost his father to this monster, and wants revenge. Worried, Rin and the others watch over him.

title: A Game of Tag
synopsis: The class investigates ghost sightings at an amusement park. Rin is partnered with Shiemi, and they find the ghost of a child. He runs away, turning things into a game of tag! Separated from Shiemi, Rin is confronted by Amaimon, King of Earth.

title: Proof
synopsis: Senior Exorcist First Class Shura Kirigakure stops the battle between Rin and Amaimon. Rin learns that Shura was once a disciple of Shiro‘s - and that Shura has targeted him for elimination - the job that my mentor failed to do!

title: A Fun Camping Trip
synopsis: The first semester has ended  signaling the start of summer vacation for students. But there‘s no rest for Rin and the other ExWires: they must take part in a 3-day drill to prepare for actual combat  under the guise of a camping trip.

title: Act of Kindness
synopsis: Suguro‘s joint strategy pays off  and the Exwires have success in their sights! But then a gigantic moth demon (cuchi) appears  and attacks Rin the moment he lets his guard down!

title: The Wager
synopsis: Consumed by the power of the flames during his battle with Amaimon, Rin goes berserk! He regains control of himself once his power is exhausted...only to be captured then and there by the current Paladin, Angel!

title: Temptation
synopsis: As the hearing drags on  the Order finds itself unable to decide on Rin‘s fate  as Mephisto has proclaimed him to be a weapon for counterattacking Satan. Just then  something happens...!

title: Friends
synopsis: Rin undergoes training to master his demonic flames, when a giant bird-like demon swoops in on him!  After driving it away, all of the Cram School members are sent to investigate how the demon infiltrated the academy...

title: An Ordinary Day
synopsis: The Exorcism Cram School students are having a ball with Shima‘s birthday-based fortune-telling. When they discover that Izumo‘s birthday is coming up  they hit upon the idea of throwing her a surprise party!

title: Mask
synopsis: Southern Cross Monastery, where Rin and Yukio grew up, has come under attack by a mysterious assailant! Leaving behind these cryptic words: "I will never forgive anyone related to Satan," the masked assailant escapes...

title: The Secret Garden
synopsis: The assailant has escaped, but things are just getting back to normal after the monastery attack. Just then, someone appears before Yukio!

title: Demon Hunting
synopsis: In light of the recent incidents  Mephisto is dismissed from his post as director. The Order‘s Supreme Advisors are ousted as well  paving the way for Ernst to become Pope. The newly appointed Preceptor of the Japan Branch is revealed to be...

title: Truth
synopsis: Ernst is scheming to invoke the Gehenna Gate by using the blood of Rin, son of Satan. In order to protect his wounded older brother, Yukio offers to take his place.

title: Satan’s Spawn
synopsis: Hordes of demons are spilling out of Gehenna Gate, and are now indiscriminately attacking the people of True Cross Academy Town! Meanwhile  Rin has been rescued by Suguro and Shiemi and is starting to come to. What Rin sees when he awakens is...

title: Time, Stop
synopsis: Satan has transformed himself into a gigantic Gehenna Gate, and is attempting to absorb all of Assiah. Rin and Yukio, joined by Shura and Angel, attack the gate.  Meanwhile, at the school, the exorcists defend against a myriad of demons.

title: Pilot
synopsis: Perpetual college student and computer hacking whiz Cameron Price (Bret Harrison) is recruited to join a high-tech security consulting firm masterminded by its enigmatic and manipulative owner, Oz (Christian Slater).

title: ’Tis Better to Have Loved and Flossed
synopsis: Under orders from Oz, Cameron and his Contra team struggle to get around the security system in a crazed client’s well-guarded home.

title: Take the Movie & Run
synopsis: When a film studio looks to secure its copy of a legendary cult film prior to a screening at the Comic Con convention, they turn to Contra Security.

title: White on White on White
synopsis: As Oz assigns her to lead a team to steal a priceless work of modern art, Melanie welcomes her father, Larry back from a five-year stretch in prison. But as Melanie looks to make up for lost time, Oz sets out to prove that her dad is actually a con man.

title: Need for Speed
synopsis: When he's forced to prove his worth to the company by working with Contra’s newest client, NASCAR racer Jimmie Johnson, Cameron turns to Melanie's boyfriend, Dutch for help. Meanwhile, Cash (Alphonso McAuley) turns the office copy machine into a very human robot.

title: Breaking Out
synopsis: When their bickering causes them to fail at an important assignment, Oz orders a team-building exercise that strands everyone inside the office. But as they work to escape, Cameron struggles with the news that Melanie is moving in with her boyfriend, Dutch (Michael Rosenbaum).

title: 21.0 Jump Street
synopsis: Ignoring Oz's (Christian Slater) orders to work for Steven Tyler, Cameron (Bret Harrison) enlists his Contra Security co-workers to help a geeky teenager who is being bullied by a high school classmate. Upon arriving at school, Cameron finds an old friend of his working there, too.

title: The Contra Club
synopsis: As Cameron (Bret Harrison) and Cash (Alphonso McAuley) look to prank their kooky new receptionist (Megan Mullally), they discover that Oz (Christian Slater) is secretly negotiating to sell Contra Security.

title: Cash Of The Titans
synopsis: As Veronica (Megan Mullally) moves to take over Contra, Oz (Christian Slater) resists her efforts to transform the company into a bland corporate subsidiary as he tries to retain the loyalty of his staff.

title: Who’s The Boss
synopsis: With the company hitting financial hard times, Veronica (Megan Mullally) orders Oz (Christian Slater) to turn down a coveted pro bono assignment and focus on getting clients who can pay. And as Molly (Erin Richards) accuses him of using a secret code to incite insubordination, Oz fights back.

title: The Blind Sided
synopsis: As a new case brings them face to face with a crafty 14-year-old computer hacker, Veronica (Megan Mullally) and Oz (Christian Slater) are at odds over how to handle the youthful offender. Meanwhile, Cameron (Bret Harrison) and Melanie (Odette Annable) struggle with their feelings for each other.

title: Game Of Jones
synopsis: Molly (Erin Richards) suspects that a legendary Contra employee is a front for Oz’s (Christian Slater) embezzlement. As Cash (Alphonso McAuley) is enlisted to bolster Oz’s cover story, Veronica (Megan Mullally) throws a party to win over her new staff.

title: Cyrano De Nerdgerac
synopsis: To punish Veronica (Megan Mullally) for stealing his pudding, Oz (Christian Slater) looks to steal away her assistant, Molly (Erin Hughes). But when Molly develops a crush on him, Oz must find a way to rebuff her.

title: Double Dragon
synopsis: Losing a new account to his former protégé (guest star Samm Levine) forces Oz (Christian Slater) to admit that he’s been harboring a costly secret. Meanwhile, Cameron (Bret Harrison) looks to break Cash (Alphonso McAuley) of his online auction habit.

title: The Legend Of Hurley’s Gold
synopsis: As Veronica (Megan Mullally) dupes Cameron (Bret Harrison) into being her date for a wedding, Oz (Christian Slater) plots to help Cash (Alphonso McAuley) land a date with Molly (Erin Richards).

title: Chasing Amy & Molly
synopsis: When her visa expires, Molly's (Erin Richards) imminent deportation leads her into a sham marriage with Cameron (Bret Harrison). Meanwhile, Oz (Christian Slater) discovers that he is still married to his ex-wife Amy (guest star Alyssa Milano).

title: Heatherses
synopsis: Veronica believes her career is in jeopardy when longtime corporate rival Heather O'Brien decides to give Contra a makeover. Hoping to woo Heather's lovely assistant, Cameron tries to make his phony green card marriage to Molly (Erin Richards) appear legitimate.

title: The Hungover
synopsis: After she's banned from Contra's boys' night out, Veronica rallies the women for their own night on the town. But as Cameron worries about being the subject of the girls' gossip, the disappearance of a prized trophy forces Contra's men and women to join forces to find it.

title: The Nat’ral
synopsis: As Oz squares off in a fight to the finish with his longtime nemesis Henry Shaw, Cameron's marriage to Molly is threatened by the unexpected return of his ex-girlfriend and Contra's lock-picking expert, Melanie.

title: Episode XIII
synopsis: When his priceless Chewbacca costume from Star Wars is stolen, Molly's uncle Peter Mayhew turns to Contra to get it back. And though Oz  plans to use the hefty reward to buy his company back from OCP, he still finds himself relying on Veronica for help.

title: Brothers
synopsis: A multi-camera comedy series starring Michael Strahan as a retired NFL star who moves back to his hometown and is reunited with his brother, played by Daryl "Chill" Mitchell, whose promising football career ended because of a car accident.

title: Lenny
synopsis: As Mike and Chill compete for the attentions of an old female friend, the Trainor household is shaken by a visit from Adele’s cousin and her racist husband.

title: House Rules/Anniversary
synopsis: Adele lays down the law after walking in on Mike’s half-naked overnight guest, while Coach lands in hot water with his wife after he forgets their wedding anniversary.

title: Meet Mike Trainor
synopsis: As they square off as rival assistant coaches for their dad’s high school football team, Mike and Chill hire a beautiful and clever new bartender to help promote the restaurant.

title: Mike’s Comeback
synopsis: Mike is offered another season of pro football, if he can pass a physical; Adele tries to keep a promising high school baseball player from dropping out of school to play professionally in Japan.

title: Mom At Bar/Train Buddy
synopsis: After their arguing drives off yet another bartender, Mike and Chill hire their mom for the job.

title: Snoop/Fat Kid
synopsis: Mike enlists his ne’er-do-well cousin, Kenny, to help recover the money that was stolen from him; Adele threatens Coach into helping a promising academic decathlete get a much-needed passing grade in P.E.

title: Commercial - Coach Dmv
synopsis: On the heels of an offer to work as a post-game commentator opposite an old pro football nemesis, Mike is asked to do a TV commercial alongside his mom.

title: Week In The Chair
synopsis: Chill bets Mike that he can’t spend a week in a wheelchair.

title: Snoop Returns
synopsis: Adele balks when Coach’s ex-con brother comes to stay; Mike bets he can land a date with the restaurant’s brilliant new waitress.

title: Follow The Story
synopsis: A sportswriter sent to interview Mike finds a far more compelling story in his older brother, Chill.

title: Christmas
synopsis: Adele’s plans for a family Christmas are upended by the boys’ job commitments and her brother-in-law Lenny’s unexpected arrival.

title: Girls Girls Girls
synopsis: While Adele is happy to arrange a blind date between an acquaintance from work and Chill, she’s less than thrilled when Mike asks out her good friend from school.

title: Angel With A Broken Wing
synopsis: Stanton selects Peter and Jared to defend him against a murder charge but they must work with a lawyer from the New York office. Hannah takes the case of a wrestler being dumped because of his age.

title: Angels in Paradise
synopsis: When the Angels’ pursuit of a ruthless kidnapper leads them to identify his next victims as the wife and son of a mob money launderer who committed suicide, Abby (Rachael Taylor) must face her past and ask her imprisoned con man father for help.

title: Bon Voyage, Angels
synopsis: When the Angels are hired to locate a journalist who’s gone missing while on a Caribbean cruise, Kate (Annie Ilonzeh) must decide if she can bring herself to help find the same woman who exposed her as a dirty cop.

title: Angels in Chains
synopsis: A mission to rescue a kidnapped human rights worker that lands the Angels (Annie Ilonzeh, Minka Kelly and Rachael Taylor) inside a Cuban prison brings Bosley (Ramon Rodriguez) face to face with an old CIA agent he tangled with during his days working on the wrong side of the law.

title: Runway Angels
synopsis: While investigating the disappearance of a young fashion model, the Angels find themselves at odds with a Miami PD detective who also happens to be Kate's (Annie Ilonzeh) ex-fiancé.

title: Black Hat Angels
synopsis: The kidnapping of a young artist brings Bosley (Ramon Rodriguez) face to face with an old partner from his days as a cyber-criminal and forces him to tell Kate (Annie Ilonzeh), Eve (Minka Kelly) and Abby (Rachael Taylor) a painful truth about his past.

title: Royal Angels
synopsis: While investigating the disappearance of a young fashion model, the Angels find themselves at odds with a Miami PD detective who also happens to be Kate’s (Annie Ilonzeh) ex-fiancé.

title: Angels Never Forget
synopsis: After saving the life of a man found washed up on a Miami beach, the Angels set out to help him remember who he is. But as Eve (Minka Kelly) starts to fall for their new client, she must prove that he isn’t a corrupt cop who’s wanted for the murder of his partner on the LAPD.

title: The Box
synopsis: Ian Mitchell (Milo Ventimiglia) is thrust into a deadly game when a mysterious box, containing a loaded gun and a photo of a stranger named Daniel Easton (Diedrich Bader), appears on his doorstep. After narrowly surviving his first day, Ian realizes that this fatal game has infiltrated his life.

title: The Watchers
synopsis: After a near death encounter with another hunter (Brett Davern), Ian discovers how relentless the “Watchers” are as he attempts to gain the upper hand. As the clock counts down, and Ian uses everything at his disposal to save his family, he comes face-to-face with the sadists who control the game.

title: The Way Out
synopsis: Ian and his estranged wife Laura (Nicky Whelan) are forced to make one last desperate attempt to save their daughter’s life before the clock expires.

title: Heroes and Villains
synopsis: While Jacob Orr (Chad Michael Murray) struggles to understand the rules and scope of the game, the Mitchells fight to stay alive and out of range of the Watchers’ surveillance.

title: Killers
synopsis: As Jacob starts to see just how deep the rabbit hole goes, Ian takes the family to an isolated cabin for safety. Jacob’s survival instincts kick in to keep Avery and King alive.

title: Protect Your Own
synopsis: Jacob discovers a terrible secret about the Watchers as they force him back into the game. Hurt and desperate, he learns why he has been chosen and that he has no choice but to play. Ian tries to save his family from an unseen hunter as Jacob desperately fights for his brother’s life.

title: Dirty Hands
synopsis: Jacob Orr fights to protect Ellie Mitchell (Caitlyn Carmichael). We meet hunter Josie Acosta (Rose McGowan) and her teenagers Alex (Alexander Le Bas) and Megan (Sammi Hanratty). Meanwhile, Max Gregory (Brandon Routh) discovers that anyone can be selected for the game.

title: Prisoners
synopsis: The Acosta family battles a team of hunters in their own home while Jacob, Avery and Ellie meet with Max to hear his promised way out of the game. As Josie looks for a way to escape, Jacob learns about the Black Box, a possible way out of the game.

title: Monsters
synopsis: Josie and her kids emerge from their panic room to fight Shondra (Stacy Haiduk) and her children, Cassidy (Lexi Ainsworth) and Tom (Bridger Zadina), while Jacob stalks the targets from the Black Box, leading to explosive, heartrending finales for all.

title: It‘s A Classic
synopsis: Two beautiful & skilled private ‘operatives,’ Veronica (Emmanuelle Chriqui) & Roxie (Emily Osment), are teamed up on a new mission by their boss, Mother (Gina Gershon). The job seems to be going smoothly until they make a discovery that changes everything.

title: The Blown Job
synopsis: Veronica & Roxie soon find their lives at risk. Mother deploys her two best hunters in Julian (Clifton Collins Jr.) & Kyle (Nathan Keyes) to eliminate the girls & bring the boy, Tyler (Jakob Salvati) in. Meanwhile, FBI Agent Frank Barnes (David Arquette) continues his search for Tyler.

title: Hide & Seek
synopsis: Veronica and Roxie fight their would-be-assassins as they become the reluctant protectors of Tyler -and uncover the secret as to why the young boy is in such high demand. In the meantime, Barry is double crossed by Mother and moves up his prison escape plans to settle the score.

title: The Key to the Kingdom
synopsis: Barry Madden escapes from prison to help re-capture his son Tyler who is the key to accessing the embezzled funds from Barry’s lucrative and illegal ponzi scheme. As Mother’s hit squad close in on them, Veronica and Roxie have no choice but to team up with Agent Barnes to keep Tyler safe.

title: The Dummy Trap
synopsis: After Tyler is captured by crime boss Mother, Veronica, Roxie, and FBI agent Barnes fight to reunite the young boy with his mother, Eileen (Missi Pyle). In a classic bait-and-switch, they lure Barry into a trap and force him to make a deal with Mother that will hopefully ensure Tyler’s safe return.

title: Till Death Do Us Part
synopsis: In the season finale, Veronica and Roxie must finally face-off against their old boss, Mother, and her lethal team. Can these assassins also save lives as they try to keep the stolen money out of Barry’s hands and get Tyler back into his mother’s arms?

title: There‘s Been a Complication
synopsis: Veronica and Roxie get attacked as they wait on Eileen to collect their share of the $57 million. Veronica calls on the only other people she knows on the island—Marcus and Isabelle Walker, the couple who raised her.

title: Welcome to the Zoo
synopsis: The Walker house is a former training ground for contract killers from which the young Veronica escaped before they could sell her off. Marcus forces Veronica and Roxie into a deal in exchange for her debt. Mother arranges for the release of an assassin from an asylum for the criminally insane.

title: Hello, Father!
synopsis: Veronica and Roxie track down a drug distribution site for the elusive drug lord, El Mariposa. Back in his survivalist bunker, Carlos starts to reminisce about his dead wife Sally. Mother and Eileen hole up in one of Mother’s safe houses—a church.

title: The Not So Safe House
synopsis: Veronica and Roxie get a new lead on where El Mariposa can be found. Mother seeks refuge with Father Brooks, who tries to persuade her to let the girls go.

title: She‘s Alive!
synopsis: Veronica and Roxie infiltrate the drug cartel of El Mariposa. Carlos thinks his dead wife Sally is still alive, while Mother realizes a ghost from her past is out to get her.

title: The Caterpillar and the Butterflies
synopsis: Veronica and Roxie go to a masquerade party thrown by El Mariposa. Veronica has a shocking run-in with someone from her past. While Barnes realizes Phillips may have not told him everything, Mother’s past catches up with her, leaving Eileen to fend for herself.

title: Welcome Home Sally
synopsis: Veronica and Roxie complete a mission only to discover something horrible is waiting for them back at the Walker house. The impending storm has everyone temporarily trapped and looking for safe shelter.

title: Batten Down the Hatches
synopsis: Veronica comes to a crossroads and realizes she is not alone. Phillips finds a place to hole up while waiting on the storm to roll through. Roxie wakes up in a strange environment and realizes she is in trouble.

title: Yin and Yang
synopsis: Delusional Carlos thinks Roxie is, in fact, his dead wife Sally. Veronica has to find Mother in order to find who kidnapped Roxie. Phillips reveals his intentions to Mother.

title: Trippin‘ Balls
synopsis: Veronica reluctantly needs Mother to find Roxie, but tracking down Carlos may be harder than she expected. Roxie realizes she may need to use her brain and not her brawn to survive her captivity. Eileen is tired of being trapped in the house and wants to blow off some steam.

title: Monkey See, Monkey Go
synopsis: Veronica and Barnes learn of Carlos’s strange and dangerous past. Mother gets a lead on where Eileen might be. Roxie finds out she may need to fight her way out of her imprisonment as the clock continues to tick.

title: Los Gallos Del Infierno
synopsis: Veronica and Barnes get a lead on where Roxie may be and try to get there before it’s too late.  Eileen has a twist of fate, while Mother finds a new calling.

title: Why It Crackles: Cleaners
synopsis: Interviews with Gina Gershon, David Arquette, Emmanuelle Chriqui, Emily Osment & Clifton Collins Jr. about the making of the Crackle original series CLEANERS.

title: Why It Crackles: Cleaners Season 2
synopsis: Series stars Emmanuelle Chriqui, Emily Osment and David Arquette discuss their roles on and the shooting of Cleaners Season 2.

title: The Company
synopsis: THE COMPANY traces CIA activities over a 40-year period, from the beginning of the Cold War through the demise of the Soviet Union.

title: The Company
synopsis: THE COMPANY traces CIA activities over a 40-year period, from the beginning of the Cold War through the demise of the Soviet Union.

title: The Company
synopsis: THE COMPANY traces CIA activities over a 40-year period, from the beginning of the Cold War through the demise of the Soviet Union.

title: Pilot
synopsis: Jay ignores his best friend's warning, and begins a romance with the beautiful actress Valerie Fox. The moment of truth comes early in their relationship when Jay has to review her new film.

title: Miserable
synopsis: Jay attempts to show the world he can be warm by appearing with his mother on a talk show. The event is a categorical failure because he just can't find anything nice to say about her.

title: Marty’s First Date
synopsis: At a screening, Jay falls for a lovely young projectionist, not realizing she is actually an obsessed fan who is determined to make him her personal prisoner.

title: Dial "M" For Mother
synopsis: As part of an effort to make Jay more likable, Geraldo Rivera interviews Jay and Eleanor, but a confrontation during the interview only makes the situation worse.

title: A Little Deb Will Do You
synopsis: Eleanor forces Margo to attend a debutante ball, to which Jay accompanies her; meanwhile, Jay's show is losing viewers to a children's show called "Humphrey the Hippo."

title: Eyes On The Prize
synopsis: When poor ratings cost him his show, Jay is forced to take drastic measures.

title: Every Doris Has Her Day
synopsis: Jay befriends and accidentally "dates" an older woman, make-up artist Doris, only to suspect she might be his biological mother.

title: Marathon Mensch
synopsis: An accident on the show forces Jay into proving his manhood.

title: L.A. Jay
synopsis: After writing a screenplay, Jay takes leave from his job and moves to Hollywood, where he is hired to write a sequel to a movie he hated.

title: Dr. Jay
synopsis: Jay comes to the rescue when Duke is diagnosed with a terminal illness.

title: A Day At The Races And A Night At The Opera
synopsis: Jay tries to help Marty overcome an inferiority complex.

title: Uneasy Rider
synopsis: Jay quits his show to become a truck driver.

title: A Pigboy And His Dog
synopsis: Jay becomes a laughingstock after his mother writes a children's book.

title: Sherman, Woman And Child
synopsis: From the producers of "The Simpsons" comes this animated sitcom about Jay, a movie critic and television host.

title: Sherman Of Arabia
synopsis: From the producers of "The Simpsons" comes this animated sitcom about Jay, a movie critic and television host.

title: A Song For Margo
synopsis: From the producers of "The Simpsons" comes this animated sitcom about Jay, a movie critic and television host.

title: From Chunk To Hunk
synopsis: From the producers of "The Simpsons" comes this animated sitcom about Jay, a movie critic and television host.

title: Lady Hawke
synopsis: Alice becomes jealous when Jay is courted by Jeremy's beautiful sister.

title: Frankie And Ellie Get Lost
synopsis: From the producers of "The Simpsons" comes this animated sitcom about Jay, a movie critic and television host.

title: Siskel and Ebert and Jay and Alice
synopsis: From the producers of "The Simpsons" comes this animated sitcom about Jay, a movie critic and television host.

title: All the Duke’s Men
synopsis: From the producers of "The Simpsons" comes this animated sitcom about Jay, a movie critic and television host.

title: Dukerella
synopsis: From the producers of "The Simpsons" comes this animated sitcom about Jay, a movie critic and television host.

title: I Can’t Believe It’s A Clip Show
synopsis: From the producers of "The Simpsons" comes this animated sitcom about Jay, a movie critic and television host.

title: I Used to be a Bad Boy Bragging Contest
synopsis: Takashi Kamiyama has enrolled in Cromartie High School, known for its rough characters and rowdy demeanors.

title: Blade Runners High
synopsis: Having scoped out the strongest badasses in Cromartie  Kamiyama and Hayashida can‘t let one thing go: the true nature of Mechazawa.

title: Cromartie High (Co-Ed)
synopsis: A wordless tune  hummed on lips of metal gets stuck in Hayashida‘s mind.

title: Radio Gaga
synopsis: Yamaguchi has but one thing he won‘t tolerate: bad comedy.

title: Sentimental Bus
synopsis: Takenouchi, the boss of the Cromartie first years, finally makes his appearance.

title: The Empire of Ambition
synopsis: Takeshi Hokuto  the son of a powerful man  has brought eighteen other high schools under his control  and now it‘s Cromartie‘s time to feel the power of the Hokuto.

title: Pootan
synopsis: The popularity of the comedy show  Poo-tan  gets under Yamaguchi‘s skin.

title: Electric Warrior
synopsis: During health examinations at school, Mechazawa receives some troubling news.

title: Reboot
synopsis: The Cromartie boys celebrate Maeda‘s birthday.

title: Jackson
synopsis: The boys of Bass High plan to take down Cromartie.

title: Usa Trip
synopsis: Takenouchi faces a hard choice.

title: Road Safety
synopsis: After an argument with his classmates, Mechazawa questions himself and his way of life.

title: Joshua Tree
synopsis: Hayashida realizes he has a dream to play baseball.

title: Talking Head
synopsis: Yamaguchi has decided that he needs a capable second-in-command.

title: Ok Computer
synopsis: As the boss of Manuel High School, Fujimoto is one hardened badass.

title: Japan Boss Championships
synopsis: Hokuto learns about the No. 1 Boss Tournament from his lackey.

title: Let Me Tell You My Name
synopsis: The toughest boss has been decided  but Yamaguchi won‘t accept it.

title: Pootan Gets Fired
synopsis: Freddie subs for Poo-tan at an autograph signing session.

title: Moto-Mechazawa
synopsis: Mechazawa may have a new body  but he won‘t let that slow him down.

title: Lost Relation
synopsis: Hokuto ponders his troubles in life.

title: A Trip For Heart
synopsis: The boys from Cromartie take a bullet train to Kyoto for a school trip.

title: You Never Give Me Your Name
synopsis: Hokuto‘s lackey gets fed up with Hokuto and decides to leave the group.

title: Stone Cold Crazy
synopsis: Kamiyama declines an invitation for a meal, and Hayashida calls him out on having changed.

title: Gorilla Sushi
synopsis: Gorilla works at a sushi restaurant, and helps the chief chef and his son reconcile their differences.

title: A Hole In Lotta Love
synopsis: Freddie‘s horse Kokuryu goes on a rampage  which prompts the Cromartie boys to think about pets.

title: Suda!! Cromartie Girls Highschool
synopsis: Takako Kamiyama has enrolled in Cromartie Girls High School  known for its princess-like young ladies-- wait  what?

title: Remember Bartholomew
synopsis: At the end of the 21st century, Earth is experiencing a grand renewal, all thanks to resources mined from the moon. However, tensions mount as lunar colonists rebel against the conditions forced upon them by their motherland.

title: The Order To Destroy Dallos!
synopsis: Repurposing mining gear into tools of war, the lunar resistance heats up. In an effort to break the will of the colonists, government forces aim to destroy Dallos--a giant face carved into the moon worshipped by the colonists.

title: A Raising In The Sea Of Nostalgia Act I
synopsis: War explodes across the moon as a residential district is bombed by government forces. Ambitions and agendas clash as the final battle approaches, with a restored Dallos as the final stronghold!

title: A Raising In The Sea Of Nostalgia Act II
synopsis: With both sides decimated, just what has everything up until now been for? With the future uncertain, all must consider where they stand, and they are fighting for.

title: The Name
synopsis: Dilbert continues having the egg dream, and learns about another guy with that dream who turned into a chicken.  Dilbert works on a project named Acorn, but Dilmom suggests the name Gruntmaster 6000.

title: The Prototype
synopsis: Dilbert, Alice and Wally are working on a new prototype and they are competing against the notoriously ruthless Lena. She seduces Dilbert and steals his idea but Dilbert’s team wins anyway.

title: The Competition
synopsis: The Boss decides they need to increase security to prevent a leak about the Gruntmaster 6000.  Dilbert is suspected of being a traitor and is fired, but he ends up destroying the rival company.

title: Testing
synopsis: Bob Bastard arrives to test the Gruntmaster prototype, and it fails the first two rounds.  Dilbert, with help from Dogbert in space, gets the Gruntmaster to pass the asteroid crash simulation test.

title: Elbonian Trip
synopsis: Dilbert and crew go to Elbonia to see the Gruntmaster factory, where the "Right" workers are exploiting the "Lefties".   Dilbert tries to help, but is sentenced to death and Dogbert must save him.

title: The Takeover
synopsis: Dilbert and Wally buy stock and join the board of their company, and come up with an idea that loses money.  Wally sells their stock and they end up broke, while Dogbert owns the company.

title: Little People
synopsis: A group of tiny engineers, who have been literally downsized, are stealing dry-erase markers and causing problems.  Dogbert organizes a posse to stop them, and decides to sell them as toys.

title: Tower of Babel
synopsis: A cold epidemic hits the office and causes mutations and Dilbert puts himself in charge of building a germ-free building. After it’s complete the Boss changes his mind and Loud Howard destroys it.

title: Y2k
synopsis: Dilbert must fix the computer mainframe Black Betty before Y2K hits. Dogbert hypnotizes Wally so he’ll remember how to access the mainframe  and Zimbu the monkey helps prevent a breakdown.

title: The Knack
synopsis: Dilbert drinks from the coffee cup of the Boss, and loses "the knack" for technology. In denial, he tries to launch a satellite, but he fails miserably and everyone is reverted back to medieval times.

title: Charity
synopsis: The Boss needs a new plaque on his wall, and volunteers for the "Associated Way" charity drive. Dogbert forms his own charity, "Canine Apathy", and Dilbert must be charitable towards the Boss.

title: Holiday
synopsis: Dilbert is sick of the holidays, and Dogbert tries to convince Congress to consolidate all holidays into one - National Dogbert Day.  Wally is depressed about this idea, and Dilbert changes his mind.

title: Infomercial
synopsis: The Boss has shot an infomercial for the Gruntmaster 6000 and sent the machine to a family in Texas.  A Black Hole develops engulfing the entire state and Dilbert seeks Stephen Hawking’s help.

title: The Gift
synopsis: Dilbert must confront his fears and go to The Mall to get a birthday gift for Dilmom. He meets the mall Tribesman, and finds the gift his mom wants, his long-lost father Dildad.

title: The Trial
synopsis: Dilbert gives several pints of blood at a work blood drive, and is sent to prison when his blood is found at a crime scene.  In prison, he organizes the prisoners into a group of efficient thugs.

title: The Shroud of Wally
synopsis: Wally’s birthday party includes a tablecloth he wipes his chocolate covered face with. The cloth ends up at a self-help seminar and the members see Wally’s chocolate image as proof of his divinity.

title: The Dupey
synopsis: Dilbert creates a mechanical baby called "The Dupey" as part of a marketing campaign.  When the Dupeys start to morph into an ugly, advanced life form, Dilbert turns them into insurance salesmen.

title: Art
synopsis: Dilbert draws a blue duck on his computer and becomes a famous artist, and the company enjoys huge success. The popularity fades when the Boss embarrasses himself while wearing a duck shirt on TV.

title: Hunger
synopsis: Dilbert invents the Tomeato and hopes to end world hunger. He travels to Elbonia to test his invention but finds that the residents there eat chocolate flavored mud and aren’t starving at all.

title: The Security Guard
synopsis: Dilbert and the security guard make a bet to switch jobs for a day.  Dilbert realizes that the security job is harder than he thought, especially when he finds an illegal casino on company grounds.

title: The Merger
synopsis: The company must merge with a less efficient corporation in order to eliminate a billion dollar surplus. The other company is run by aliens that suck the brains out of their new employees.

title: The Offsite Meeting
synopsis: The company has an off-site meeting at Dilbert’s house with the tree-loving society that wants to sue them. When their leader kills a neighbor’s elephant Dogbert blackmails them and saves the day.

title: The Assistant
synopsis: The execs don’t want the engineers to leave for other jobs so they give Dilbert his own assistant. Alice is upset that she doesn’t have one so she gets Catbert to appoint Asok as her assistant.

title: Company Picnic
synopsis: At the company picnic softball game, the Crapulets team from engineering hopes beat the Market Gurus team. The Boss buys discount wieners that are poisonous, and Dilbert tries to impress Juliet.

title: The Virtual Employee
synopsis: Dilbert and the gang find an empty cubicle to store their old equipment, and they invent a phony employee named Todd to work there. When he is promoted and Wally is fired, they plot to "kill" Todd.

title: The Return
synopsis: Dilbert goes to Comp-U-Comp to return his computer, and he finds out the company is run by a big computer. He must defeat the computer in a series of challenges, and Dogbert helps by unplugging it.

title: Ethics
synopsis: Dilbert creates an Internet Voting Network for the government that is expected to produce record voter turnout. He is pressured to influence the vote, but remembers a lesson from ethics class.

title: The Fact
synopsis: Dogbert writes a book with made up facts about Chronic Cubicle Syndrome, and Dilbert creates Shockpants to combat CCS. The pants start killing people, and Dilbert is blamed, but he saves his job.

title: The Pregnancy
synopsis: When a rocket crashes into unfertilized eggs a sperm bank and Dilbert’s buttocks he becomes pregnant. He is unaware of the changes going on within him and is horrified when he gets an ultrasound.

title: The Delivery
synopsis: Dilbert tells the Boss he is pregnant, and the Boss threatens to fire him. Dilbert tries to profit from his situation by selling his story to the tabloids and TV shows, but he ends up getting sued.

title: Dr. Ken (PILOT)
synopsis: In "Dr. Ken," the breakout comedy star of "The Hangover" movies and TV's "Community" brings medicine and laughter together as a grumpy and beleaguered HMO doctor whose challenging professional life is trumped only by his home life.

title: Ken Teaches Molly A Lesson
synopsis: As Ken (Ken Jeong) tries to teach Molly (Krista Marie Yu) about the dangers of drinking, Allison (Suzy Nakamura) looks to spend a fun night out with Dave (Albert Tsai).

title: Ken Helps Pat
synopsis: Ken tries to talk Pat out of making the staff work on Saturdays.

title: The Seminar
synopsis: Ken is forced to attend a bedside manner seminar after getting a complaint at work. Elsewhere, Allison, Molly, and Dave have to endure multiple dinners with Ken's parents.

title: Dr. Wendi: Coming To LA
synopsis: Ken (Ken Jeong) is threatened when his sister Wendi (guest star Margaret Cho) brings her popular television show to Los Angeles.

title: Halloween-Aversary
synopsis: Ken wants to arrange the perfect re-proposal to Allison on Halloween, 20 years after his plans were botched the first time.

title: Kevin O’Connell
synopsis: A rival for Ken comes to town - Allison's former boyfriend, now a very hot and successful doctor.

title: Thanksgiving Culture Clash
synopsis: Molly rebels and gets a Japanese tattoo, which spirals Ken and Allison into having a cultural face-off when Allison claims she is more Japanese than Ken is Korean.

title: The Master Scheduler
synopsis: As Allison (Suzy Nakamura) is putting the final touches on a romantic Hawaiian holiday for two, Ken (Ken Jeong) discovers that he never got his days off approved.

title: Ken Cries Foul
synopsis: Ken (Ken Jeong) struggles to make Dave (Albert Tsai) enjoy playing basketball. Damona (Tisha Campbell-Martin) tries to trick Pat (Dave Foley) into giving her some days off.

title: Meeting Molly’s Boyfriend
synopsis: After learning that Molly (Krista Marie Yu) has a boyfriend who is cheating on her, Ken (Ken Jeong) is stunned to find that Allison (Suzy Nakamura) was seeing someone else when they started dating, too.

title: Ken’s Physical
synopsis: When his long-avoided annual physical uncovers a heart problem, Ken (Ken Jeong) blames it on Allison (Suzy Nakamura).

title: The Wedding Sitter
synopsis: Ken (Ken Jeong) discovers that his manic dancing at weddings leaves Allison (Suzy Nakamura) in the cold. Dave (Albert Tsai) uses an imposter to sneak out from under an elderly babysitter's nose.

title: Delayed In Honolulu
synopsis: Ken (Ken Jeong) has an unexpected run-in with Dr. Oz when the Park family's flight home is delayed in Hawaii. Julie (Kate Simses) accidentally creates a backlog in the HMO's waiting room.

title: D.K. And The Dishwasher
synopsis: After Ken's dad arrives for an impromptu stay, he starts taking on chores that Ken hasn't gotten around to doing like buying a much needed new dishwasher, but then Ken purposefully breaks it.

title: Ken At The Concert
synopsis: As Ken (Ken Jeong) tries to hang onto his relationship with Molly (Krista Marie Yu), a birthday party accident sends Dave (Albert Tsai) to the doctor's office. Guest starring Emblem3.

title: Dave’s Valentine
synopsis: Ken (Ken Jeong) ruins things for Dave (Albert Tsai) when a longstanding feud with their egotistical neighbor upends Dave's plans for the school Valentine's Day dance.

title: Dicky Wexler’s Last Show
synopsis: Ken (Ken Jeong) and Julie (Kate Simses) disagree over allowing a critically ill stand-up comic (guest star George Wyner) to perform at a benefit show. Allison (Suzy Nakamura) has a crisis of confidence when she learns that her former patient is seeing a new therapist.

title: Ken’s An Expert Witness
synopsis: Ken (Ken Jeong) serves as an expert witness in a courtroom appearance that leaves many doubting his medical expertise. Dave (Albert Tsai) sews a prom dress for Molly (Krista Marie Yu).

title: Dave’s Sex Talk
synopsis: When Ken (Ken Jeong) avoids answering his questions about sex, Dave (Albert Tsai) turns to Julie (Kate Simses) for answers. Molly (Krista Marie Yu) gives Allison (Suzy Nakamura) a wardrobe makeover.

title: Korean Men’s Club
synopsis: To keep Ken (Ken Jeong) from meddling in her book club, Allison (Suzy Nakamura) convinces him to join a civic-minded Korean Men's Club. Molly (Krista Marie Yu) asks Dave (Albert Tsai) for advice on attracting a nerdy classmate.

title: Ken Tries Stand-up
synopsis: Seeing a college classmate at the Laugh Factory inspires Ken (Ken Jeong) to pursue his dream of being a stand-up comic. Dave (Albert Tsai) enlists Molly (Krista Marie Yu) to train him for a push-up contest with their grandfather, D.K. (guest star Dana Lee).

title: Allison’s Career Move
synopsis: Ken tries to keep Allison from accepting a job offer at the clinic - until he learns she doesn't want it anyway. As Dave conspires to keep their mom and dad from seeing Molly's SAT scores, Clark admits that he doesn't know what his boyfriend does for a living.

title: Ken And Allison Share A Patient
synopsis: Allison's first day at Welltopia starts off with a bang when she and Ken disagree on a diagnosis. Meanwhile, Damona introduces her new boyfriend, which inspires Pat to reveal that he's back in the dating pool.

title: Dr. Ken’s Banquet Snub
synopsis: Pat is asked to emcee the annual Welltopia banquet, much to Ken's surprise. Meanwhile, a girl next door stands outside the Park's kitchen window and stares at Dave, so Molly and D.K. try to shoo her away

title: Dr. Ken: Child Of Divorce
synopsis: Ken learns D.K. is divorced and starts to worry that the end is near for his own marriage. Meanwhile, Dave ponders his grandfather's situation and how it relates to his relationship with Emily.

title: D.K.’S Korean Ghost Story
synopsis: It's Halloween and Allison is worried that Dave's disinterest in trick-or-treating and their tradition of her scaring him suggests he's growing up too fast.

title: Ken Learns Korean
synopsis: After a card game with his dad's friends exposes his inability to speak Korean, Ken (Ken Jeong) joins Dave (Albert Tsai) at his language class. Clark (Jonathan Slavin) and Pat (Dave Foley) square off over a new nurses' contract.

title: Dave Goes On Shark Tank
