synopsis: After coming up with an invention he calls the Hot Legs Duvet, Dave is invited to present it on the reality TV show Shark Tank. Though excited by the prospect of his son being on national television, Ken worries that Dave is too fragile for the show's notoriously vicious judges.

title: Allison’s Thanksgiving Meltdown
synopsis: While Ken was hoping his parents' divorce would allow him to spend a quiet Thanksgiving at home, Allison has insisted they accept her family's invitation to dinner at their new place in Santa Barbara.

title: D.K.’S New Girlfriend
synopsis: When they unexpectedly get an afternoon off, Ken and Allison arrive at home and walk in on D.K. with his new girlfriend, Linda. After overhearing them talking about when he's going to leave, D.K. announces that he and Linda are moving in together.

title: Ken’s Apology
synopsis: Upon learning that he overlooked critical information in a patient's file, Ken decides he has to apologize. Getting wind of his plan, Pat insists that there are no "mistakes" at Welltopia and calls Mr. Hubert to issue a standard non-apology to avoid admission of guilt in case of a lawsuit.

title: A Park Family Christmas
synopsis: When Welltopia's holiday party is canceled, Allison looks to soften her "all-business" reputation by hosting it at home. Though Molly has plans to celebrate submitting her college applications on time, news that Pat has invited his friend who's Stanford's Dean of Admissions has her worried.

title: Ken’s New Intern
synopsis: After seeing Ken's new intern Erin fawning over him, Clark and Damona warn that she has a crush on him. When Ken points out how Erin is laughing at his jokes and flirtatiously touching his arm, Allison isn't jealous and tells him not to worry.

title: Jae Meets The Parks
synopsis: Ken couldn't be happier when Molly arranges for him and Allison to meet her new boyfriend over dinner. Told that Jae is a pre-med student and from a Korean family, Ken is certain that Molly has met the man she'll marry until Ken learns of his career choice.

title: A Dr. Ken Valentine’s Day
synopsis: For Valentine’s Day, all Allison wants is to stay home and watch television with Ken. While Ken is relieved to be off the hook, Dave has enlisted D.K. to help prepare a romantic dinner for his girlfriend Emily.

title: A Day In The Life
synopsis: For their documentary series American Healthcare, the Learning Network is coming to Welltopia to spend a day with Ken. While Pat insists that everyone be at their best for the filming, Ken is anxious to use the show to highlight his comedy act.

title: Ken And The Basketball Star
synopsis: When high school basketball star Danny Willis shows up to study with Molly, Ken can’t contain his excitement at having a local celebrity in the house.

title: Pat’s Rash
synopsis: After breaking out in a rash, Pat asks Ken to do something about it before he attends a banquet with his girlfriend Megan. So when Pat notes that he started breaking out shortly after they started dating and all the tests Ken ordered come back negative, Allison suggests he’s allergic to Megan.

title: Allison Finds A Lump
synopsis: Allison discovers a lump in her breast during a self-examination, which rallies the Welltopia gang to her side as she awaits her biopsy results. Meanwhile, Dave mulls his character's motivation in a school play; and Pat and Damona have an unexpected encounter.

title: Ken’s Professor
synopsis: Upon learning that his medical school professor Dr. Donald Erwin has scheduled an appointment, Ken tells Allison that he's worried about it. When Erwin shows up at the office and continues the harsh treatment he gave him as a resident, it's clear why Ken is concerned.

title: Pat And The Ceo
synopsis: Ken's friendship with the CEO of Welltopia prompts Pat to ask Ken to vouch for him regarding a promotion, but Ken is taken aback by what the boss actually has in store. Meanwhile, Clark thinks Damona and Pat have rekindled their relationship.

title: Clark’s Big Surprise
synopsis: After Allison has planned a Park family outing to see The Bodyguard Musical, Clark asks everyone at work to confirm their attendance at a vegan barbeque he and Connor are hosting on the same night.

title: Ken’s Big Audition
synopsis: On the heels of Molly's acceptance to Stanford, Ken gets some good news of his own when television producer Dan Harmon asks him to audition for a small part in a new show. Encouraged to seize the moment, Ken enlists Clark and Damona to help him prepare.

title: Exit 1 / First Words
synopsis: Mikado, a young man longing for something unusual in his life, moves to Ikebukuro at the invitation of his childhood friend Masaomi. Arriving in Tokyo, he begins his new life as a high school student, awed and mesmerized by the new world around him.

title: Highly Unpredictable
synopsis:
It is the Entrance Ceremony at Raira Academy, and the auditorium swells with a varied mix of emotions emitted from the students.
Amidst all this is Rio Kamichika: a girl with a notably dark vibe following her

title: Rampant Evil
synopsis: Masaomi Kida is out about town, fervently trying to pick up girls, while Mikado tags along, feeling a bit confused and bewildered. Various people intermingle throughout Ikebukuro as rumors of the “Dollars” spread.

title: Utterly Alone
synopsis: People throughout the city speak of an urban legend known as the “Headless Rider”. A number of people have witnessed it speeding down the streets on a jet-black motorbike. But does anyone know its true form? One man, Shinra, ponders this mystery.

title: False Advertising
synopsis: Mikado, Masaomi, and Anri all enjoy some after-school time, while elsewhere, magazine writer Shuji Niekawa makes little progress in his search to find “the Strongest in Ikebukuro.”

title: Active Interest
synopsis: An increasing number of people have gone missing in the districts of Ikebukuro and Shibuya. However, those missing are people that will not be missed, such as fugitives and illegal aliens. Who will have the nerve to stand up and save these people?

title: Bad-ass Dude
synopsis: Shizuo Heiwajima, also known as “the strongest man in Ikebukuro”, is a man who definitely relishes that title. But lately he has been extremely short-tempered and does not know why. He wanders throughout the city reflecting upon his past.

title: Ephemeral Dream
synopsis:
Celty, anxious and uneasy about being unable to find her head, gets into a quarrel with Shinra and runs away from home. 
Meanwhile, an exchange student named Shiri wanders the streets of Ikebukuro people “Hello! What are you looking for?”

title: Love and Cherish
synopsis: Yagiri Pharmaceutical’s executive director is unable to determine the whereabouts of her younger brother Seiji and contacts Izaya Orihara, the information broker. Seiji roams the streets of Ikebukuro together with a woman with a scar on her neck.

title: Never Before Seen
synopsis: Mikado runs into the girl with a scar, being chased by the Headless Rider, and succeeds in safely getting home with her. The next day, two individuals wait for him outside the school gates: the information broker Izaya and the Headless Rider.

title: Storm and Stress
synopsis: Anri’s missing friend, the Dullahan, the girl with the scar on her neck, Yagiri Pharmaceuticals, the kidnappings, and the Dollars…little by little, the pieces begin to fall into place.

title: Yin and Yang
synopsis: Seiji attacks Mikado for the return of the girl with the scar. In the midst of the fight, the girl reveals the truth, which shocks both Seiji and Celty. Seiji is seemingly paralyzed from the truth, while an infuriated Celty leaves the scene.

title: Takes a Sudden Turn
synopsis: Half a year has passed since the Dollars meeting and Ikebukuro seems to have returned to normal. But underground, the Yellow Scarves and the Slasher are becoming increasingly active. Darkness approaches, ready to destroy the days of peace.

title: Turmoil Reigns
synopsis: Anri is attacked by the Slasher. The same night, the user Saika appears in the chatroom, and posts a puzzling message. Mikado, worried about rumors that the Slashers are the Dollars, decides to cooperate with Celty.

title: A Stopped Clock is Right Twice a Day
synopsis: Magazine Journalist Shuji Niekawa’s unbridled passion is raging. A Russian who runs a sushi shop, the Awakusu organization, an Information Broker, the Headless Rider... He investigates the supposedly strongest man in Ikebukuro: Shizuo Heiwajima.

title: Mutual Love
synopsis: Anri is targeted by the Slasher, but Kyohei’s gang moves to rescue her. Shizuo and Celty join, and after defeating the Slasher, reveal his true identity. This moment of relief doesn’t last as Celty reads what has been posted in the chatroom.

title: Everything Changes
synopsis: As Anri faces off against Haruna, truths about her past are revealed. Elsewhere, Shizuo fights an unending battle against the Slashers in South Ikebukuro Park. As he defeats them one after another, his expression starts to take on a hint of joy.

title: Out of Your Control
synopsis: Civil unrest begins to descend upon Ikebukuro. Masaomi finds himself in an abandoned building, depressed, thinking about his past: how he ended up back there, and how a girl still waits for him at a hospital.

title: Anarchy
synopsis: Anri notices something is wrong with Masaomi, and takes action to find out what it is. A gang-war breaks out between the Yellow Scarves and the Dollars over the Slasher’s identity. The standoff grows as Mikado’s desire to stop it is ignored.

title: A New King Will Arise
synopsis: After doing some investigating, Masaomi starts to suspect that the remnants of the Blue Squares, a gang that he once fought, have slipped into the Dollars. He decides to visit Kyohei’s gang to learn the truth.

title: Everything Covered in Fog
synopsis: Despite Mikado’s orders, the Yellow Scarves hunt down members of the Dollars. Mikado begins to question whether the existence of the Dollars is worth the sacrifice. Anri tries to put a stop to the gang war, but ends up making the situation worse...

title: Declaration of Disbandment
synopsis: The Dollars are enraged at the Yellow Scarves’ actions. The Yellow Scarves learn that Anri is the girl who escaped from their hideout during the night of the meeting, and track her down. However, an unexpected group of people steps in to save her...

title: Complicated and Confused
synopsis: A gunshot resounds from an alley, echoed by a phone call for Masaomi. Mikado rides with Celty, and Anri learns the truth. Their hearts are filled with trust, doubt, and unease. Everything rushes toward a conclusion, and Izaya enjoys the chaos.

title: Selfless Devotion
synopsis: Filled with unwavering determination, Masaomi enters the abandoned factory, and encounters the unexpected. At last: Masaomi, Mikado, and Anri face off. Although each of them carries inexpressible feelings, they eventually find an answer...

title: Pilot
synopsis: Lawyers Peter Bash and Jared Franklin join Stanton Infeld at his corporate law firm. While representing a prostitute who claims that she and her "client" were actually in a relationship, the brash attorneys defend a heroic airline pilot from being undermined by a scheming company executive.

title: Bro-Bono
synopsis: Peter represents Jared's old frenemy in a legal dilemma. With things never what they seem to be, the guys begin to see their client a different way. Jared is also asked to run lead on a divorce case when it becomes clear Karp and Hanna's history prevents them from working together

title: She Came Upstairs to Kill Me
synopsis: Infeld enlists Peter and Jared to help defend Isabella Kaplowitz against charges that she used sex to kill her billionaire husband. But when their attempt to disqualify the judge for wagering on the case fall flat, Franklin and Bash enlist the billionaire’s best friend to prove Isabella's innocence.

title: Jennifer of Troy
synopsis: Franklin & Bash's lawsuit on behalf of a woman who claims she was fired for being too sexy, is complicated when they discover that she is quite plain. Meanwhile, Infeld appeals to a powerful Chinatown business council to salvage the reputation of Peter and Jared's irreplaceable computer maven.

title: You Can’t Take It With You
synopsis: Jared and his dad go head to head when a feuding family ends up in a lawsuit over a collectible baseball. Peter defends a reality star.

title: Franklin vs. Bash
synopsis: When they take the case of pole-dancing instructors accused of stealing, Peter and Jared find their friendship tested.

title: The Bangover
synopsis: A judge puts Peter and Jared on 72-hour house arrest. Carmen is put in legal jeopardy when her ex-con boyfriend shows up.

title: Big Fish
synopsis: An unethical and terminally ill CEO puts Jared and Peter on retainer.

title: Bachelor Party
synopsis: Peter reluctantly helps Janie's fiance with a legal problem. Jared helps a teacher from his old high school who's accused of seducing a student.

title: Go Tell It On the Mountain
synopsis: Stanton selects Peter and Jared to defend him against a murder charge but they must work with a lawyer from the New York office. Hannah takes the case of a wrestler being dumped because of his age.

title: Strange Brew
synopsis: Peter (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) and Jared (Breckin Meyer) are sent to land a new client whose ruthless business practices have them wondering if they are working on the right side of the law.

title: Viper
synopsis: Franklin and Bash defend a college campus cop who moonlights as a crime fighting superhero. And as Peter’s mom (guest star Jane Seymour) looks for help in backing out of a contract to sell her house, a reunion with a college classmate forces Pindar (Kumail Nanjiani) to confront his many phobias.

title: Jango And Rossi
synopsis: Peter and Jared run into the B-list version of themselves (Seth Green and Eric Mabius) while defending one of Infeld's ex-wives, who has been accused of kidnapping a client's dog. Meanwhile, Karp is left to work with Pindar on a robbery case, but Pindar's quirks threaten to derail the partnership.

title: For Those About To Rock
synopsis: Jared is ordered to serve as a small claims court judge for an outstanding contempt of court citation. When he makes a regrettable ruling that disturbs the local rock-'n'-roll community, he once again finds himself going head to head against his father (Beau Bridges) in the courtroom.

title: L’Affaire Du Coeur
synopsis: As Franklin (Breckin Meyer) and Bash (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) defend a judge (guest star Don McManus) accused of having an improper relationship with a prosecutor, Karp (Reed Diamond) is enlisted to help a college roommate prove he’s gay.

title: Voir Dire
synopsis: Franklin and Bash (Breckin Meyer and Mark-Paul Gosselaar) defend a chop shop owner accused of assault, but their efforts are undermined by his ever-shifting alibi.

title: Summer Girls
synopsis: As Franklin and Bash (Breckin Meyer and Mark-Paul Gosselaar) defend a pair of female sailors whose Navy careers are in danger following their arrest in a barroom brawl, Karp’s (Reed Diamond) budding romance with a summer associate jeopardizes the new lawyer’s future at the firm.

title: Last Dance
synopsis: A widow enlists Franklin and Bash (Breckin Meyer and Mark-Paul Gosselaar) as she squares off with her late husband’s dance instructor girlfriend over how his preserved corpse will be displayed. Meanwhile, Infeld (Malcolm McDowell) worries that an unhappy ex-con and former client is stalking him.

title: Waiting On A Friend
synopsis: A fugitive client’s accusation that they paid her to flee to avoid losing a criminal trial leaves Jared (Breckin Meyer) and Peter (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) facing both a misconduct charge and a senior partner’s vendetta to drive them out of the firm.

title: 6:50 To Slc
synopsis: As Jared’s dad Leonard (Beau Bridges) looks to buy the firm and shut down the L.A. office, an old friend of Peter’s (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) wants to get out of the governor’s race in order to keep a sex scandal from becoming public.

title: Coffee And Cream
synopsis: As they are forced to accept a new boss (Heather Locklear), Peter (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) and Jared (Breckin Meyer) represent a popular Las Vegas magician charged with a robbery that he blames on his estranged twin brother (guest star Adam Goldberg).

title: Dead And Alive
synopsis: Franklin (Breckin Meyer) and Bash (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) help a Vietnam vet fight the loss of his pension benefits and his home after a government bureaucrat’s clerical error declares him dead.

title: By The Numbers
synopsis: Peter and Jared represent a brilliant actuary who buys a dying woman’s life insurance policy for pennies on the dollar and then is accused of her murder. Damien and Infeld work with a Venice Beach beekeeper, and Peter makes headway with Charlie, but is surprised to learn she has a daughter.

title: Captain Johnny
synopsis: As Peter (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) and Jared (Breckin Meyer) represent a lone fisherman against a big competitor looking to drive him out of business, Rachel (Heather Locklear) and Karp (Reed Diamond) go to court to protect a financial adviser from getting fired because she’s psychic.

title: Good Lovin’
synopsis: When Peter’s (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) mom is arrested for prostitution, her defense lands Jared (Breckin Meyer) in bed with a longtime nemesis in the DA’s office. Guest starring Jane Seymour and Buck Henry.

title: Freck
synopsis: Franklin (Breckin Meyer) and Bash (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) represent a friend who claims that the murder charges against him are part of an outrageous practical joke. Karp (Reed Diamond) sues on behalf of some ex-gang members whose bakery business is being threatened by a major grocery store chain.

title: Control
synopsis: As Peter (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) and Jared (Breckin Meyer) help a minor league baseball pitcher fight back against a vicious heckler, Rachel (Heather Locklear) reluctantly represents her brother in a case against a large agricultural company.

title: Out Of The Blue
synopsis: Peter (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) and Jared (Breckin Meyer) take on a client who is fighting to control a valuable meteor that landed in his office. Karp (Reed Diamond) is accused of murdering the judge he wants to replace.

title: Shoot To Thrill
synopsis: As they fight Rachel’s (Heather Locklear) efforts to drive them out of the firm, Franklin (Breckin Meyer) and Bash (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) help an ex-cop-turned-bounty-hunter whose job is threatened after a bail jumper accuses him of assault.

title: Gone In A Flash
synopsis: A celebrity neighbor’s lawsuit inadvertently exposes Franklin (Breckin Meyer) and Bash (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) to charges of insurance fraud.

title: The Curse Of Hor-Aha
synopsis: As Peter (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) and Jared (Breckin Meyer) try to recover an archeologist's valuable - and cursed - Egyptian artifact, new partner Ellen Swatello (Rhea Seehorn) fights a day care center that's seeking to shut down her client's marijuana dispensary.

title: Kershaw V. Lincecum
synopsis: A divorce case reveals a plastic surgeon's strange obsession with his past. Franklin (Breckin Meyer) and Bash (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) rely on an unusual argument to help Infeld (Malcolm McDowell) get his law license reinstated.

title: Love Is The Drug
synopsis: As Franklin (Breckin Meyer) and Bash (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) represent a car service driver accused of stealing his celebrity passengers' handbags, an old grudge threatens Infeld (Malcolm MacDowell) as he attempts to return to work.

title: Good Cop/Bad Cop
synopsis: Peter (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) and Jared (Breckin Meyer) take on a wealthy Malibu resident whose legal maneuvers are targeting a longtime neighbor's beachfront property. Infeld (Malcolm McDowell) and Karp (Reed Diamond) go to war over a lucrative client.

title: Deep Throat
synopsis: Peter (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) looks to win over an old flame by representing her son, a high school journalist whose reporting has jeopardized his college scholarship. Jared (Breckin Meyer) tries to play it cool but ends up undermining his workplace romance with Swatello (Rhea Seehorn).

title: Dance The Night Away
synopsis: Colleen Bash asks Peter and Jared to represent a stripper who was injured while pole dancing. Infeld (Malcolm McDowell) plots to rehire Karp, while accepting a royal title puts Jared in the middle of a long-running property dispute.

title: Honor Thy Mother
synopsis: As Jared (Breckin Meyer) struggles with telling Peter (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) that he slept with Peter's mom, they fight to keep a beloved family-owned diner from being torn down by a big restaurant chain. The guys look to expose Pindy (Kumail Nanjiani) for having a make-believe fiance.

title: Falcon’s Nest
synopsis: As Peter (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) and Jared (Breckin Meyer) fight a friend's eviction from his late grandmother's retirement community, Anita (Toni Trucks) and Karp (Reed Diamond) square off over strategy in a lawsuit against an airline whose flight cancellation cost a scientist a million-dollar prize.

title: Spirits In The Material World
synopsis: The case of a couple who were tricked into buying a haunted hotel forces Peter (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) to face his fear of ghosts. Anita (Toni Trucks) squares off against an old law school rival in a retrial of their disputed moot court case.

title: Red Or Black
synopsis: As they head to Las Vegas to save Infeld (Malcolm McDowell) from dying, Peter (Mark-Paul Gosselaar) and Jared (Breckin Meyer) face a casino's accusations of cheating. Karp (Reed Diamond) and Anita (Toni Trucks) face a hurdle in their romance when they represent opposing clients in a lawsuit.

title: The Shins, Aimee Mann and Father John Misty - Pt. 1
synopsis: Part 1 of exclusive live performances of The Shins, Aimee, James Mercer and Ex Fleet Foxer Josh Tillman with his new band Father John Misty.

title: The Shins, Aimee Mann and Father John Misty - Pt.2
synopsis: Part 2 of exclusive live performances of The Shins, Aimee, James Mercer and Ex Fleet Foxer Josh Tillman with his new band Father John Misty.

title: Feist & The Happiness Project - Pt. 1
synopsis: Part 1: Shot in 3D in Hollywood   Feist plays tracks from her 2004 release Let It Die and from 2011‘s Metals. Feist‘s multi instrumentalist Charles Spearin also brings his Happiness Project into the studio for a heart warming rendition of Vanessa.

title: Feist & The Happiness Project - Pt. 2
synopsis: Part 2: Shot in 3D in Hollywood   Feist plays tracks from her 2004 release Let It Die and from 2011‘s Metals. Feist‘s multi instrumentalist Charles Spearin also brings his Happiness Project into the studio for a heart warming rendition of Vanessa.

title: Foster The People & Shearwater - Pt. 1
synopsis: Shot in 3D in Hollywood,  Foster The People play tracks from Torches including Pumped up Kicks, Miss You and Houdini. Shearwater play Breaking The Yearlings and Pushing The River  from their 2012 release Animal Joy

title: Foster The People & Shearwater - Pt. 2
synopsis: Shot in 3D in Hollywood,  Foster The People play tracks from Torches including Pumped up Kicks, Miss You and Houdini. Shearwater play Breaking The Yearlings and Pushing The River  from their 2012 release Animal Joy

title: Moby, Willis Earl Beal and Delta Spirit - Pt. 1
synopsis: Shot in 3D  Moby, Willis Earl Beal and Delta Spirit perform exclusive live tracks for FTB. Moby performs acoustic classics including Porcelain and We Are All Made of Stars whilst Willis plays tracks from his debut Principles of a Protagonist and Delta Sprit from their self titled release.

title: Moby, Willis Earl Beal and Delta Spirit - Pt. 2
synopsis: Shot in 3D  Moby, Willis Earl Beal and Delta Spirit perform exclusive live tracks for FTB. Moby performs acoustic classics including Porcelain and We Are All Made of Stars whilst Willis plays tracks from his debut Principles of a Protagonist and Delta Spirit from their self titled release.

title: Red Hot Chili Peppers - Pt.1
synopsis: Part 1:  Red Hot Chili Peppers perform exclusive live tracks for FTB from their recent I‘m With You release

title: Red Hot Chili Peppers - Pt.2
synopsis: Part 2: Red Hot Chili Peppers perform exclusive live tracks for FTB from their recent I‘m With You release

title: The Scissor Sisters,Thundercat - Pt. 1
synopsis:
Part 1: Scissor Sisters perform exclusive live tracks for FTB including hits
Invisible Light and Don‘t Feel Like Dancing and LA pioneers Thundercat perform Daylight and Lotus and the Jondy.

title: The Scissor Sisters,Thundercat - Pt. 2
synopsis:
Part 2: Scissor Sisters perform exclusive live tracks for FTB including hits
Invisible Light and Don‘t Feel Like Dancing and LA pioneers Thundercat perform Daylight and Lotus and the Jondy.

title: Bonus Tracks: Moby & Father John Misty
synopsis: Exclusive live performances of Moby and Father John Misty not originally included in the episodes.

title: Behind the Scenes: Moby
synopsis: An exclusive interview with music legend Moby during his From the Basement performance.

title: Tonight, the Spirits Will Be Resurrected! Amanojaku
synopsis: Moving to a new town is tough on kids. Nothing is familiar  and with no friends  it can be scary. In Satsuki‘s case  that last part isn‘t helped any when she  her little brother  and three kids from school end up in the old schoolhouse  which just so happens to be haunted by ghosts.

title: A Hand Reaches Out of the Toilet... Akagami Aogami
synopsis: Something is stinking up the town  and it isn‘t just urban reconstruction. A ghost has invaded the school‘s bathrooms  and it‘s up to Satsuki and the gang to find out how to put it back to sleep. The old book left by Satsuki‘s mom just might be the ticket.

title: Raise the Curtain!! Cursed School Arts Festival Kutabe!!
synopsis: The big play is coming up, but the boy in the lead role is scared. He makes a wish for the gymnasium to catch fire--and it does. Then, when the play moves to being held in the old schoolhouse, the boy wishes to be injured--and he is.

title: Requiem from the Dead - Elise
synopsis: While in the old schoolhouse  Satsuki hears a haunting melody drifting through the halls. The only trouble is the lack of a pianist. It seems that if Satsuki hears the melody a total of four times  she‘ll die. The gang saddles up to put the ghostly piano to sleep.

title: The Bloody Sports Festival - Datto!!
synopsis: The gang helps Keiichiro train for a sports festival at school. A mysterious boy shows up at the track  running alongside Keiichiro. Despite the bonding between the two  it seems the new boy isn‘t quite alive--and he‘s got a penchant for cutting off the feet of those who run.

title: The Demon‘s Hand Splits the Door - Night of Tragedy
synopsis: Stories spread about something preying on children who are all alone, and the gang gets scared. Especially since their parents will be out for the night. A deadly ghost with a sickle in hand stalks Satsuki and her friends. Can the gang survive the night?

title: The Soul-Stealing Mirror!! Utsushimi
synopsis: People all over town begin acting strangely  but it isn‘t their fault  as most of them have been replaced by mirror clones of themselves. With Satsuki and Hajime the last two people in the town who haven‘t been swapped  they have to find a way to end this ghost  before they end up in the mirror.

title: The Circuit Connects to Hell - Demon of the Underworld
synopsis: Leo is convinced that there‘s a ghostly website out there on the internet  and is determined to find it. Unfortunately for him... he does. Trapped in the computer  the rest of the gang needs to figure out how to apply old fashioned exorcism to new technologies.

title: The Corpse that Roams in the Night – Shirotabi
synopsis: There‘s a girl in Satsuki‘s class who is a little off. She tends to the rabbits at the school  whom she says are her only friends. But if that‘s weird  then it gets only stranger when a dead rabbit shows back up at the pen  alive and well.

title: The Tunnel with No Exit - Anamaneki
synopsis: Hajime has a close encounter with a spooky cab  which the rest of the gang doesn‘t believe. Even when they see it for themselves  it seems like a perfectly normal cab... that is  until the cab driver takes them to a life-draining tunnel.

title: The Talking Merry Doll!! Shadow of Terror
synopsis: The gang finds a strange doll in the trash. Satsuki prevents Keiichiro from bringing the doll home, but it shows up regardless. And then, late at night, Satsuki gets a phone call from none other than the doll herself. With the doll stalking her relentlessly, how will she ever be rid of it?

title: The Nurse Who Tells Your Death - Mother‘s Feelings
synopsis: A strange nurse haunts Keiichiro, which triggers memories of the past. Not just for Satsuki and Keiichiro, who remember the death of their mother, but for Momoko as well, who happened to meet their mother just before she passed away.

title: The Picture that Swallows People - Da Vinci
synopsis: A ghostly painter with the ability to trap souls within his work has reawakened, and not even the other ghosts of the old schoolhouse want anything to do with him. Satsuki and the gang travel back in time in order to put the artist back to sleep, where they meet someone familiar.

title: The Life-Taking Psychic Photo - Railway Crossing of Evil
synopsis: Convinced that a ghost is haunting a train crossing  Leo takes the gang out to try and catch the spirit in a photo. When one of those photos shows a strange hand on Momoko‘s shoulder  things start getting bad  and a tale of revenge unfolds.

title: The Devil‘s Spell - Rite of Darkness
synopsis: Satsuki falls in with a bad crowd  or it might be better to say coven. Several girls at her school conspire to cast spells together and she reluctantly joins in. But when one of them goes missing  and no one seems to remember the girl‘s very existence  Satsuki knows this isn‘t just any ordinary fad.

title: The Apartment That Eats People! Nest of Evil Spirits
synopsis: Following an accident on the job  Satsuki‘s father is injured  but Leo thinks ghosts are behind it. When the gang investigates the building Satsuki‘s father worked at  they find that the building itself is alive  and eager to have guests stay... for all eternity.

title: Terror at Bloodstain Lake!! Apparition in the Snow
synopsis: The gang takes a trip to the mountains to stay at a resort run by Satsuki‘s cousin Miyuki. However  upon arrival  a young girl tells them that Miyuki is dead. It seems that her ghost still haunts the frozen lake  turning it blood red. But this story might not be as simple as it seems...

title: Akane-san of the Broadcasting Room!! Voice of the Dead
synopsis: Satsuki is asked to perform the after school broadcast in the wake of the previous announcers having fallen ill under mysterious circumstances. The only problem is, it seems the ghost of a deceased broadcast club member has invaded the system, intent on killing anyone that might upstage her.

title: The Headless Horsemen!! Curse of Death
synopsis: A headless rider terrorizes the town on the anniversary of what was his death, seeking to decapitate people like himself. When the ghost turns his headlights upon Satsuki, the gang needs to find a way to put him to sleep again, and quick.

title: Farewell, Amanojaku - The Descent of Ohma
synopsis: The entire school is possessed and drawn into the old schoolhouse  all to lure Satsuki and the gang into a trap. Lord Ohma has awoken  and seeks vengence upon Satsuki for her family‘s past attempts to seal him. In this final confrontation  who will emerge?

title: Pilot
synopsis: Meet two brothers. One's a lawyer. The other plays one on TV.

title: A Hero Has Fallen
synopsis: It's a classic case of sibling rivalry.

title: The Curious Disappearance of Mr. Donovan
synopsis: Dean suspects there's a mole at the firm.

title: Little Mitchard No More
synopsis: The Dean Effect hits Boise.

title: Une Mouture Amer (a Bittersweet Grind)
synopsis: Love is in the air.

title: Dedicating This One to the Crew
synopsis: It's Ethan's time to shine.

title: Buckingham Malice
synopsis: The Sandersons take the road to normal.

title: Giving Thanks, Getting Justice
synopsis: Giving Thanks, Getting Justice

title: Grinder Rests in Peace
synopsis: It's another case of sibling rivalry.

title: The Olyphant in the Room
synopsis: THE GRINDER follows a famous TV lawyer who is going from show business...to the family business. After his hit series, "The Grinder," is canceled, he moves back home and joins his brother at their family's real-life law firm.

title: Exodus
synopsis: The Grinder has got to go.

title: Blood Is Thicker Than Justice
synopsis: The Grinder is missed.

title: Grinder V. Grinder
synopsis: There are two Grinders in Boise.

title: The Retooling of Dean Sanderson
synopsis: Grinder must come down to earth.

title: The Ties That Grind
synopsis: The Grinder reflects.

title: Delusions of Grinder
synopsis: Stewart takes matters into his own hands.

title: From the Ashes
synopsis: It's never been a better time to grind.

title: Genesis
synopsis: It's throwback Tuesday.

title: A System On Trial
synopsis: The Grinder takes it to the people.

title: for the people
synopsis: Meet the mom.

title: Divergence
synopsis: Dean and Stewart are back at the grind.

title: Full Circle
synopsis: It all comes full circle...or does it?

title: Blax, Snake, Home
synopsis: Penny buys a condo and vows to turn her life around; Jane talks Dave and Alex into finally being honest with each other.

title: Baby Steps
synopsis: Alex's new T-shirts intended for children end up being a hit with with teenagers; Jane searches for the child she believes was conceived from an egg she donated years ago.

title: Yesandwitch
synopsis: When her mother Dana (guest star Megan Mullally) comes for a visit, Penny (Casey Wilson) worries that her positivity borders on delusion. Meanwhile, Jane (Eliza Coupe) and Brad (Damon Wayans Jr.) help Max’s (Adam Pally) limo tour business with skills they picked up in couples’ improv class.

title: Secrets and Limos
synopsis: Brad is afraid to tell his boss that he always has food on his face. Dave worries about how the gang will treat his girlfriend. Jane tries to make Penny's vision board come true.

title: Spooky Endings
synopsis: While the rest of the gang goes to a Halloween costume party, Brad and Jane are stuck house sitting in the suburbs. Alex's sexy Marylin Monroe costume attracts a guy who thinks she's in drag. Penny and Max's couple costume complicates both their romantic efforts.

title: Lying Around
synopsis: Brad lies and says he has to leave town on a business trip so he doesn't have to be around Jane's sorority sister. Dave lets Max shoot a commercial for his food truck. Penny keeps changing her mind about which guy she likes.

title: Full Court Dress
synopsis: Brad (Damon Wayans, Jr.) and Dave (Zachary Knighton) become entangled in a friendship with Brad’s crazy mailman Drew (guest star Rob Riggle), while Alex (Elisha Cuthbert) struggles to design a dress for Jane. Meanwhile, Penny competes with Max (Adam Pally) for the affections of his niece and nephew.

title: The Code War
synopsis: Max (Adam Pally) declares war when his old high school girlfriend Angie (guest star Riki Lindhome) starts dating Dave (Zachary Knighton). Meanwhile, jealousy over Brad’s (Damon Wayans Jr.) friendship with a flirtatious co-worker prompts Jane (Eliza Coupe) to look for a “work spouse” of her own.

title: Grinches Be Crazy
synopsis: After arguing with Brad (Damon Wayans, Jr.) about an appropriate holiday tip for their housekeeper, Jane (Eliza Coupe) accidentally gives her the money they had been saving for their Christmas vacation.

title: You Snooze, You Bruise
synopsis: Dave (Zachary Knighton) stands up to a bully at the gym, while Brad (Damon Wayans, Jr.) realizes how much their Homeowners Association depends on his wife’s aggressive management style when Jane (Eliza Coupe) finally learns to relax. Guest starring Bobby Moynihan.

title: The Shrink, The Dare, Her Date And Her Brother
synopsis: Dave has a surprising reaction when his shrink (Ken Marino) starts dating Penny; Max and Jane's fight over a sweater leads to a strange competition; Alex and Brad bond when they discover a shared interest.

title: Makin’ Changes!
synopsis: Penny (Casey Wilson) tries to change a guy to better suit her tastes, while Brad (Damon Wayans, Jr.) rebels against Jane’s (Eliza Coupe) influence on his life. Meanwhile, Max (Adam Pally) and Alex (Elisha Cuthbert) accuse Dave (Zachary Knighton) of being addicted to V-neck shirts.

title: St. Valentine’s Day Maxssacre
synopsis: As Penny decides she wants to dump her new boyfriend, Dave worries his girlfriend is going to break up with him; Alex seeks out a party in a questionable part of town; Max has an encounter with an ex-boyfriend (James Wolk).

title: Meat The Parrots
synopsis: Dave's father (Michael McKean) comes to town with his new girlfriend -- Penny's mother (Megan Mullally).

title: Everybody Loves Grant
synopsis: Max (Adam Pally) begs his friends to be nice to his new boyfriend, Grant (guest star James Wolk), but is taken aback when the gang becomes obsessed with him. Meanwhile, Dave (Zachary Knighton) struggles to prove that he is the “cool guy” of the group.

title: The Butterfly Effect Effect
synopsis: As winter drags on, Penny (Casey Wilson) and Dave (Zachary Knighton) eagerly await Jane (Eliza Coupe) and Brad’s (Damon Wayans, Jr.) annual fight that signals the arrival of spring. But when they try to provoke their friends into initiating their “Spring Smackdown,” things don’t go as planned.

title: Cocktails & Dreams
synopsis: After Dave (Zachary Knighton) turns his food truck into a popular mobile speakeasy, Brad (Damon Wayans, Jr.), Jane (Eliza Coupe) and Penny (Casey Wilson) all begin having sex dreams about him.

title: The Kerkovich Way
synopsis: After sleeping with Dave (Zachary Knighton), Alex (Elisha Cuthbert) enlists Jane (Eliza Coupe) in an effort to convince him that it never happened. Meanwhile, Penny (Casey Wilson) pushes Max (Adam Pally) to enter a scavenger hunt even though he is still depressed about his recent break-up.

title: Party Of Six
synopsis: Hoping to break Penny’s (Casey Wilson) birthday curse, the gang struggles to pick the perfect restaurant for the celebration. But every time they settle on a place to eat, relationship mistakes from their pasts force them to reconsider.

title: Big White Lies
synopsis: Things spiral out of control after Penny tells a white lie to avoid an irritating childhood friend; Dave and Max's lonely and jealous landlord (Ben Falcone) falls for Alex.

title: Kickball 2: The Kickening
synopsis: When Alex (Elisha Cuthbert) convinces her friends to join her store’s kickball team, Dave (Zachary Knighton) must face his traumatic memory of accidentally kicking a ball at Penny’s face. Meanwhile, the ruthlessly competitive Jane joins a competing team in order to have a better shot at winning.

title: Four Weddings And A Funeral (Minus Three Weddings And One Funeral)
synopsis: As the gang attends the wedding of two of their gay friends, Brad (Damon Wayans, Jr.) struggles to tell Jane (Eliza Coupe) that he lost his job. Meanwhile, Max (Adam Pally) balks at reuniting with his Madonna cover band and Penny (Casey Wilson) flirts over Skype at the reception.

title: Pilot
synopsis: A teenage patient's suicide magnifies a psychiatrist's career crisis.

title: Assault And Pepper
synopsis: Huff turns to Russell for help when a teenage patient's suicide triggers a lawsuit by his parents and an investigation by the medical board.

title: Lipstick On Your Panties
synopsis: As he prepares to be sued for a patient's suicide, Huff must decide what to do about Byrd's awaking sexuality.

title: Control
synopsis: Huff prepares for the deposition following a teenage patient's suicide, while Beth and Izzy square off over their conflicting morning routines.

title: Flashpants
synopsis: As Russell tries getting a drug-addicted client into rehab, Huff is asked to help facilitate his parents' divorce.

title: Is She Dead!
synopsis: As Izzy threatens to move back home, Teddy, wanders away from the mental hospital where he lives.

title: That Fucking Cabin
synopsis: A trip to his father's dilapidated mountain cabin brings up some painful childhood memories for Huff.

title: Cold Day In Shanghai
synopsis: As Beth wrestles with the news of her mother's cancer, Izzy seeks Russell's advice on granting Ben a divorce.

title: Christmas Is Ruined
synopsis: A holiday visit by her family has Beth worried about how she will handle her mom's illness.

title: The Good Doctor
synopsis: What starts out as an innocent lunch with a flirtatious drug company sales rep leaves Huff feeling guilty.

title: The Sample Closet
synopsis: Already wrestling with his own infidelity, Huff suspects Beth and a handsome client of having an affair.

title: All The King’s Horses
synopsis: Following his outburst at the party, Beth learns that Huff's suspicions may have been warranted after all.

title: Crazy Nuts & All Fucked Up
synopsis: While another late night attack lands Huff's psychotic ex-patient, Melody, in the hospital, the prospect of fatherhood forces Russell to face his own sordid past.

title: Maps Don’t Talk (Part 1)
synopsis: Amid the ongoing tensions with Beth, Izzy's drinking, and his mother-in-law's impending death from cancer, Huff looks to find his missing brother and deal with the outcome of his argument with his best friend, Russell.

title: Maps Don’t Talk (Part 2)
synopsis: A mission to Mexico to rescue Teddy forces Huff enlist Russell's help.

title: Whipped Doggie
synopsis: As Huff and Teddy negotiate some ground rules governing his care, Beth is in for a shock as she prepares for her mother's death.

title: Sweet Release
synopsis: As Huff takes drastic measures to right his sinking marriage, Russell realizes that he's fallen in love with his new client, Dauri Rathburn.

title: Used, Abused And Unenthused
synopsis: As Beth and Huff become frustrated with life, Russell's drug use threatens to cause problems at the office.

title: Red Meat
synopsis: As Russell struggles to stay on top of a wrongful death lawsuit, and Beth looks for comfort in a prayer meeting, Huff is surprised by the arrival of his father, Ben.

title: So...What Brings You To Armageddon
synopsis: As the arrival of Huff's dad exposes their family's troubled history, Russell's drug use catches up with him.

title: A Cornfield Grows In L.A.
synopsis: While Huff seeks out Lena for a drug therapy session, and Beth looks for relief from her problems in an evening out with an old friend, Russell manages to pull himself together before landing on Kelly's doorstep.

title: Radio Silence
synopsis: Huff struggles with how to handle his deteriorating marriage, while Ben's plan to reunite with Izzy is undermined by a soured business deal.

title: Bethless
synopsis: As Huff stands his ground and moves out, only to find that there's little support for his decision, Teddy is faced with having to tell Alyssa the truth about his condition.

title: Tapping The Squid
synopsis: As living with Russell has Huff spiraling downward, Beth is expanding her own horizons back at home.

title: Black Shadows
synopsis: As Russell narrowly avoids landing in jail, things between him and Huff continue to deteriorate.

title: Which Lip Is The Cervical Lip
synopsis: As Pepper's overdose death lands Russell in jail and costs him his job, Huff learns that it won't be easy to go back home again.

title: Captain Magnificent
synopsis: When it comes to superpowers he’s the all-star: invincible, super strong, handsome.  Yes, the Captain and his feats of wonder are so “magnificent” that he’s come to find the only thing worthy of his attention is to expose his real self to the public.

title: Sidecar
synopsis: Sidecar is The Dark Kodiak’s adopted ward and sidekick, and he’s sick of it. He feels he is ready to break out on his own. The problem is Kodiak won’t let him leave, and the result are some serious daddy issues and one pissed off sidekick.

title: K9
synopsis: K-9 is "Hero of the Year."  But, is he getting special treatment because he is blind?  Has he stopped as many crimes as he thinks? Does he really look good in his costume? Did he punch a bank robber yesterday, or was that just a mailbox?

title: The Dark Kodiak
synopsis: Billionaire by day - vigilante by night. He‘s a martial arts expert  got expensive gadgets  speaks 15 languages  and yet... has no actual powers. Which is why he hates the other supers whom he considers a bunch of whining babies.

title: The Nothing
synopsis: He’s invisible. All the time. This could be a helpful tool in fighting crime, but when no one can see you, and you really never have to be held responsible for your actions, you get a bit of a power trip. You also get all kinds of perverted.

title: The Incredible Flame
synopsis: The Incredible Flame is constantly ablaze, and turns out it’s a living hell. No friends. No clothes. No sex. ‘Cause seriously…that would hurt... like a lot. All of this results in one messed up hero.

title: Pilot
synopsis: Joey moves to Hollywood and reunites with his older sister.

title: Joey And The Student
synopsis: Michael moves into Joey's apartment and learns about women.

title: Joey And The Party
synopsis: Joey and Michael host a party, and Michael needs a date.

title: Joey And The Book Club
synopsis: Joey joins Michael's book club in order to meet women.

title: Joey And The Perfect Storm
synopsis: As an understudy, Joey must be in several places at once.

title: Joey And The Nemesis
synopsis: Joey meets his acting nemesis. Gina cares for sick Michael.

title: Joey And The Husband
synopsis: Gina wants to open a salon. Alex's husband returns home.

title: Joey And The Dream Girl, Pt. 1
synopsis: Joey's dream girl visits and reveals that she is divorced.

title: Joey And The Dream Girl, Pt. 2
synopsis: Donna is conflicted when ex-husband wants to reconcile.

title: Joey And The Big Audition
synopsis: Joey auditions to play the father of a sexy young woman.

title: Joey And The Roadtrip
synopsis: Joey is a celebrity judge for a Las Vegas beauty pageant.

title: Joey And The Plot Twist
synopsis: The clan tries to re-create a perfect East Coast Christmas.

title: Joey And The Taste Test
synopsis: Joey refuses to stop dating his fellow star.

title: Joey And The Premiere
synopsis: Joey must choose one person to attend his premiere party.

title: Joey And The Assistant
synopsis: Joey interviews candidates to be his personal assistant.

title: Joey And The Tonight Show
synopsis: Joey is asked to appear on "The Tonight Show with Jay Leno."

title: Joey And The Valentine's Date
synopsis: Joey makes a date with a journalist on Valentine's Day.

title: Joey And The Wrong Name
synopsis: Joey presents an award at the Daytime Soap Awards.

title: Joey And The Fancy Sister
synopsis: Joey and Gina's wealthy and snobby sister visits.

title: Joey And The Neighbor
synopsis: Joey is attracted to his new female neighbor, Sara.

title: Joey And The Spying
synopsis: Joey witnesses Alex's husband kissing another woman.

title: Joey And The Temptation
synopsis: Joey struggles through a love scene with CARMEN ELECTRA.

title: Joey And The Breakuo
synopsis: When Sara says she loves him, Joey doesn't respond.

title: Joey And The Moving In
synopsis: Joey and Sara may live together. Alex realizes her feelings.

title: The Withholder
synopsis: Elliott promises to get revenge after Finch is taken advantage of by a woman.

title: Steamed
synopsis: Jack tricks Maya into getting a neighbor to move so he can build a steam room at work.

title: What The Teddy Bear Saw
synopsis: Finch tries to hijack a surveillance videotape of him and Jack's nanny in a compromising position.

title: The Mask
synopsis: Finch is convinced that Nina has an imaginary alter ego while Maya discovers how Jack deceived her on Halloween many years ago.

title: Two Girls For Every Boy
synopsis: Finch conspires to set Maya up on a date with another woman.

title: Puppetmaster
synopsis: Maya is convinced that her new boyfriend is sending her messages by way of the puppets that he uses on his children's television show.

title: Funny Girl
synopsis: Finch challenges Maya to play a good practical joke.

title: How Nina Got Her Groove Back
synopsis: Nina is despondent at the retirement of a longtime rival; Jack's desire to gain fame by naming a park after himself backfires.

title: The List
synopsis: Jack is upset when he's bumped from a list of the most influential New Yorkers, and actor Mark Hamill stalks Finch.

title: How The Finch Stole Christmas
synopsis: Finch seeks revenge for a measly Christmas gift.

title: Nina Sees Red - Part I
synopsis: Following his divorce, Finch's dad starts dating Nina.

title: Nina Sees Red - Part II
synopsis: Finch tries coming to grips with his dad's engagement to Nina.

title: Slow Donnie
synopsis: Maya tries to convince Elliott that his slow-witted brother is a fake.

title: A Spy In The House Of Me
synopsis: Jack is upset when Maya's old high school boyfriend suddenly reappears.

title: Lies & Dolls
synopsis: Maya's efforts to woo a handsome presidential candidate are disrupted when he falls for Nina instead.

title: Hostess To Murder
synopsis: Maya's plan for a murder mystery theme party backfire when a grouchy neighbor dies on her doorstep.

title: Maya’s Nude Photos
synopsis: Maya’s photography teacher asks her to do a nude self-portrait.

title: Toy Story
synopsis: As a practical joke, Finch switches Elliott's birthday presents from Maya and a co-worker.

title: Miss Pretty
synopsis: Finch tries to keep from being identified as the magazine's new advice columnist; Elliott accidentally offends a big advertiser.

title: And The Femmy Goes To...
synopsis: Maya, Nina and Elliott are all nominated for a prestigious fashion magazine award.

title: Softball
synopsis: Maya is persuaded to pitch in the office's annual softball game.

title: Shaking Private Trainer
synopsis: Jack has second thoughts about hiring a rigorous personal trainer.

title: The Odd Couple - Part I
synopsis: To impress an old high school classmate, Finch engineers a date with an emotionally vulnerable supermodel.

title: The Odd Couple - Part II
synopsis: Finch struggles to get married before his fiancée's ex-boyfriend finds out.

title: Nina’s Choice
synopsis: Nina is forced to choose between an escaped convict and the FBI agent who's looking for him.

title: Pilot
synopsis: The teenage son of a wealthy New York City family is kidnapped, unleashing an elaborate game between the kidnappers, the FBI and the family’s private investigator.

title: Special Delivery
synopsis: With few clues as to Leo’s whereabouts, Knapp and King are forced to redirect their investigation to find the Cains’ missing daughter, Aubrey.

title: Sorry, Wrong Number
synopsis: With he and Ellie determined to forge ahead with a gala party at their home, Conrad suspects a childhood friend-turned-mob boss in Leo’s kidnapping.

title: Number One With A Bullet
synopsis: As Schroder looks to silence anyone connected to Leo’s kidnapping, a reporter stumbles onto the Cains’ secret.

title: Burn, Baby Burn
synopsis: As a raid on his booby-trapped office leads the investigators to Schroeder, their case is jeopardized by a security breach inside the Cain home.

title: My Heart Belongs To Daddy
synopsis: Ellie’s wealthy father uses his considerable influence to take control of the investigation into Leo’s kidnapping.

title: Front Page
synopsis: As an unscrupulous newspaper reporter goes public with the news of Leo’s kidnapping, Knapp looks to connect an imprisoned murderer and the Cains, while King’s conduct is scrutinized by the Bureau.

title: Gone Fishing
synopsis: Worried that someone may be trying to frame him for Leo’s kidnapping, Virgil puts himself and Ellie in the line of fire in order to lay a trap for the crime’s assassin.

title: Do Unto Others
synopsis: After capturing the Accountant, Knapp ends up a prisoner of another of the kidnapping’s hit men.

title: Impasse
synopsis: Knapp’s efforts to interrogate one of the kidnapping masterminds lands King and his daughter in a potentially deadly trap.

title: Mutiny
synopsis: As Knapp and Conrad uncover Prince’s role in the kidnapping, the conspiracy begins unraveling over money.

title: Acknowledgement
synopsis: The leads in the case bring Conrad, Knapp, and King to Mexico in their search for Leo.

title: Resolution
synopsis: Leo’s safe return home is upended by the realization that the kidnapping’s real mastermind was an FBI agent who was out to get revenge for the death of his own son.

title: Captain
synopsis: "Last Resort" is a thriller set in the near future when the country is very fractured and revolves around the crew of a U.S. nuclear submarine who become hunted after ignoring an order to shoot nuclear missiles.

title: Blue On Blue
synopsis: After Marcus (Andre Braugher) employs an experimental device to elude U.S. warships, a commando team attack sends Sam (Scott Speedman) and Grace (Daisy Betts) into the jungle to defend the island. Meanwhile, Kylie (Autumn Reeser) looks for the source of the attack on the USS Colorado.

title: Eight Bells
synopsis: As Marcus looks to control the Colorado’s restive crew, he agrees to run the blockade in order to gain the release of three sailors who are being held by the island’s corrupt mayor. Meanwhile, Kylie  runs up against an unexpected foe in her search for the truth about the attack.

title: Voluntold
synopsis: As Marcus (Andre Braugher) considers letting frightened crew members leave the island, he is faced with the government’s clandestine efforts to spark a mutiny. Meanwhile, Sophie (Camille de Pazzis) looks to keep Serrat (Sahr Ngaujah) in the dark about the island’s potential mineral wealth.

title: Skeleton Crew
synopsis: As Marcus (Andre Braugher) and Sam (Scott Speedman) negotiate with the Secretary of Defense, Grace (Daisy Betts) leads the Colorado on a risky mission to repair the island’s damaged sonar defenses.

title: Another Fine Navy Day
synopsis: A commando raid that contaminates the island’s drinking water sends Marcus (Andre Braugher) and a skeleton crew out to sea to protect the sub, while Sam (Scott Speedman) struggles with drug-induced hallucinations as he tries to fend off the attack.

title: Nuke It Out
synopsis: Marcus (Andre Braugher) orders Sam (Scott Speedman) to find the crewmember who abetted the CIA commando attack on the island. Meanwhile, Prosser (Robert Patrick) goes after Serrat and his men for dealing illegal drugs to the sub’s crew.

title: Big Chicken Dinner
synopsis: Grace (Daisy Betts) is ordered to defend a crew member accused of raping an islander, while Christine (Jessy Schram) looks to get on a ship taking crew members’ families to the island.

title: Cinderella Liberty
synopsis: The crew of the Colorado waits for a goodwill visit from their families, a visit that will soon turn into a nightmare as Marcus must consider the unthinkable once again. Meanwhile, the true reason for the nuclear devastation in Pakistan is revealed.

title: Blue Water
synopsis: Sam and James depart the island in a daring rescue attempt. Back on the island of Sainte Marina, a Chinese diplomat arrives to make a deal with Marcus. With scarcity and a prison problem plaguing him, Marcus finds himself treading down a more treacherous path than he could have imagined.

title: Damn The Torpedoes
synopsis: A typhoon, a mutiny and a Washington coup d'état will force Marcus and his crew into unlikely alliances. As Sam's grief strains his loyalty to Marcus, will Sainte Marina get the supplies it so desperately needs? How far will Marcus go to ensure the crew’s survival and will it cost him his life?

title: The Pointy End Of Spear
synopsis: Kylie works with Admiral Shepard to bring down the President using evidence of what really happened in Pakistan. This affords Marcus the opportunity to surrender the Colorado, if all goes according to plan.

title: Controlled Flight Into Terrain
synopsis: In the exciting series finale, a violent battle for control erupts on the submarine, which leaves the Colorado vulnerable to capture by a third party -- one with an exploitative plan. Can Marcus and Sam take control of the sub before it’s too late?

title: Roofless People
synopsis: To fix a leaky roof, the bank loan officer forces Malcolm to hire his daughter.

title: Been There, Done That
synopsis: Malcolm's good luck streak is matched bad Eddie's sudden run of bad fortune.

title: Car Trouble
synopsis: Eddie finds a gangster's hidden cash hidden inside Malcolm's new car.

title: Casino Evil
synopsis: Stiff competition inspires Malcolm and Eddie to turn McGee's into a casino.

title: Sibling Rivals
synopsis: Malcolm and his sister vie for the attention of the same woman.

title: A Police Officer And A Gentleman
synopsis: Eddie is jealous when Nicolette agrees to accompany her commander to a police department dance.

title: The Courtship Of Eddie’s Mother
synopsis: Following her divorce, Eddie's mom arrives for a visit that coincides with one from Malcolm's dad.

title: Trading Spaces
synopsis: Malcolm and Eddie decide to settle an argument by trading jobs for a day.

title: Like Water For Chocolate Cookies
synopsis: Malcolm faces a difficult decision in order to get Simone to keep making her extraordinary cookies.

title: Dream Racer
synopsis: Eddie ignores Nicolette's premonition and agrees to fill in for an injured race car driver.

title: Hoop Schemes
synopsis: In order to impress Nicolette and humiliate a potential suitor, Eddie steps in for Malcolm to coach a youth basketball team.

title: Two Men And A Baby
synopsis: Eddie enlists Malcolm to help babysit for his infant cousin.

title: It Almost Happened One Night
synopsis: An old rival's visit causes Simone to pretend she and Malcolm are husband and wife.

title: Whose Room Is It Anyway
synopsis: An argument over whose room is largest lands Malcolm in the hospital.

title: The Way We Weren’t
synopsis: An argument leads to Malcolm and Eddie recalling their years together.

title: Tough Love
synopsis: Fired from her job and dumped by her girlfriend, Malcolm's sister arrives to stay with him and Eddie.

title: The Slender Arm Of The Law
synopsis: Eddie tries to help out the retired race car driver who helped get his first job.

title: A Decent Proposal
synopsis: Nicolette enlists Malcolm and Eddie to convince her boyfriend to propose.

title: Bachelor Daze
synopsis: A friend's upcoming wedding cause Malcolm and Eddie to reexamine their feelings about the women in their own lives.

title: Mixed Nuts
synopsis: A surprise birthday party for Malcolm's dad sets the Shermans and McGees to fighting.

title: A Few So-So Men
synopsis: Malcolm unwittingly hires Eddie's longtime enemy to install a new bar at McGee's.

title: A Delicate Procedure
synopsis: After agreeing to date Tim's sister, Malcolm must then find a way to break up.

title: Kansas City Split
synopsis: When Malcolm falls for a spiritual guru and Eddie gets a new job offer, they agree to sell the business and move on.

title: His Name Is...Blade
synopsis: Teaming up with a Japanese father-daughter team of vampire hunters, Hayate and Makoto, Blade vanquishes all of the vampires.  However, amidst the carnage, Blade realizes that Deacon Frost, the vampire who killed Blade's life forever

title: A Night For The Living...A Morning For The Dead!
synopsis: Sakomizu, a middle-aged police detective in Osaka, is troubled by a recent series of missing Southeast Asian women.  After he meets up with Blade, they discover that the chief of police is helping to provide local vampires with human blood.

title: Dead On Arrival
synopsis: Aboard a ship heading for the Philippines, Blade departs Kobe Harbor hot on Deacon Frost's trail. On the ship, Blade's mentor, Noah Van Helsing, injects him with a retro-virus to suppress his urge to drink blood and while out of commission, Van Helsing reveals to Makoto the secret origin of Blade.

title: That Was Then, This Is Now
synopsis: Determined to rescue his mentor, Van Helsing, from the clutches of a pack of Mandurago vampires, Blade tracks him to a local slum in the Philippines. Reminded of his own childhood, he shares with Makoto how he was forced to kill his own mother who had been turned into a vampire.

title: The Island Of Fire
synopsis: Against the wishes of the Berdugo, Blade and Makoto set out in search for Frost's facility.  However, before they can get far, they are attacked by Manananggal, a breed of vampire unlike any Blade has seen before.

title: Bad Blood
synopsis: In his quest for Frost, Blade travels to the Island of Sumatra in Indonesia and launches an attack on a silver mine operated by Existence. There Blade and Makoto come into conflict with a witchdoctor who claims to have a cure for vampirism.

title: Claws And Blades
synopsis: Blade arrives in Madripoor and is instantly attacked by a local gang when an old acquaintance, Wolverine, appears.  Lucius Isaac who controls this local gang is also a servant from the pureblood vampire High Council whose aim is to destroy Existence.

title: Old Wounds, Fresh Blood
synopsis: In the jungles of Vietnam, Blade is attacked by a band of vampire ninjas. Rescued by an American Soldier, Blade learns of a secret U.S. Military initiative called the "V Plan". But before Blade can unravel its secrets, he is confronted by a mysterious attacker.

title: Teacher's And Student’s Bonds
synopsis: Blade has no choice but to fight the assassin, Kikyo Mikage.  Former classmates under a prestigious master swordsman in Japan, they now find themselves on opposite sides. But before they can finish their battle, everything is turned upside down when their former mentor makes a surprise appearance.

title: Sins Of The Father
synopsis: A captured Blade is taken to the Existence research lab known as 'The Factory’ to be experimented on by Deacon Frost who divulges his own awful ambitions. Meanwhile, Makoto puts everything on the line to rescue the Daywalker.

title: The Last Sunset
synopsis: While in captivity and pushed to his limits, Blade struggles to regain control of himself as his allies attempt a daring rescue.  But a price will be paid for their efforts against Frost and his vampire forces because not everyone will make it out alive...

title: The Final Glory Of Deacon Frost
synopsis: Blade invades Amaurot, the City of Vampires and headquarters of Existence, while cutting his way through anything that stands between him and Deacon Frost.  Meanwhile, Van Helsing and Kikyo Mikage engage in fierce battles of their own.

title: Japan: Enter Iron Man
synopsis: Tony Stark arrives in Japan with the aim of setting up the Arc Station as the first step of his World Peace Initiative.

title: Going Nuclear
synopsis: Tony Stark is accused by Defense Minister Kuroda of trying to avoid controversy by sneaking plutonium into Japan aboard an undefended cargo ship.

title: Reap the Whirlwind
synopsis: Nanami is trying to get to the bottom of the rash of freak hurricanes that have killed two notable scientists.

title: A Twist of Memory, A Turn of Mind
synopsis: Tony Stark is backing a charity racing event in order to burnish the image of Stark Industries.

title: Outbreak
synopsis: Dr. Tanaka informs Tony that a mysterious epidemic has broken out near the Arc Station.

title: Technical Difficulties
synopsis: When the Arc Station has a series of malfunctions, Tony and Dr. Tanaka discover a Zodiac computer virus has infected the Station's operating systems.

title: At the Mercy of My Friends
synopsis: Tony and Dr.Tanaka wake up on an isolated island with no idea how they got there and no hope of getting off the island.

title: Daughter of the Zodiac
synopsis: Tony Stark meets Aki, a mysterious young girl with strange powers. Tony is shocked when the girl tells him that she belongs to Zodiac and mentions that she needs Tony, as Iron Man to protect her.

title: A Duel of Iron
synopsis: In an effort to make amends for his weapons manufacturing past, Tony Stark has dedicated himself to building the world up rather than tearing it down.

title: Casualties of War
synopsis: Iron Man is dead! Dr. Chika Tanaka hears these astounding words from Yinsen's own lips. Meanwhile, the seriously wounded Tony Stark survives with the help of Nagato Sakurai and must devise a way to defeat Dio once and for all.

title: The Beginning of the End
synopsis: Held responsible for the event at the Arc Station, Tony Stark is arrested by the Japanese government. But while being transported, explosions rock the Diet parliament building, and suspicions are raised that Stark is behind it.

title: Endgame
synopsis: Tony Stark learns the shocking truth behind Zodiac. Iron Man must muster all his remaining strength in order to stop the nefarious ambitions of his greatest adversary, the man behind Zodiac.

title: Pilot
synopsis: Pilot is an ensemble comedy that explores bromance, sexcapades and office adventures of four buddies who work at a magazine. It centers on Milo, a nice guy recently dumped by his girlfriend who enlists the help of his three friends to reactivate his manhood.

title: Heterotextual Male
synopsis: As Milo’s (Danny Masterson) efforts to woo a potential date backfire over a texting typo, Gibbs (James Lesure) and Tyler (Michael Cassidy) are left speechless after their research for a magazine story about a noted sex therapist turns erotic.

title: Devil’s Threesome
synopsis: After he and Milo are lured into bed by a beautiful woman, Gibbs is devastated by his inability to perform in front of his friend. Meanwhile, a night out with Neal’s girlfriend Amy leaves Tyler wanting the guys to get in touch with their feelings.

title: Milo Full Of Grace
synopsis: When Neal (Adam Busch) institutes budget cuts to impress Amy’s dad and Full Steam Magazine’s owner P.J. Jordan (J.K. Simmons), Gibbs (James Lesure) must go to great lengths to satisfy his free coffee habit and Milo’s (Danny Masterson) debut investigative article ends up on the chopping block.

title: Toilet Of Eden
synopsis: When a leaky ceiling forces Milo (Danny Masterson) to move in with Tyler (Michael Cassidy), he’s forbidden from entering his friend’s private bathroom. But when Milo can’t resist satisfying his curiosity, he quickly becomes addicted to using Tyler’s amazing toilet.

title: Crazy For Milo
synopsis: After what he thinks is a one-night stand, Milo is surprised when the woman (guest star Mircea Monroe) won’t go away. As Neal worries about Amy’s  fascination with role-playing in the bedroom, a lie detector phone app reveals some unsettling truths about what Gibbs really thinks of Tyler.

title: Plan B
synopsis: After agreeing to set up Milo (Danny Masterson) on a date with his friend Hannah (guest star Laura Prepon), Neal (Adam Busch) has second thoughts. Meanwhile, Tyler (Michael Cassidy) and Gibbs (James Lesure) pretend to be gay in order to get a couples’ discount at a new gym.

title: Wake And Bake
synopsis: Urged on by Milo, Tyler sets out to confront a woman who has repeatedly stood him up, and is surprised to end up at her late grandmother’s wake. Meanwhile, Gibbs joins Neal  and his eccentric friends as they camp out to await the release of a hotly anticipated new video game.

title: Inventing Milo
synopsis: Milo looks to find an investor for a new exercise suit that has injured its test subject Neal and left him trapped at home. Meanwhile, Tyler regrets hiring Gibbs’ eccentric idol (guest star William Baldwin) to shoot a cover photo for the magazine.

title: Super Milo
synopsis: Determined to get over Lisa once and for all, Milo revives an intense competition that once almost destroyed the guys’ friendship. But he is soon forced to make a big decision when Lisa comes back into his life. And Neal struggles to prove that he’s on a par with the rest of the guys.

title: Missed Connections
synopsis: Tyler (Michael Cassidy) insists on helping Milo (Danny Masterson) find the girl of his dreams on Craigslist. Meanwhile, a road trip to the Hamptons places Gibbs (James Lesure) in the middle of Neal’s (Adam Busch) dysfunctional family drama.

title: Will Work For Milo
synopsis: Milo’s (Danny Masterson) attempt at generosity lands him in a battle with a crazy subway station panhandler. Meanwhile, as Neal (Adam Busch) asserts himself in his relationship with Amy (Meredith Hagner), Tyler (Michael Cassidy) looks to take advantage of a case of mistaken identity.

title: The New Boss
synopsis: A new editor (guest star Peri Gilpin) has the guys worried for their jobs.

title: Downshift
synopsis: When his friends agree that Milo’s (Danny Masterson) new romance with Molly is moving too fast, they coach him on how to “downshift” the relationship. Gibbs’ (James Lesure) single life is threatened when he agrees to babysit a dog.

title: The Good, The Bad & The Milo
synopsis: Milo (Danny Masterson) discovers that managing a friendly breakup with his girlfriend Molly (guest star Sarah Wright) isn’t going to be easy. Neal (Adam Busch) seeks Amy’s (Meredith Hagner) advice when he’s ordered to fire a salesman at Full Steam.

title: Tyler The Pioneer
synopsis: As Tyler (Michael Cassidy) dates a woman with kids, things get crazy when he finds out that her ex-husband (guest star Ben McKenzie) is still in the picture. Milo (Danny Masterson), Gibbs (James Lesure) and Neal (Adam Busch) compete for a fired co-worker’s prime office space.

title: Uncle Gibbs
synopsis: Gibbs’ (James Lesure) effort to convince his nephew to attend medical school in New York City inadvertently persuades him to abandon school altogether. Milo (Danny Masterson) believes that his thrift store vest is a lucky charm.

title: The Gibbs-Orcism
synopsis: The discovery that his new girlfriend has a past with Milo (Danny Masterson) and Gibbs (James Lesure) gives Tyler (Michael Cassidy) some disturbing – and mood-killing – visions. Neal (Adam Busch) and Amy (Meredith Hagner) struggle with a wedding anniversary curse.

title: Long Distance Tyler
synopsis: Tyler (Michael Cassidy) is faced with having a long distance relationship when his girlfriend moves to Brooklyn. Gibbs (James Lesure) and Milo (Danny Masterson) compete to date the same woman.

title: Weekend At P.J.’s
synopsis: When their boss PJ (guest star P.K. Simmons) invites them to his wedding, Gibbs (James Lesure) gets caught between two beautiful women, and Neal (Adam Busch) struggles to outshine Amy’s (Meredith Hagner) ex-boyfriend.

title: Pre-Posal
synopsis: Neal (Adam Busch) looks for the courage to ask P.J. (J.K. Simmons) for Amy’s hand in marriage. Milo (Danny Masterson) asks Gibbs (James Lesure) to be his mentor, while Tyler (Michael Cassidy) worries about getting old.

title: Post-Posal
synopsis: As Neal’s (Adam Busch) marriage proposal is derailed by Milo (Danny Masterson), Gibbs (James Lesure) accuses Tyler (Michael Cassidy) of “straight-baiting” a wealthy gay friend. Guest starring Lance Bass.

title: Holy New Boss!
synopsis: As Neal (Adam Busch) struggles to recover from his failed marriage proposal, a new Editor-in-Chief (guest star David Krumholtz) demands everyone justify their jobs as he looks for someone to fire.

title: I Take Thee, Gibbs
synopsis: As Gibbs (James Lesure) agrees to fake marry to get his British girlfriend a green card, Milo (Danny Masterson) is upset to learn his new girlfriend is close friends and business partners with her female ex. Tyler (Michael Cassidy) fights for their new boss’ (guest star David Krumholtz) approval.

title: Gigo-Milo
synopsis: Milo (Danny Masterson) makes a pitch to a book publisher (guest star Jane Seymour) which takes an unexpected turn. Tyler (Michael Cassidy) and Gibbs (James Lesure) are enlisted to write tweets for Myron (David Krumholtz), and Neal (Adam Busch) hires an aging intern (guest star Ed Asner).

title: Molly
synopsis: While attempting to salvage Neal’s (Adam Busch) chances with a new girl, the guys go to two different parties and accidentally try two different drugs.

title: Hi, Jude
synopsis: Tyler (Michael Cassidy) must prove his intellectual bona fides to win the respect of the magazine’s new writer. Milo struggles with being an unemployed novelist. Guest starring Kelen Coleman and Apolo Ohno.

title: Suburban Gibbs
synopsis: While attempting to salvage Neal’s (Adam Busch) chances with a new girl, the guys go to two different parties and accidentally try two different drugs.

title: Jude Awakening
synopsis: While Tyler (Michael Cassidy) asks Jude (Kelen Coleman) out on a date, Milo (Danny Masterson) attempts to make Gibbs (James Lesure) cry. A spontaneous date reveals Neal’s (Adam Busch) big secret.

title: Odd Milo Out
synopsis: When Jude invites the guys to a basketball game for their annual Bad Movie Night, Milo (Danny Masterson) accidentally reveals Jude's romance with Tyler (Michael Cassidy). Gibbs (James Lesure) uncovers Neal’s (Adam Busch) intention to move into a place of his own.

title: The Long Goodbye Syndrome
synopsis: When Jay blows up a Skraaldian, the hideous mollusk-like alien permanently "marks" him for death. With an entire alien race bent on his demise, Jay's funeral seems imminent.

title: The Buzzard Syndrome
synopsis: Kay and Jay match wits with Buzzard, a ruthless intergalactic bounty hunter. In order to retrieve a harmless looking E.T here on Earth, Buzzard poses as a legitimate alien cop.

title: The Irritable Bow-Wow Syndrome
synopsis: Frank the Pug, loud-mouthed alien informant disguised as a dog, has swallowed the Void Density Core, a mega-powerful alien weapon of mass destruction.

title: The Alpha Syndrome
synopsis: A Sintillian is missing one of his two hearts. Alpha, the original head of the MiB has stolen it.

title: The Undercover Syndrome
synopsis: Having accidentally disabled an alien diplomat's bodyguard, Jay assumes his identity. Jay must protect the Tarkan Trade Minister from a mysterious, unknown assassin.

title: The Symbiote Syndrome
synopsis: Jay is solely assigned to escort Troy, a Symbiote ("melds" with a host to survive) while Kay is down with an alien virus.

title: The Farewell My Lovely Syndrome
synopsis: An Inanimate (alien being capable of mimicking inanimate objects) is loose on the streets of New York.

title: The Psychic Link Syndrome
synopsis: A psychotic alien cab driver, is inexplicably attacking innocent humans and draining them of their vital "life force".

title: The Big Sleep Syndrome
synopsis: Parasitic Vermax have breached the Earth's atmosphere by hitching a ride on the Space Shuttle.

title: The Take No Prisoners Syndrome
synopsis: Out of nowhere, a mysterious team of synthetic thugs takes over MiB Headquarters.

title: The Head Trip Syndrome
synopsis: Having accidentally tampered with forbidden alien technology, Jay finds himself suddenly super-intelligent and getting smarter by the minute.

title: The I Married An Alien Syndrome
synopsis: An alien spacecraft is stationed on the outskirts of our galaxy while New York is experiencing a record heat wave.

title: The Mob Doctor
synopsis: Surgical resident Dr. Grace Devlin (Jordana Spiro) juggles her promising medical career with a secret deal to offer her medical services to a mob boss in order to save her younger brother’s life.

title: Family Secrets
synopsis: With Paul out of the picture, Constantine calls on Grace to treat the fugitive mobster he’s expecting to partner with in a shady video poker deal. Meanwhile, Grace and Brett treat an ailing bride who’s bolted for the emergency room in the middle of her wedding.

title: Protect & Serve
synopsis: After treating a family that was involved in a fatal car accident, Grace (Jordana Spiro) is stunned when Constantine (William Forsythe) orders her to treat the hit-and-run driver’s injuries, too.

title: Sibling Rivalry
synopsis: As she tries to stay out of a brewing gang war, Grace is tapped to treat Brett's estranged brother following a bicycle accident. Nate turns to his sister after he jeopardizes a mobster’s racehorse.

title: Change Of Heart
synopsis: After delivering a baby that Constantine uses as blackmail, Grace tries to help the mother. As Grace's treatment of a friend uncovers a brain malady, Moretti looks to stop a witness from testifying.

title: Legacy
synopsis: As she fights for a critically ill woman's heart transplant, Grace (Jordana Spiro) is asked to kill her patient's estranged and imprisoned father in order to get the organ she needs to save her life.

title: Complications
synopsis: As Constantine (William Forsythe) prepares to launch his gambling empire, Franco (James Carpinello) enlists Grace (Jordana Spiro) in Moretti's (Michael Rapaport) plan to stop him. As her unexplained absences raise questions at work, Grace sees she won't be able to conceal her dual life much longer.

title: Turf War
synopsis: When two innocent bystanders are caught in an ambush meant for Franco (James Carpinello), an injured Grace (Jordana Spiro) emerges in order to help. As the war between Moretti (Michael Rapaport) and Constantine (William Forsythe) escalates, Grace must keep her brother from becoming its next victim.

title: Game Changers
synopsis: Franco (James Carpinello) presses the FBI to keep him undercover to investigate Constantine's (William Forsythe) efforts to consolidate control over Chicago's competing crime families. Meanwhile, Grace (Jordana Spiro) uses her mob connections to help a friend whose daughter is addicted to heroin.

title: Fluid Dynamics
synopsis: An exiled mobster's return to Chicago draws Grace (Jordana Spiro) into the middle of a looming showdown between Constantine (William Forsythe) and undercover cop Franco (James Carpinello).

title: Confessions
synopsis: As Grace and Brett (Zach Gilford) treat a priest who was bitten during an exorcism, a botched collection draws Nate deeper into the mob. Franco's undercover assignment to help a Detroit mobster set up shop in Chicago places him on a collision course with Constantine (William Forsythe).

title: Resurrection
synopsis: When his estranged son seeks help repaying a shady loan, it’s Constantine (William Forsythe) who ends up in a drug cartel’s crosshairs. As Grace uncovers a mobster’s girlfriend’s deadly secret, she and Olivia (Jaime Lee Kirchner) are stunned when a dead patient mysteriously returns to life.

title: Life And Death
synopsis: As the hit on Constantine (William Forsythe) threatens to expose her mob connections, Grace’s (Jordana Spiro) quest to avenge her mother’s shooting reveals long-held family secrets and draws her into a deadly mob war.

title: Pilot
synopsis: Mr. Sunshine stars Matthew Perry as the manager of an aging San Diego stadium who realizes on his 40th birthday that he can no longer get by on just his charming, noncommittal ways.

title: Crystal on Ice
synopsis: Already roped into helping Alice face her fears over not being good enough for Alonzo, Ben (Matthew Perry) also takes in Roman after he's been banished from living with his mom.

title: Employee of the Year
synopsis: Expecting recognition on his tenth anniversary at the Sunshine Center, Ben (Matthew Perry) instead finds himself dealing with a difficult teen pop star (Nick Jonas) and a contest that has the staff vying for Crystal's attention.

title: Self Help
synopsis: When Ben (Matthew Perry) dons a hip new fedora, the attention he gets from Heather (Portia Doubleday) troubles Roman. But once it becomes clear that there’s a problem, Heather reveals that her seeming infatuation with Ben is harmless after all.

title: Family Business
