synopsis: When his childhood hero Chuck Ferguson (Gregg Henry) expresses interest in coaching the Center’s hockey team, Ben (Matthew Perry) must make the Crystal and Roman seem like the perfect family.

title: Celebrity Tennis
synopsis: On the eve of a charity tennis event, using Twitter while driving makes Crystal (Allison Janney) a hazard behind the wheel. After her carelessness disables both Alonzo’s tennis partner and Roman, Crystal worries she’ll be sued.

title: Lingerie Football
synopsis: Alonzo hopes to use a lingerie football game to persuade a pair of millionaires to donate to a new children's center. And when the sentimental side of Crystal (Allison Janney) is revealed, Ben (Matthew Perry) helps her resolve her lingering feelings for an ex-husband (James Taylor).

title: Hostile Workplace
synopsis: The chaos created by a broken air conditioner and a disgruntled mascot reveals how little respect the Sunshine Center's staff has for Ben (Mathew Perry) – and just how little he knows about them.

title: Heather’s Sister
synopsis: As Crystal (Allison Janney) convinces Alonzo to handle her dog to face off against her arch nemesis Macaulay Ridgeway (Ray Wise) in The San Diego Dog Show, Alice asks for his help impressing a hated high school classmate (Rosa Blasi).

title: Ben and Vivian
synopsis: Ben’s (Matthew Perry) latest one-night stand becomes complicated when he discovers that Vivian (Lizzy Caplan) is Crystal’s new assistant.

title: The Assistant
synopsis: As Roman receives an unlikely promotion, an email mix-up has Ben wondering if his office romance with Alice is really over. While the ensuing confusion reveals that Alonzo is still married to his ex-wife (Nadege August), Crystal orders Ben to fire their unpredictable P.A. announcer (Richard Kind).

title: Cohen and Donavan
synopsis: While Crystal (Allison Janney) wants a bigger role in managing the Sunshine Center, Ben’s (Matthew Perry) attention is focused on keeping the peace between three headstrong speakers at an upcoming leadership lecture.

title: The Best Man
synopsis: As the Sunshine Center prepares for the wedding of its organist Howard and kettle corn maker Maggie (Michael Learned), Crystal (Allison Janney) becomes a little too involved in her son Roman’s (Nate Torrence) love life.

title: My Boys: Pilot
synopsis: Chicago newspaper sportswriter P.J. Franklin's life as a woman living and working in a man's world is challenged when she's attracted to a handsome new colleague in the press box.

title: Mixed Signals
synopsis: P.J. isn't sure what to think after Bobby comes home from a road game bearing gifts, and then shows up at Crowley's Tavern with a beautiful woman on his arm.

title: Team Chemistry
synopsis: As P.J.'s efforts to play matchmaker for Stephanie cause a rift to open up between them, she learns that everyone knows about her and Bobby.

title: The Slump
synopsis: After concluding that they are all in a dating slump, P.J. persuades her friends to take her with them on their night of hunting for women.

title: The Show
synopsis: As Brendan drops a bombshell about his on-again, off-again girlfriend, P.J.’s “grownup” dates with Hank leave her friends without a ringleader.

title: Clubhouse Cancer
synopsis: As she reluctantly agrees to get to know Brendan’s fiancée, P.J. decides that the time has come for her new boyfriend, Hank, to spend some time with her pals, too.

title: Free Agent
synopsis: P.J. lies to Hank in order to join her friends for the first night of their annual game decathlon.

title: Superstar Treatment
synopsis: P.J. worries when Mike starts seeing a beautiful new woman with a penchant for dating celebrities.

title: Managers
synopsis: Though excited by the prospect of having her brother out from under his wife’s thumb for a weekend, P.J. soon comes to regret the return of “Fun Andy.”

title: Take One For The Team
synopsis: After accepting his invitation to Chicago’s most exclusive club, P.J. discovers that Kenny’s highly-annoying friend, Trouty, may not be as bad as he seems.

title: When Heroes Fall
synopsis: Everyone is stunned when P.J. and Andy’s Aunt Phyllis ends up in bed with Kenny.

title: Released
synopsis: A mercy date with an old college classmate backfires for P.J., while Mike is doubly upset over being fired after he learns that Bobby knew about it first.

title: Baseball Myths
synopsis: As plans for a surprise birthday party she’s throwing for Andy cause everyone to reassess what they think about Meredith, news of their brush with romance during college reveals the truth about Brendan’s feelings for P.J.

title: Promise Of A New Season
synopsis: As Brendan moves on to another girlfriend following his kiss with P.J., and Kenny starts dating a pregnant woman, Andy struggles to cope with his long commute from his new house in the suburbs.

title: Off Day
synopsis: With PJ seeing stars when she’s invited to appear as a guest on a cable sports show, Stephanie is sure they can both find boyfriends in time for a fall vacation in Italy. Andy solves a commuting nightmare by rooming with Mike, while Kenny gets a little too attached to Kimmie’s unborn baby.

title: Ethics
synopsis: Brandon is chosen as one of “Chicago’s Fifty Sexiest Bachelors” while PJ contemplates an ethically questionable relationship with the new Cubs pitcher.

title: Dirty Little Secrets
synopsis: As they learn that Bobby comes from a wealthy family and Stephanie admits to being deeply in debt,  everyone suspects that Kenny’s new girlfriend is a figment of his imagination.

title: Second Chances
synopsis: As P.J. senses romance in her future when an old boyfriend returns to town, Mike convinces Kenny to give him a job. Stephanie is given some harsh medicine by her handsome debt counselor, while Brendan tries to keep his dating options open.

title: Douchebag In The City
synopsis: As P.J. is discovers that she and her old college friend, Lyssa, have little in common anymore, she and the guys worry how Brendan has changed since being named one of the city's sexiest bachelors.

title: The Estates of Hoffman
synopsis: At the suburban barbecue that finds Brendan, Mike, and Kenny competing for the attention of an attractive divorcee, Andy starts to worry that he is becoming too much like his parents.

title: 110% Solution
synopsis: As P.J. makes the mistake of inviting her new boyfriend to poker night, Andy's mid-life crisis leads him to buy a boat without telling his wife.

title: Rome If You Want It
synopsis: Dateless just three days before she is supposed to leave for Italy, P.J. suddenly is deluged with offers by a trio of handsome men who are willing to join her.

title: The Transitioning
synopsis: While P.J. is away on what she had hoped would be a romantic trip to Italy with Bobby, Mike's affair with a new waitress gets everyone banned from Crowley's.

title: Dinner Party
synopsis: P.J. decides to shake up her flagging love life with a singles dinner party at her apartment.

title: The Shirt Contest
synopsis: As Brendan, Mike, Kenny, and Bobby agree to a Project Runway-style shirt-making contest, P.J. is hired to co-write a book by a mercurial Mets pitcher.

title: Spit Take
synopsis: P.J. worries after Bobby announces that he is getting married to keep his girlfriend Elsa from being deported.

title: Take My Work Wife Please
synopsis: As Andy's close relationship with a co-worker arouses the suspicion of his friends, Brendan takes a mailroom job at the law firm.

title: Dudes Being Dudes
synopsis: P.J. is unhappy at not being invited to Bobby's bachelor party.

title: Oppurtunity Knocks
synopsis: Jack's reputation as a ladies' man has P.J. rethinking the idea of dating him, while Andy reluctantly agrees to join Meredith in couples therapy.

title: Jack & Bobby
synopsis: The trip to the Newman family ranch for the wedding runs aground thanks to years of family tension between Bobby, Jack and their dad.

title: John, Cougar, Newman Camp
synopsis: As P.J. looks to bring Jack back in time for the wedding, Bobby begins to have second thoughts about marrying Elsa.

title: Welcome Back Kallafotter
synopsis: In the wake of Bobby's cancelled wedding, P.J. and the gang regroup back in Chicago.

title: Private Eyes
synopsis: Though P.J. and Bobby try to keep their romance under wraps, their friends get suspicious and investigate.

title: The Boyfriend Hat
synopsis: P.J.'s new promotion has Bobby worrying about how he should react.

title: Decathlon Part Deux
synopsis: The annual games decathlon weekend opens a rift between Bobby and P.J. when he accuses her of being too competitive.

title: Carpe Burritoem
synopsis: As P.J. decides to spend a week helping Brendan make better decisions and Andy lands a spot playing bass in Kenny's new band, Mike meets a new woman at Stephanie's latest relationship seminar.

title: Madder Of Degrees
synopsis: As winter turns to spring, the warm weather sparks romance for P.J., Bobby and their friends.

title: Facebook The Past
synopsis: Bobby feels threatened when P.J. uses Facebook to get in touch with an ex-boyfriend from college.

title: Friends Of Friends
synopsis: P.J. hits it off with one of Stephanie's girlfriends, while Andy is unnerved to find that Kenny and Mike are pals with a guy who was his marriage counselor.

title: Spring Training
synopsis: As P.J. faces new challenges in her first trip as a columnist to the Cubs' spring training camp in Arizona, Brendan faces a challenge of his own when a player's girlfriend uses him to make her boyfriend jealous.

title: Addition by Subtraction
synopsis: The search for Andy's replacement at the poker table reveals the history of how P.J. and her pals first met.

title: Gourmets and Confused
synopsis: The evening takes an unexpected turn after Stephanie lands a reservation at an exclusive new restaurant for her, P.J. and their boyfriends, leaving Mike and Brendan on their own.

title: Mike-Fest
synopsis: As Mike hopes his friends have arranged a big surprise for his birthday, Stephanie considers a film deal for her book while Bobby learns that his family fortune has been wiped out by a financial fraud.

title: Be a Man!
synopsis: As Kenny and Mike set out to accomplish a series of manly tasks, Bobby looks to prove his worth by fixing P.J.'s leaky kitchen sink.

title: The NTO
synopsis: As Kenny and Mike each worry about their store's future, a men's magazine article makes P.J. wonder if her sex life with Bobby is on the wane.

title: Hanger Management
synopsis: When Bobby decides to shake things up with a new career, P.J. worries about what it will mean for their relationship.

title: Puss 'N’ Glutes
synopsis: P.J. and Stephanie team up to help Mike and Brendan find a new approach to meeting women; Kenny asks Bobby to be his workout buddy, then lives to regret it.

title: Extreme Mike-Over
synopsis: The sudden popularity of Crowley's forces the gang to look for a new hangout; Mike realizes he'll have to show his new girlfriend, Marcia, where he really lives.

title: My Men
synopsis: As Mike looks to throw a birthday party for his new girlfriend and Stephanie prepares to move to London, P.J. considers a promotion at the paper.

title: Deleted
synopsis: Angela Bennett accidentally finds her way into a secure database, causing the database's owner, the shady Praetorians, to delete her identity from electronic existence. Angela is forced to go on the run, accused of a crime she did not commit.

title: North By Northwestern
synopsis: On her way to Chicago in search of her father, Angela gets detained by the police who think that her laptop computer is a bomb. She befriends a cellmate who helps her escape the clutches of the Praetorians. The public defender assigned to Angela doubts her story until Trelawney catches up with him.

title: Transplant
synopsis: While in Chicago, Angela gets shot. Sorcerer with a doctor at a Chicago hospital but Angela gets involved in an organ harvest program that the Praetorians are heading up.

title: Y2K Total System Failure
synopsis: Angela has to try and stop the seemingly unstoppable Millennium Bug after a programmer is killed who was close to finding the solution.

title: Death Of An Angel
synopsis: Angela stages her death in an attempt to regain freedom from the Praetorians. She takes residence at the university where her father was a professor. There she meets Kyle, an aspiring law student. When Kyle's uncle, is falsely accused of child pornography over the internet, Angela helps out.

title: Bulls And Bears
synopsis: The Praetorians are trying to manipulate the stock market to raise $100 million cash to buy a satellite they desire from the Russians. Angela joins the stock brokerage to prevent the theft. Angela's voice activated computer is destroyed while Trelawney meets up the some really bad boys.

title: Kill The Buddha
synopsis: While working as a barmaid, Angela befriends the owner and his wife, who are an interracial couple. When Eric is murdered, Angela finds out they were policemen. Wanting not to get involved, Angela is torn between helping the widow and protecting herself.

title: Fireball
synopsis: An old college boyfriend of Angela's is involved in hacking state lotteries. Things get ugly when Daniel hacks with the lotteries under control of the Praetorians. Angela needs to help Daniel while preventing the Praetorians from winning all the lotteries.

title: Jump Vector
synopsis: Angela poses as a river guide to learn more about a new program about to be released with a back door allowing the Praetorians access to any computer using this new operating system.

title: Go Like You Know
synopsis: Angela joins forces with a streetwise guy to fight a notorious cyber terrorist who is overloading power grids on the east coast for the Praetorians. Angela must try to stay one step ahead of the terrorist to stop her from executing her plan.

title: Harvest
synopsis: Angela meets Sorcerer! A bizarre cult calling itself Harvest Sun has the interest of the Praetorians. While Angela tries to get through to the cult members, she finally meets Sorcerer and is quite surprised!

title: Diamonds Aren’t Forever
synopsis: Angela and Sorcerer counter a Praetorian plan to bring down the world diamond market.

title: Pandora’s Box
synopsis: Angela and Sorcerer need to stop a Praetorian plot to dump nuclear waste in the world's oceans.

title: Sample
synopsis: A friend of Jacob's is murdered for trying to publish a negative review on a music web site. The Praetorians are involved in an elaborate scheme to control the world's music.

title: Lucy’s Life
synopsis: The Praetorians set up a camera accessible via the Internet in a student's dorm in an attempt to trap Angela.

title: Pay The Line
synopsis: Jacob gets involved in on-line gambling scheme and gets in over his head. He needs Angela's help to pay his debts back and they wind up in Las Vegas in some high stakes gambling. Meanwhile, Trelawney is told he has to clean up the mess he left behind with Hearney.

title: Lunatic Fringe
synopsis: Angela is concerned about Jacob's obsession with an internet cult leader.

title: In Dreams
synopsis: A 14-year-old girl with a photographic memory holds the key to a Praetorian code.

title: Zero
synopsis: A sinister new drug leads Angela and Jacob to a showdown with the Praetorians. Angela becomes an FBI CIC agent.

title: Last Man Standing
synopsis: New CIC agent Angela must put a stop to cybercast wrestling matches fought to the death.

title: Chem Lab
synopsis: Angela and Jacob go to high school to find the young creators of a chemical weapon.

title: Eye-See-You.Com
synopsis: Angela and Walter are in hot pursuit of a clever murderer who spies on his victims using the internet.

title: Review
synopsis: An annual review of the station sparks problems; Matthew quits over a story he isn't allowed to do.

title: President
synopsis: Over Dave and Lisa's objections, Jimmy decides to run for president.

title: Massage Chair
synopsis: Bill leads the staff in a revolt after their free snacks fall victim to budget cuts.

title: Arcade
synopsis: Dave's old nemesis comes back to haunt him when Beth replaces the lobby sandwich machine with a popular 1980's arcade game; Lisa retakes her college entrance exams to see if her mind is slipping.

title: Awards Show
synopsis: Dave is determined to end the station's losing streak at a big awards banquet.

title: Stocks
synopsis: Beth turns to Jimmy for some investing advice; Lisa balks at asking Dave for a favor.

title: Halloween
synopsis: It's up to Lisa and Dave to get the staff primed to attend Jimmy's annual Halloween party.

title: Daydream
synopsis: A broken thermostat and some excessive heat induces strange dreams in the staff.

title: Movie Star
synopsis: James Caan arrives to spend the day observing Bill; Dave and Lisa are divided over her birthday gift.

title: Rap
synopsis: Lisa balks at being the Cutest Reporter in New York; Bill starts his own anti-rap music crusade.

title: Christmas
synopsis: Dave's holiday generosity with the staff delays a Christmas Eve trip home with Lisa; Beth finds her talents in demand after helping Bill with an audition tape.

title: The Trainer
synopsis: Bill thinks he's been cheated by his new health club; the staff discovers a secret about Dave's past.

title: Led Zeppelin Boxed Set
synopsis: Bill's relentless sarcasm leads to Matthew experimenting with his own dark side; Jimmy looks to Catherine for help beating a crooked card dealer.

title: Complaint Box
synopsis: Jimmy's new employee policy covering harassment backfires and brings work at the station to a standstill.

title: Rose Bowl
synopsis: Jimmy hires Joe to represent him in a lawsuit; Dave takes Lisa's suggestion for a new performance evaluation.

title: Kids
synopsis: As Dave looks for the owner of some pornography he's found lying around, Jimmy arranges for a group of third grade interns to work at the station.

title: Airport
synopsis: When Dave and Bill are stranded by a storm in St. Louis, Lisa is put in charge.

title: Twins
synopsis: Matthew's twin brother comes to visit; Bill's secret contract nearly bankrupts the station.

title: Office Feud
synopsis: As Lisa struggles with a story from the White House, a misunderstanding leads Joe to seek revenge on a noisy upstairs neighbor; Catherine sets out to undermine Bill's latest commercial endorsement.

title: The Real Deal
synopsis: As Matthew reveals he's a virgin, Bill and Lisa struggle to keep their new program on the air.

title: Our Fiftieth Episode
synopsis: An argument over a traffic ticket gets Bill committed to a mental hospital.

title: Sleeping
synopsis: The staff is asked to comfort a comatose Jimmy following his heart attack.

title: Mistake
synopsis: Dave is forced to apologize for his comments in a magazine interview.

title: Space
synopsis: The NewsRadio crew faces disaster on a space station hundreds of years in the future.

title: The Deal
synopsis: When a group of corrupt cops known as The Ravens are arrested, they must induct an FBI mole into their ranks or face prison. It’s up to Raven leader Steve Hammond and brother Cole to hide the deal from the gang—including their imprisoned father, Tom—all while playing nice with the Feds.

title: Consequences
synopsis: With Tom’s life under threat in prison, Hammond and Cole demand that kingpin Neckbone call off his dogs. All the while, the Ravens must hide the deadly truth about Sleep, both from Neckbone and the Feds. Hammond wields leverage over Agent Byrd, who is pulled ever tighter into the Ravens’ grip.

title: Snag
synopsis: A text message from beyond the grave puts the Ravens on edge. Neckbone uses extreme methods to pressure the Ravens into revealing Sleep’s fate. The line between friend and enemy begins to blur for Byrd. Karen Beach’s affair with Viper Sam Foster complicates the Ravens’ lives in unexpected ways.

title: Betrayal
synopsis: Beach’s entanglement with Foster grows more dangerous by the day. After a shocking massacre of innocents, Agent Price pressures the Ravens to track the source of WMD, a dangerous new street drug. Neckbone puts his own screws to the gang to uncover this new threat to his business.

title: Payback
synopsis: Beach hangs Foster out to dry, putting the Ravens and the Vipers in a position of mutual self-destruction. When Sleep’s body is found, Neckbone sets a bounty on WMD ringleaders. A newly released Tom stokes discontent with his son’s leadership. Winters makes a sneak attack on the Ravens.

title: Allegiance
synopsis: Tom’s revenge against Winters risks an all-out gang war. With a fresh body on his doorstep, Neckbone gives Hammond a deadly ultimatum. Father and son vie for control of the Ravens, creating a deep gang rift. Hammond and Cole take action to replenish the pension fund, but their plans backfire.

title: Hunted
synopsis: An FBI raid gone wrong takes WMD off the streets but leaves Neckbone out for Raven blood. Agent Price demands Hammond bring his father into the fold by any means necessary. Tom uses a successful heist to assert his precarious power. From hiding, Neckbone begins to exact his revenge.

title: Retribution
synopsis: After Hammond and Cole’s worst fears are realized, their search for Neckbone escalates. Byrd pursues WMD’s shady connections with big pharma, but gets no help from the Bureau. Agent Price confronts Tom in an effort to flip him. Foster reveals to Beach explosive evidence he stole off Winters.

title: The Loss
synopsis: When Hammond and crew track Neckbone to his hideout, a shocking scene awaits. Just as the Ravens find themselves beset on all sides, yet another enemy comes back to bite them. Foster’s play against pharma CEO Shankman backfires. With their back against the wall, the gang must fight for their lives.

title: Switch
synopsis: In the tense season finale, the Feds descend hard on the Ravens. Hammond is ready to sacrifice himself, but Beach has an ace up her sleeve. Hammond strikes a deal with Agent Price in order to save his crew, but the deal is not what it appears. The Ravens finally square off with Neckbone.

title: Travis Pastrana TP Roll into Grand Canyon
synopsis: Travis Pastrana TP Roll into Grand Canyon

synopsis: Aaron "Crum" Sauvage minivan rollover

title: Dusty Wygle pitbike overjump
synopsis: Dusty Wygle pitbike overjump

title: Quentin Robbins  rollerboard crash
synopsis: Quentin Robbins  rollerboard crash

title: Special Greg pole vault disaster
synopsis: Special Greg pole vault disaster

synopsis: Streetbike Tommy streetbike front flip crash

synopsis: Travis Pastrana trike megaramp crash

title: Pilot
synopsis: The series premiere introduces Alex Kane, a security expert who encounters an elite gambling organization called the House that is led by the mysterious Mr. Johnson.

title: Ante Up
synopsis: Alex is ordered to stop a diamond heist, but he encounters an old colleague who is seeking information. Mr. Johnson and Cassandra step in and threaten to call off the bets. Later, Alex attends Ginny's funeral and discovers details surrounding her murder.

title: L.A. Takedown
synopsis: Alex asks a friend to further investigate Ginny's murder, but Mr. Johnson intervenes; Alex and Cassandra travel to L.A. to stop a sniper from enacting revenge for a drug cartel; and Det. Brown helps the FBI locate a missing ex-special ops agent in Las Vegas.

title: The Big Blind
synopsis: Det. Brown discovers the truth about a hit man, leading him to arrest Alex's client. Meanwhile, Mr. Johnson helps Alex uncover clues about Ginny's murder, but Cassandra has her own plan.

title: House Rules
synopsis: A student hacks the Pentagon and Alex attempts to protect him from both the House and the Chinese government; and new discoveries are made about Ginny's whereabouts. Meanwhile, Mr. Johnson takes drastic measures after issues arise with an old friend.

title: The Norseman
synopsis: The House bets on Alex to stop a serial killer before Halloween. Meanwhile, Det. Brown is hot on Cassandra's trail, but Mr. Johnson intervenes.

title: A House Is Not A Home
synopsis: Alex travels to Chicago to stop an enraged father from avenging his family; and Cassandra discovers the location of the next attack and sends Alex to prevent it. Meanwhile, Mr. Johnson has ulterior motives for going to Chicago.

title: Downtown Odds
synopsis: Alex intervenes to stop a mysterious newcomer to the Las Vegas drug scene from instigating a gang turf war.

title: Tell
synopsis: Alex and Cassandra team up to find a rogue former US Marshal who holds the key to Ginny's disappearance.

title: John Legend plays for Los Angeles
synopsis: John Legend plays it forward in Los Angeles.

title: Imagine Dragons Gives Back
synopsis: Sony Crackle just donated $100,000 on behalf of Imagine Dragons to Las Vegas school music programs. Watch to learn more.

title: Serial Killer
synopsis: Plagued by gambling debts, tax troubles, and a psychotic ex-girlfriend, criminal defense lawyer Keegan Deane (Greg Kinnear) represents a notorious serial killer who's recanted his confession, threatening to bring down the storied LAPD detective who put him behind bars ten years earlier.

title: Close Shave, A
synopsis: As he's representing a trio of young Amish men who attacked a church elder, Keegan (Greg Kinnear) uses Scarlet (Necar Zadegan) and Ben's (John Ortiz) recommitment ceremony to woo an attractive car service driver with a penchant for older men.

title: Cancer
synopsis: While defending a mother with a severe gambling addiction, Keegan (Greg Kinnear) scrambles to make up for causing skateboarding legend Tony Hawk to cancel his appearance at a school fundraiser.

title: Cannibal
synopsis: An outspoken and self-destructive criminal defense lawyer takes on the most challenging cases.

title: Bigamist
synopsis: Keegan exploits the judge and prosecutor's rocky divorce in his defense of a prominent restaurant owner charged with bigamy. As Mikki seeks help fending off a vindictive ex-client, personal and professional problems plague Scarlet and Ben.

title: Jury Tamperer
synopsis: Keegan and a prosecutor each set out to lose the trial of a mother who's confessed to murder in order to save her daughter from being jailed for the crime. Keegan discovers Mikki is dating a rival lawyer as Maddy works to end his influence over their teenage son.

title: Three Strikes
synopsis: An old acquaintance from AA who's facing life in prison for an armed robbery he didn't commit turns to Keegan (Greg Kinnear) for help.

title: Staple Hole
synopsis: As he tries resisting Gloria Barzmann's (guest star Kim Hawthorne) seductive charms, Keegan (Greg Kinnear) looks to put his life back on track by working for Ben (John Ortiz), unaware of the dangers lurking at the firm.

title: Hey, Good Looking
synopsis: While representing an artist who's been arrested for murdering her husband, Keegan (Greg Kinnear) must defend his own reputation when the police and public suspect him in mayor Barzmann's death.

title: 50 Shades Of Gay
synopsis: As Keegan tries to keep a longtime client's sexual secrets out of the news, Scarlet squares off with the new mayor (Kim Hawthorne) for her endorsement to be the next district attorney.

title: Remembrance Of Taxis Past
synopsis: Scarlet (Necar Zadegan) risks losing a key endorsement for her campaign when an aging ex-governor is arrested. David Potter (David Harbour) enters the race, placing Keegan (Greg Kinnear) in a difficult spot when Ben (John Ortiz) asks him to expose the secret Mikki (Bojana Novakovic) has been hiding.

title: Man’s Best Friend, A
synopsis: As Keegan (Greg Kinnear) defends a well-respected doctor who is caught in a very kinky video, an FBI investigation into Ben (John Ortiz) and the firm threatens to derail Scarlet (Necar Zadegan) in her campaign to become district attorney. Guest starring Kim Hawthorne and Pamela Adlon.

title: Mamophile
synopsis: While being shadowed by a boy who bought "A Day With a Lawyer," Keegan (Greg Kinnear) represents a middle-aged man and his doting mother who have each confessed to the same crime.

title: Devil
synopsis: Tommy struggles with his impending divorce, drinking and smoking, caring for his dad, and his uncle’s legal troubles.

title: Discovery
synopsis: As his dad’s birthday approaches, Tommy struggles to keep his life from spinning out of control as both Sean and Johnny do their best to keep him from learning some troubling secrets.

title: Torture
synopsis: Still seething over the discovery that Janet is seeing his brother, Johnny, Tommy finds that getting high school teacher Nell Turbody to end her affair with his nephew comes with a price.

title: Sparks
synopsis: Sean reveals his relationship with his sister to Tommy, only to discover that he already knew; Sheila presses Tommy to use a sperm bank to ensure the survival of the Gavin family’s legacy.

title: Chlamydia
synopsis: Tommy tries to enlist his former sister-in-law in a scheme to take revenge on Johnny and Janet, while Franco panics after discovering that his new girlfriend has kidnapped his daughter.

title: Zombies
synopsis: Tommy conspires with Johnny’s ex-wife to make his brother and Janet jealous, while an accidental overdose of a powerful sleeping pill sends Sean on a sleepwalking rampage.

title: Satisfaction
synopsis: Tommy fights his survivor’s guilt depression as Sheila sets out to get revenge for his affair with Angie.

title: Karate
synopsis: As Sean proposes to Maggie and Lou tries yoga to get his life back on track, Tommy struggles to keep things going with the three women in his life – Sheila, Angie, and Janet.

title: Pieces
synopsis: Tommy’s concerns about his own safety grow as he discovers that the firefighters of 62 Truck are preparing to move on.

title: Retards
synopsis: Sheila gives Tommy a Cadillac to encourage him to consider her marriage proposal, while Franco’s effort to make a good impression on Natalie backfires and Mike’s transfer is upended by his gay affair.

title: Twilight
synopsis: As caring for his aging father creates even more pressure for Tommy, Lou admits to dating a nun while Jerry looks for something to help his performance in bed.

title: Hell
synopsis: With Johnny’s murder coming on the heels of Jerry’s near-fatal stroke, the wheels of change are set into motion for Tommy, his family, and his friends.

title: Beached
synopsis: Following Johnny’s funeral, Tommy wrestles with how he’s going to care for his family and deliver on his promise to retire and live with Sheila.

title: Babyface
synopsis: As an arson investigation following the beach house fire targets Tommy, Janet worries that her new baby doesn’t like her and Sean tries to cope with Maggie’s porn collection.

title: Tuesday
synopsis: As Tommy presses Sheila for a believable story that will end the arson investigation, he and Janet worry that Colleen has run away from home as a not guilty verdict is delivered in Uncle Teddy’s manslaughter trial.

title: Commitment
synopsis: Tommy’s plan to make Colleen come back home backfires, and Jerry must come to grips with the fact that he is being forced into a desk job.

title: Pussified
synopsis: In the wake of Jerry’s suicide, Tommy looks to patch things up with Janet, while Mike struggles to cope with his mom’s death and Sean threatens Maggie with a divorce.

title: Black
synopsis: As Uncle Teddy struggles to stay in rehab, and Lou looks to recruit an athletic rookie for the station’s basketball team, Tommy discovers that Sheila may have lied about what caused the beach house fire.

title: Balance
synopsis: Sean looks to uncover the secret that Mike is hiding in his late mother’s bedroom, while Tommy struggles to understand the deal Lou struck with a basketball-playing rookie firefighter.

title: Seven
synopsis: Despite their heroic efforts, the crew from 62 Truck is savaged in the press for not being able to save seven children from dying in a tragic fire.

title: Solo
synopsis: As news that he gave the baby to Sheila sends Janet packing, Tommy is pressured to take Chief Feinberg’s daughter, Beth, on a date.

title: Animal
synopsis: In the wake of the intervention to help Maggie and Uncle Teddy, Tommy struggles to put his life back together after Janet throws him out.

title: High
synopsis: After bribing Colleen for access to the baby and information about Janet, Tommy gains a surprising insight into his childhood during a conversation with his dad.

title: Cycle
synopsis: As he makes good on his promises to get a car for Colleen and access to the baby for Sheila, Tommy struggles to keep from drinking as he learns more about the childhood that shaped who he’s become.

title: Keefe
synopsis: While wearing his late cousin Jimmy’s bunker jacket, Tommy secretly helps save Mike from the mistakes of his new hard-drinking crew. As Sean sees that he’s not cut out to be an alcoholic, Franco cannot shake his feelings for Natalie.

title: Yaz
synopsis: As the sighting of Jimmy Keefe’s ghost has the firehouse on edge, Tommy looks to repair his many failed relationships as Colleen blames him for coming between her and her boyfriend.

title: Boobytrap
synopsis: 2009 A.D. – Earth is attacked by an armada of giant aliens.

title: Countdown
synopsis: The earth‘s SDF-1 Battle Fortress prepares to lift off into space to battle with the alien invaders.

title: Space Fold
synopsis: In order to avoid the total destruction of the earth, the crew of the SDF-1 make an untested jump into hyper-space.

title: The Long Wait
synopsis: Rick and Minmei find themselves trapped inside an unexplored area of the gigantic Space Battle Fortress.

title: Transformation
synopsis: Captain Gloval plans a daring strategy to convert the SDF-1 into a robotic configuration to do battle with the Zentraedi forces.

title: Blitzkieg
synopsis: The battle between the Robotech defenders and the Zentraedi is taken tot he very limits of the Solar System as the two forces meet in the rings of Saturn.

title: Bye-Bye Mars
synopsis: The Zentraedi plan an ambush for the SDF-1 at a deserted Martian Outpost.

title: Sweet Sixteen
synopsis: As Minmei prepares for her sixteenth birthday, the Zentraedi prepare for yet another attack on the Robotech ship.

title: Miss Macross
synopsis: A beauty contest on the SDF-1 is designed to encourage morale as the valiant Robotech Defenders make their way back to earth.

title: Blind Game
synopsis: The Zentraedi forces destroy the radar and communication systems onboard the SDF-1 and deliver an ultimatum for surrender.

title: First Contact
synopsis: Lisa Hayes and Rick Hunter are captured by the Zentraedi and held prisoner on board the flagship of Dolza, the leader of the alien warriors.

title: The Big Escape
synopsis: Max stages a daring rescue attempt for his friends captured by the Zentraedi Armada.

title: Blue Wind
synopsis: As the SDF-1 approaches earth, the Zentraedi try for a final victory in their ongoing battle to commandeer the prized Robotech ship.

title: Gloval‘s Report
synopsis: Back on earth, Captain Gloval recounts the events of the past two years in the war with the alien Zentraedi forces.

title: Homecoming
synopsis: The entire population of the SDF-1 is celebrating their return to earth while Captain Gloval tries to convince the United Earth Government of the threat posed by the Zentraedi.

title: Battle Cry
synopsis: Minmei‘s cousin Kyle is reunited with his family on board the SDF-1 moments before a Zentraedi sneak attack which hopes to catch the defenses of the Robotech forces off-guard.

title: Phantasm
synopsis: Rick lies in bed recovering from wounds suffered in combat with the aliens. As his body fights for life  Rick‘s fevered imagination takes him through a demented nightmare.

title: Farewell, Big Brother
synopsis: Roy Fokker‘s squadron is short-manned while Rick is recovering. A Zentraedi raid becomes costly when Roy is mortally wounded defending the SDF-1.

title: Bursting Point
synopsis: The news of Fokker‘s death puts a dark cloud over plans to evacuate the 70 000 refugees onboard the SDF-1. Khyron  the most evil Zentraedi  wastes no time jumping on an opportunity to attack his sworn enemies aboard the giant Space Battle Fortress.

title: Paradise Lost
synopsis: After the tragedies of the recent past  everyone onboard the SDF-1 is anxiously awaiting the release of Minmei‘s first feature film. The alien spies are also eager – hoping to discover some military secrets hidden in the subtext of the film.

title: A New Dawn
synopsis: The aliens believe that the humans possess a secret weapon and plan a stratagem to defeat their bothersome Micronian enemies.

title: Battle Hymn
synopsis: A minor civil war begins aboard the Zentraedi warships as the word spreads throughout the alien underground concerning the good life experienced by citizens of Macross City living on the SDF-1.

title: Reckless
synopsis: Rick goes on the warpath to stop an invasion of the SDF-1 by the defecting Zentraedi. In the midst of this battle scene, Minmei and Kyle are faced with more dangerous implications.

title: Show Down
synopsis: Max Sterling meets the micronized Zentraedi warrior, Miriya, on a different field of battle as combatants of a video game championship.

title: Wedding Bells
synopsis: Miriya‘s attempt to ambush Max turns into a more complicated affair when they fall in love and decide to get married.

title: The Messenger
synopsis: Exedore is sent to the SDF-1 in the wake of the marriage between Max and Miriya in order to negotiate a peace settlement between their two warrior civilizations.

title: Force Of Arms
synopsis: Dolza tricks his advance armada and surrounds the earth with 4.8 million armed ships. For Dolza, the time for talking has ended. The SDF-1 and the earth must be destroyed. It forces Breetai to join with Captain Gloval to counteract this terrible threat.

title: Reconstruction Blues
synopsis: The citizens of the SDF-1 try to put their lives back together following the cataclysm of the past several months. The earth has become a barren wilderness where the pioneer spirit of the survivors is put to the ultimate test.

title: Robotech Masters
synopsis: In some faraway spot in the galaxy, the Robotech Masters find indication of a giant battle that has taken place in the vicinity of the Earth. They feel this might be the location of their lost protoculture factory. They begin the long journey to find their precious biomechanical life force.

title: Viva Miriya
synopsis: Breetai organizes a raid on the last remaining Robotech factory in order to try and hold the upper hand in case the wandering Robotech Masters do eventually find their way to the earth.

title: Khyron‘s Revenge
synopsis: The evil Zentraedi warlord, Khyron, plots to persuade the surviving micronized Zentraedi to re-join the ranks of the elite guard of the Robotech Masters now under his command.

title: Broken Heart
synopsis: In a totally unexpected move  Khyron has managed to capture Minmei and Kyle. He holds his micronian prisoners for ransom; the price for their freedom is the earth‘s gigantic Robotech vessel  the SDF-1.

title: A Rainy Night
synopsis: Claudia gives Lisa a lesson in psychology as she recalls the early stages of her romance with the late Commander Roy Fokker. A touching flashback sequence.

title: Private Time
synopsis: Minmei tries to become part of Rick Hunter‘s life again after returning from her tour of the frontier. It is a situation complicated by Rick‘s growing concern for Lisa and his final realization of his duty as a soldier.

title: Season‘s Greetings
synopsis: The Christmas season serves as a backdrop for Khyron‘s plans to steal the earth‘s remaining supply of protoculture matrix. Many of the complex relationships developed over the past episodes are coming to a resolution.

title: To The Stars
synopsis: Admiral Gloval has ordered Lisa Hayes to command a new version of the Robotech Space Fortress, the SDF-2, and undertake a new mission to search the far reaches of space and discover the true homeworld of Robotech. Khyron has other plans for the SDF-2 and original SDF-1.

title: Dana‘s Story
synopsis: It is fifteen years later and Dana Sterling  the child of Miriya and Max Sterling  recalls the turbulent romance that her parents had in order to put to rest the fears of a new recruit in the Army of the Southern Cross  the earth‘s latest defense force.

title: False Start
synopsis: The Robotech Masters have finally arrived near the vicinity of the earth. They are certain that there will be no resistance offered as they try and recover their lost factory that the strong fighting spirit offered by the citizens of earth confuse the zealous interstellar techno-voyagers.

title: The Southern Cross
synopsis: A counter-attack by the United Earth Forces causes the Robotech Masters to re-evaluate their plans to regain the protoculture factory. Although there are no precise winners, the battle lines are being drawn.

title: Volunteers
synopsis: In order to accommodate vital military information  the Supreme Commander of the Army of the Southern Cross asks for volunteers to re-establish communications with an isolated space station  earth‘s only link to the Robotech defenders who have gone into the cosmos in search of their homeworld.

title: Half Moon
synopsis: On a routine patrol, Dana Sterling and Bowie Grant discover a plot by the Robotech Masters to excavate around the site of the final destruction of the SDF-1. Bowie is captured and it is up to Dana to affect his rescue.

title: Danger Zone
synopsis: A gigantic Flagship from the Robotech Master‘s interstellar armada is flying closer and closer to the earth. It is decided that a direct offensive against the battleship is needed. Dana Sterling‘s 15th Tactical Armoured Corps is called into action to solve this new crisis.

title: Prelude To Battle
synopsis: After successfully shooting down the giant alien ship  a ro-con mission is called for. Once again Dana‘s group is volunteered for the dangerous mission. On the eve of this dangerous mission  the members of this courageous squad prepare for battle  each in his or her very own way.

title: The Trap
synopsis: Dana‘s 15th Alpha Tactical Armoured Corps succeeds in breaching the hull of the fallen alien vessel. They proceed through the gigantic ship in the hope of discovering any information concerning this new threat. What they don‘t realize is that they are falling into a trap set by the Robotech Masters.

title: Metal Fire
synopsis: The Robotech Masters plot to raid a nearby city and capture as many humans as they can in order to experiment and see if they should fear this minor group of creatures calling themselves earthlings.

title: Stardust
synopsis: Dana Sterling tries to get the war with the Robotech Masters out of her mind by attending a concert with Bowie. She meets a singer who she finds interesting only to discover later that he is a spy working for the military police.

title: Outsiders
synopsis: The Robotech Masters plan a strange deception by introducing Zor into the ranks of the 15th Tactical Squadron of the Army of the Southern Cross in the hope of getting some information regarding earth‘s knowledge of protoculture.

title: Deja Vu
synopsis: Zor  the Robotech Master‘s unsuspecting spy  is subjected to rigorous psychological tests to determine if he is human. Dana cannot allow him to go unchallenged for the destruction he has caused and plans a daring midnight raid on the hospital where Zor is sequestered to extract her revenge.

title: A New Recruit
synopsis: General Leonard is convinced that Zor can help his army get information regarding the Robotech Masters. He assigns Zor a commission in the 15th squad and places Dana Sterling in charge of his "rehabilitation." By this time, Dana has begun to feel somehow related to this new recruit – alien or not.

title: Triumvirate
synopsis: General Leonard calls for an all out attack against the Robotech Masters forces in Earth orbit near the moon. The plan does not include the 15th Tactical Squad, which spends most of its time trying to help Zor regain his memory at the crash site of the SDF-1.

title: Clone Chamber
synopsis: Things on earth are settling into a pleasant domestic routine while the Robotech Masters and their bioroid army fights for their very survival against the pressure of the Tactical Space Corps of the Army of the Southern Cross.

title: Long Song
synopsis: A classic Cinderella story unfolds as Marie Angel and Sean Phillips plan a very important date. Things don‘t turn out for the best and Marie ends up running away from the truth of Sean‘s past.

title: The Hunters
synopsis: Louise Nichols  a member of Dana Sterling‘s squad  builds a Robotech device that is exploited by the Military Police into an offensive weapon system. The deception causes Louise to break down and attack her friends and fellow soldiers.

title: Mind Game
synopsis: An all out attack is called for, this time incorporating the ground forces of the Army of the Southern Cross. Dana and her squad respond only to be captured in the end by Zor, who has been reactivated by the Robotech Masters to become a Bioroid Captain once again.

title: Dana In Wonderland
synopsis: Trying to escape from the Robotech Masters, Dana and her friends discover many secrets concerning the true nature of the civilization living aboard the flagship of the Robotech Masters and the entire process of biogenetic engineering.

title: Crisis Point
synopsis: A critical battle takes place aboard the Robotech Master‘s Flagship  as Zor and Musica  a Robotech clone mistress  defect and join the earth forces. A daring escape forms the basis of the new relationship between Zor and members of the 15th Squad.

title: Day Dreamer
synopsis: Musica tries to assimilate herself into the "alien" environment she finds on earth. Her joy of discovery in this new world is cut short when Nova Satori, the military police, seeks her out as a spy. Bowie and Musica become a fugitive couple to avoid capture.

title: Final Nightmare
synopsis: Nova tracks Bowie and Musica to the crash site of the SDF-1 and makes a startling discovery in regard to the nature of Protoculture and the growing threat of the impending Invid invasion. Zor realizes that the Robotech Masters must be stopped at any cost.

title: The Invid Connection
synopsis: Zor and the rest of Dana Sterling‘s 15th Tactical Squad make a daring trip to the Robotech Masters‘ flagship in order to rescue General Rolf Emerson  Bowie‘s guardian  and try and put a stop to the second Robotech Wars.

title: Catastrophe
synopsis: The final battle of the Second Robotech War is fought as Zor goes on the rampage to destroy the entire culture created by the Robotech Masters before the arrival of the Invid.

title: The Invid Invasion
synopsis: The Robotech Expeditionary Force returns to Earth in the wake of the invasion of the Robotech Masters only to find their planet completely overrun by an alien life form known as the Invid.

title: The Lost City
synopsis: Scott Bernard  the sole survivor of the Robotech Expeditionary Force‘s ill-conceived attack against the Invid stronghold known as Reflex Point  joins forces with Rand  a young rebellious freedom fighter  as they try to recruit an army of Earth‘s survivors to carry on the fight against the Invid.

title: Lonely Soldier Boy
synopsis: Scott, Rand and Annie, a precocious 13-year-old girl, try to help some citizens in a remote town fight off a gang of thugs and an attack by an Invid Scout Patrol.

title: Survival
synopsis: The group of freedom fighters, now joined by Yellow Dancer (aka Lancer), Rook Bartley (a brave young woman) and Lunk (aka Jim Cooper), try getting back to nature as they set-up a base in the center of a hostile forest under the constant scrutiny of Invid Scout Troops and Invid Shock Troopers.

title: Curtain Call
synopsis: Yellow Dancer stages a rock concert to serve as a diversion allowing Scott Bernard and his band of Freedom Fighters a chance to sneak into a Protoculture Storage Area and confiscate valuable fuel needed to power their Alpha Fighters and Cyclones.

title: Hard Time
synopsis: Rook Bartley is reminded of the past as the band of freedom fighters powers their way through Rook‘s hometown. Rook takes the opportunity to look up her family and try to settle some old scores with a gang of thieves who humiliated her several years earlier.

title: Paper Hero
synopsis: Lunk is on a mission to deliver a manuscript to the father of one of his dead comrades. It was a promise he made and feels honor-bound to keep. A hostile reception by the local townspeople forces Lunk to re-evaluate the nature of friendship and duty.

title: Eulogy
synopsis: Scott Bernard and his comrades come upon a force of Robotech Defense Forces under the command of one of his childhood heroes, Col. Wolfe. Scott offers the services of his group to aid Wolfe, Scott finds himself double-crossed by a hero who has lost his courage under the pressure of the Invid.

title: The Genesis Pit
synopsis: Scott, Rand and Annie are separated from the group and find themselves in a Genesis Pit. It is an experimental lnvid Laboratory in which these strange aliens are conducting genetic experimentation on Earth biological history.

title: Enter Marlene
synopsis: The Invid send a "simul-agent" into the midst of Scott Bernard and friends in order to find out how much this band of freedom fighters knows about them and their plans. The Invid plan backfires when Rand discovers the Simul-agent before the transformation process is complete.

title: The Secret Route
synopsis: The intrepid band of freedom fighters come upon a thriving community which makes its living by selling information to avoid the Invid and migrate to a new and wonderful Utopia just over the mountain. Sounding too good to be true  the heroes investigate and expose the evil plot of the town‘s mayor.

title: The Fortress
synopsis: In order to continue on to Reflex Point, Scott Bernard and his friends must first destroy an old Robotech Fortress that is now occupied by the Invid. The group separates and infiltrates the complex and manages to destroy the Invid stronghold.

title: Sandstorm
synopsis: Rand tries to find water for Marlene who has grown ill following the destruction of the Invid Fortress. He braves a sandstorm that circulates many of the spores of the Invid Flower of Life that overwhelm Rand and induce a strangely prophetic dream.

title: Annie‘s Wedding
synopsis: Scott Bernard‘s group is captured by a tribe of outcasts  while traveling through a forest. They have canonized the Invid and only through the intervention of Scott and his friends are these humans able to accept their humanity and fight back against their alien enemies.

title: Separate Ways
synopsis: Following Annie‘s departure from the group  a sense of melancholy settles over Scott and his friends. Petty arguments get blown-out of proportion and the group decides to split up.

title: Metamorphosis
synopsis: The Regiss, Queen of the Invid, allows two of her children to transform their protoplasmic bodies into humans as part of the process of finding the ultimate life form. Sera and Corg, take this opportunity to hunt down the humans who have proved to be a thorn on the side of their mother.

title: The Midnight Sun
synopsis: On a snow-capped mountain pass, Scott Bernard and company defend themselves against a massive attack by the Invid, led by Sera, who is torn between her loyalty to the Regiss and her uncontrollable emotional instability which she feels as a result of transforming into a human.

title: Ghost Town
synopsis: The group finds themselves in a ghost town populated by an assemblage of old timers who have Robotechnology. The return of the newest attack wing of the Robotech Defense Forces, now personally headed by Admiral Hunter, sends a call to glory into the lives of many who have lost the will to fight.

title: Frost Bite
synopsis: The Robotech Freedom Fighters led by Scott Bernard discover the deserted remains of Denver, Colorado. They go through the empty streets looking for supplies and trying to enjoy a moment of relative peace from their constant struggle against the Invid.

title: Birthday Blues
synopsis: A surprise birthday party for Annie turns into a nightmare as Corg sets up an ambush for the freedom fighters. But the group is well prepared and defends their position without spoiling Annie‘s party.

title: Hired Gun
synopsis: Dusty Ayres, a human who was used as an experimental subject by the Invid, has his mind set on revenge as he systematically goes about destroying those he feels responsible for his torture at the hands of the Invid.

title: The Big Apple
synopsis: Scott Bernard and his friends travel to a large urban center to replenish their dwindling supplies of protoculture and also try to get information regarding Reflex Point and the relative strength of the Invid. Lancer takes the opportunity of being in a big city to hold a concert.

title: Reflex Point
synopsis: The Robotech Defense Force is planning an attack against the Invid who have taken over the earth. There‘s a small battle over an advanced steal-type Alpha Fighter. Marlene is injured and it‘s discovered that she is an Invid.

title: Dark Finale
synopsis: The Robotech Defense Force plans its major attack on Reflex Point. Scott  Lancer and Lunk return to the military. Annie  Rand and Rook are told to stay away. They don‘t obey and blast their way into a final confrontation with Regiss.

title: Symphony Of Light
synopsis: The final chapter in the third Robotech war has Scott defending Corg with the aid of Marlene while Lancer aids Sera in defending the Invid Hive while the Regiss gathers her remaining Invid children.

title: Series Trailer
synopsis: Discover the show that spawned anime fandom in America. When alien invaders attack Earth  three generations of humans must exploit robot technology to save the planet. Forget ‘80s episodic plotlines—Robotech‘s ahead-of-its-time narratives and complex character arcs are every binge-watcher‘s dream.

title: Episode #01001
synopsis: Bouncers at a NYC nightclub are entrusted to maintain the peace  but they can‘t help but get themselves into trouble. When Martin  a small town newcomer  comes to Big Vic‘s aid in a fight with a gang of thugs  he earns himself a spot on the team.

title: Episode #01002
synopsis: When left alone to guard the club‘s back door  Martin quickly finds himself in over his head. During off hours  the bouncers try to teach Martin how to pick up chicks after he starts to fall for a girl at the club.  Meanwhile  the club faces mounting problems from a nearby rival.

title: Episode 3
synopsis: Big Vic gets into some serious trouble at the club.  Secrets are revealed as the bouncers navigate their ever-increasing relationship and money problems.

title: Episode 4
synopsis: Rizzio‘s welcomes celebrities while problems with a rival club rise to new  violent levels.

title: Episode 5
synopsis: Tension among the bouncers erupts into violence at every turn.

title: Episode #01006
synopsis: After another attack at the club  the bond of brotherhood is tested yet again.  Les engages in some shady business that leads to bloodshed.  A battle brews with Danny Diamond‘s club.   Meanwhile  Rizzio faces a potential closure.

title: Seinfeld
synopsis: Laura, a woman Jerry met during a trip to Laming, has called to say she is coming to New York on business and might like to see him while she is in town. Although Jerry is convinced Laura is interested in romance, George disagrees, saying her non-committal attitude means she is only being polite.

title: The Ex-Girlfriend
synopsis: Jerry's best friend George is obsessed with finding a way to break up with his overbearing girlfriend. However, after dispensing his sage advice on the topic, Jerry finds himself in a similar agonizing position with the same woman.

title: The Note
synopsis: To get a top-of-the-line massage free, Jerry asks his dentist friend to sign a note saying Jerry, George and Elaine need treatment from a certified physical therapist for medical reasons.

title: The Trip: Part I
synopsis: Jerry and George search for Kramer in L.A.

title: The Trip: Part II
synopsis: While searching for Kramer in Los Angeles, Jerry and George are picked up for questioning by the police, who suspect Kramer is a notorious serial killer known as the smog stranger.

title: The Mango
synopsis: Jerry learns an uncomfortable secret about his romance with Elaine.

title: The Chaperone
synopsis: Kramer chaperones Jerry's date with a Miss America hopeful.

title: The Engagement
synopsis: George gets engaged, while Elaine takes drastic measures to silence a barking dog. Fake Movie Title - The Muted Heart.

title: The Foundation
synopsis: As George tries to put Susan behind him, Elaine is given control of J. Peterman's business.

title: The Butter Shave
synopsis: George gets a new job after he's mistaken for being handicapped while Jerry suspects Bania is taking advantage of him; Kramer's latest shaving technique backfires as Elaine breaks up with her boyfriend during a trans-Atlantic flight.

title: Twelve Strangers
synopsis: The Malcolm Miller trial has ended  but is the case over? After a juror is beaten  the judge orders the jury to be sequestered. Danny receives an odd voice mail from a witness. Governor Bennett is told of an old threat resurfacing. Anna sees something disturbing in her hotel room. Series Premiere.

title: Folding Laundry
synopsis: Danny finds Sophia Russo and digs back into the Malcolm Miller Case. Anna decides how to respond to her mysterious message. Danny s search leads him to an ex-juror  a gay bar and a new suspect.

title: Proof Of Life
synopsis: Governor Bennett makes a confession that leads to a renewed connection. Danny overcomes his strained relationship with his father and asks for help. Anna has a new ally in Ryan  but can she trust him? An important discrepancy in the case is found.

title: 1 More
synopsis: Danny tells Nora about his discovery and is surprised to get help from his father. Anna confides her suspicions to Ryan but is too wary to tell him everything. Hugh has no idea he is being followed. Anna sees something she s not supposed to.

title: What‘s In The Box?
synopsis: Tempers flare as the deliberations drag on. Anna and Ryan concoct a scheme to expose a juror s secret. Governor Bennett takes matters into his own hands. Nora confesses to Danny  who then investigates Pritchard. Anna panics when she can t reach her sister.

title: All In
synopsis: The jury is reprimanded and reminded of the magnitude of their duty. Joe's investigation takes him outside the law. Danny meets a new ally and a new enemy. Pritchard preys on Danny's weakness. Helen finds something incriminating in her husband's office.

title: Grilled Cheese
synopsis: Anna snaps. Ryan catches Yvonne in the act. Pritchard is put in his place. Malcolm meets his new lawyer. Joe tells Danny that the jurors  votes are being leaked and Danny seeks help from his new friend.

title: Stop Crying
synopsis: Governor Bennett conducts his own investigation into his son s murder. Danny and Nora finally talk about a secret. Jenny comes to a frightening realization about her captor. Charles gets a surprising call from home. Danny takes matters into his own hands.

title: Like Sheep
synopsis: The jury deliberation unravels causing a change that will block Anna and Ryan s progress. Danny makes a confession that forces Pritchard into a drastic move. Governor Bennett continues his interrogation what happened to the $80 million?

title: Up On The Roof
synopsis: Danny gets help from a surprising source. Seth has an epiphany about the conspiracy. Anna realizes that she has an enemy AND an adversary. Governor Bennett goes off the deep end.

title: Johannesburg
synopsis: After ten days  the verdict is finally in. Anna sets out to find her sister. Keira reevaluates her blind loyalty. Helen overhears a disturbing conversation. Danny and Kevin find where it all happened.

title: Ashes To Ashes
synopsis: Governor Bennett is confronted by the secrets of his past. Anna and Ryan continue their search for Jenny  while Hugh and Keira must finish the job. Danny looks death in the eye as he uncovers the evidence that could save Malcolm Miller. Season Finale.

title: All That Glitters
synopsis: With debtors at his heels, Albert Hill, son of imprisoned crime legend Vic Hill, teams up with mate Charlie Cavendish to square his bills. After the pair scrapes together a sizable sum, they wager it all on boxer Billy Ayres. But a local mobster has his own man in the ring and designs on the match.

title: Badda Bling
synopsis: As Albert  Charlie and Billy process their windfall  footage of the heist goes viral  reaching the eyes of Bob Fink  a dirty cop with old ties to the Hill family. Meanwhile  in a new scheme set up by Vic  the trio goes in on a diamond job for Saul Gold  a businessman who doesn‘t forgive mistakes.

title: Going In Heavy
synopsis: With the clock ticking on their lives  Albert  Charlie and Billy plot to steal back Saul’s diamonds  cutting in Sonny‘s girl Lotti as a partner. To crack Sonny‘s safe  Albert must track down an old family friend. Meanwhile  Fink follows clues in the heist footage back to Charlie.

title: Across The Pond
synopsis: Desperate to pay back Saul before time runs out, Albert, Charlie and their new ally, Chloe Koen, fly to New York to fence the gold. But a careless mistake leaves them racing all over the city to salvage the deal. Meanwhile, Billy and Lotti plot to free the safecracker Norman from Sonny’s lair.

title: The Smelt Down
synopsis: After patching things up with Saul, the boys get a lead on liquidating the gold bars, thanks to Chloe. But the buyer, a wealthy sheik, proves finicky. The gang must think on their feet, while at the same time eluding Fink, who is moving ever closer to their treasure.

title: Fly Away You Nutters
synopsis: As the gang cools their heels at a country manor, a budding love triangle brings tensions to a boil. But the pressure to sell the gold tub forces the friends to work together. Meanwhile, Vic plots a prison escape with pal Hate ’Em, only to find a chilly homecoming awaiting him on the outside.

title: Coming Home To Roost
synopsis: Lotti and Billy have the gold re-smelted while Chloe lines up a buyer. An on-the-lam Vic tries to sniff out his treasure while Albert and Lily try to keep him from getting recaptured. Drunken Charlie falls into the hands of Bob Fink, who is determined to extract the location of the gold.

title: Pear Shaped
synopsis: Vic and Hate ’Em use brutish tactics to track down the location of the gold. Fink torments Charlie for information, but discovers the hard way he’s not the only one with gold lust. As opposing forces converge on the gypsy camp, a misunderstanding escalates into a gunfight.

title: Creepers
synopsis: As the Hill family and gang regroup, Charlie returns with news of Jones and Dwyer’s plans to sell the gold. Lily wants nothing to do with it, but Albert hits on a better idea: forget the gold and grab the cash. But first, the gang will have to do some recon inside Jones’s heavily guarded lodge.

title: A Family Affair
synopsis: Jones and Dwyer race to the Liverpool docks to rendezvous with the Corsican mob while the gang gives chase. With Vic stuck in the police van, Albert must concoct a crazy plan to save his father, sabotage the Corsican deal and make off with the cash—all without getting everyone blown to bits.

title: Survival Of The Fittest
synopsis: While being pursued by the Enforcers, Spectacular Spider-Man has to protect Norman Osborn from the vengeful Vulture.

title: Interactions
synopsis: When a freak accident at the lab transforms Max Dillon into the super-villain Electro, he demands that Dr. Martha Connors find a cure as Spectacular Spider-Man works to stop him.

title: Natural Selection
synopsis: When. Dr. Curt Connors‘ attempt to regenerate a new arm accidentally transforms him into the Lizard  Peter  Martha  Eddie  and Gwen search for a cure as Spectacular Spider-Man tries to end his criminal rampage.

title: Market Forces
synopsis: The Big Man’s lieutenant, Hammerhead, has ordered Montana, the only surviving member of the Enforcers, to steal a high tech suit. Using it to transform Montana into the vibrating villain known as the Shocker, Hammerhead then unleashes him on Spectacular Spider-Man.

title: Competition
synopsis: As Norman Osborn and Hammerhead have Otto Octavius turn Flint Marko into the Sandman, Spectacular Spider-Man and the Human Torch meet in a superhero showdown. But when the Sandman shows up, too, they must join forces to stop him.

title: The Invisible Hand
synopsis: As Otto Octavius creates the Rhino as a new distraction for Spectacular Spider-Man  Peter takes Aunt May‘s advice and asks Mary Jane Watson to the high school prom.

title: Catalysts
synopsis: As Peter and Mary Jane are a hit at the Fall Formal  the Green Goblin‘s attack on Fisk Industries calls for Spectacular Spider-Man to intervene.

title: Reaction
synopsis: When the Green Goblin sabotages Otto Octavius by fusing his mechanical arms to his body, the newly-created Doctor Octopus must find a new power source while being pursued by Spectacular Spider-Man.

title: The Uncertainty Principle
synopsis: In a final showdown  Spectacular Spider-Man learns the Green Goblin‘s true identity – Harry Osborn.

title: Persona
synopsis: Before either the Black Cat or the Chameleon can steal it  an alien Symbiote in Dr. Connors‘ lab attaches itself to Spectacular Spider-Man. Disguised as Spider-Man  the Chameleon embarks on a crime spree that only Spidey and the Black Cat can stop.

title: Group Therapy
synopsis: When the Sinister Six escape from prison with plans to take down Spectacular Spider-Man  they nearly succeed. But when Peter wakes up with no memory of the battle  it‘s clear that it wasn‘t him  but the Symbiote  who took down the Six.

title: Intervention
synopsis: As he struggles with the Symbiote  Spectacular Spider-Man‘s origins are revealed. But when Peter/Spidey wins and returns the Symbiote to Connors‘ lab  an embittered Eddie Brock is drawn to it.

title: Nature Vs. Nurture
synopsis: Venom – the merged entity consisting of Eddie Brock and the Symbiote – attacks Spectacular Spider-Man through the people he loves most.

title: Blueprints
synopsis: It’s early December, and the first snow is falling. PETER PARKER has a long “To Do” list – leading off with talking to GWEN STACY about their surprise first kiss. But before he gets the chance, SPIDER-MAN has a run in with the sorcerer MYSTERIO.

title: Destructive Testing
synopsis: Both GWEN STACY and LIZ ALLAN like PETER PARKER. So whom should Pete pursue? Meanwhile, KRAVEN THE HUNTER has come to New York to make SPIDER-MAN his prey!

title: Reinforcement
synopsis: As Christmas approaches, the SINISTER SIX reconstitutes with SANDMAN, RHINO, VULTURE, ELECTRO and new members MYSTERIO and KRAVEN. All they want for Christmas is SPIDER-MAN – dead.

title: Shear Strength
synopsis: It’s New Year’s Eve, and all is not right with world. The MASTER PLANNER and his henchmen are literally planning to take over the world! A highly motivated SPIDER-MAN takes the fight to the Planner’s secret lair. But once he gets there, can he survive?

title: First Steps
synopsis: School’s back in session, and things have changed. PETER PARKER’s actually invited to FLASH THOMPSON’s birthday bash. Meanwhile, SPIDER-MAN has to party with SANDMAN, who’s once again looking to make his Big Score. And is that VENOM disappearing into the night?

title: Growing Pains
synopsis: VENOM is back and framing SPIDER-MAN. Meanwhile, alien spores infect JOHN JAMESON, increasing his size, strength and mass. J. JONAH JAMESON convinces his son to become a super-hero to capture Spidey…

title: Identity Crisis
synopsis: PETER PARKER’s secret identity as SPIDER-MAN has been outted by VENOM, leaving Pete and his loved ones vulnerable to all of Spidey’s enemies.

title: Accomplices
synopsis: A gang war looms as SILVER SABLE, HAMMERHEAD and DOCTOR OCTOPUS vie for a prize that could change the balance of power in the New York Underworld…

title: Probable Cause
synopsis: Some days, PETER PARKER just can’t win… especially when he winds up on a MIDTOWN HIGH police car ridealong with SALLY AVRIL. As SPIDER-MAN, his luck isn’t any better, facing off against SHOCKER, RICOCHET and OX, i.e. the NEW ENFORCERS.

title: Gangland
synopsis: On Valentine’s Day, PETER PARKER jeopardizes his relationship with girlfriend LIZ ALLAN, when TOMBSTONE, DOCTOR OCTOPUS and SILVERMANE call a Valentine’s Day Summit.

title: Subtext
synopsis: Determined to be a better boyfriend to LIZ ALLAN, PETER PARKER wishes he could help her brother MARK ALLAN. But when GREEN GOBLIN blackmails Mark into doing his bidding, neither Liz, MARY JANE WATSON nor SPIDER-MAN may be able to save him!

title: Opening Night
synopsis: To test security at the VAULT, SPIDER-MAN volunteers to try to escape. But the GREEN GOBLIN has other ideas, trapping Spidey inside RYKER’S amid a sea of felons he put away.

title: Final Curtain
synopsis: When PETER PARKER breaks up with LIZ ALLAN to finally be with GWEN STACY, nothing goes as planned. Likewise for SPIDER-MAN, who finally unmasks the GREEN GOBLIN, revealing him to be-- No, wait! Stop! I promise I won’t tell a soul!

title: Seed Money
synopsis: When Miami tech visionary Izzy Morales fails to attract funding for her new cryptocurrency GenCoin, financier Nick Talman funnels dirty money from his embezzling father. Meanwhile, gangster Ronald Dacey finds his money is missing, while cynical FBI agent Phil Rask hunts for Nick’s father.

title: Ground Floor
synopsis: After Ronald threatens Nick and Izzy  they scramble to return his money in cash. Agent Rask‘s new partner Maddie arrives just in time to ramp up efforts to track Nick‘s father  Andy Talman. With gang violence in Little Haiti bearing down on his family  Ronald rethinks Izzy‘s GenCoin pitch.

title: Proof of Concept
synopsis: Nick  Izzy and Ronald‘s fundraising is off to a slow start  but Ronald spots an opportunity with a neighborhood VIP. Rask and Maddie catch wind of GenCoin just as Andy tells Nick the truth about Rask. Nick makes a promising business connection.

title: Angel Investor
synopsis: Nick makes the pitch of a lifetime, reviving GenCoin. Rask and Maddie’s partnership takes a surprising turn just as Rask forms an unlikely alliance. Ronald gets pulled into a wave of violence with his gang.

title: Buyout
synopsis: As Rask slides into a pit of violence and corruption, he fights to regain control. Nick and Izzy absorb a devastating blow to GenCoin. Ronald takes a risk with the company pitch.

title: Bootstrapped
synopsis: Rask is forced clean up his mess. Izzy reaches out to an old classmate and finds a promising lead. Taylor’s discovery of Nick’s predicament places GenCoin in serious jeopardy. In the face of disaster, Ronald has a burst of inspiration.

title: Valuation
synopsis: A struggling GenCoin finds a way to set up shop, but Ronald’s plan to put some money in their pockets backfires. An anxious Rask must field questions from his fellow agents. Izzy follows up on an ambitious lead.

title: Pro Rata
synopsis: GenCoin lands a major investor, Alex Bell, who has sketchy ties. Rask makes an opportune discovery about Nick. As Ronald’s status in the gang changes, his son Touie is faced with an agonizing decision.

title: Hostile Takeover
synopsis: Rask hurries to tie up loose ends. Alex drops a bombshell on GenCoin, forcing Izzy into a compromising position. Nick and Ronald bond over their new predicament. Izzy takes a stand, only to find herself on the wrong side.

title: Recapitalization
synopsis: In the season finale, Nick and Izzy hash out their differences. Nick has an ace up his sleeve, leading to a shocking new ally for GenCoin. Rask is faced with the brutal truth about Alex. The Morales family is blindsided by tragedy.

title: Disruption
synopsis: Nick finds his circumstances vastly changed at the hands of Phil Rask, whose relationship with the Russians has taken a dark turn. In the wake of tragedy, Izzy is pushed to the brink of a reckless decision. As the cops close in on their business, Ronald and Touie contemplate a dangerous idea.

title: Bleeding Edge
synopsis: Striking a deal with Rask, Nick sets out on a seek-and-find mission to clear his name. Ronald asks for Izzy’s help with a risky project. Rask finds the Russians even more demanding than he’d feared. Izzy comes to a groundbreaking revelation.

title: Early Adopters
synopsis: Nick meets a mysterious old friend of his father’s. Ronald and Izzy put Araknet into action as Nick comes to them with a peculiar proposition. An adrift Rask struggles to repair all that’s broken in his life.

title: Loss
synopsis: After a discouraging discovery, the trio forges a new plan. Izzy seeks the help of someone significant from her past. Nick faces a setback while catching a glimpse into the strange world of Wes Chandler. Ronald struggles to get his crew behind the new way of doing business.

title: Pivot
synopsis: After a devastating tragedy, Ronald faces a harrowing decision. Izzy finds herself in hot water after a brazen plan lands her in the Russians’ sights. Nick finally grabs Wes’s attention with the help of Wes’s daughter, Mara.

title: Liabilities
synopsis: Rask makes a bold move to set things right. After a near-death experience, Izzy reaches out to an old friend. Ronald and Nick rally to Izzy’s defense as they rethink the future of their business. The group fears Araknet’s baggage will scare off Wes.

title: Growth Hacking
synopsis: As ArakNet struggles to best their competitor, Izzy butts heads with the team. Rask recovers, but his murderous past threatens to resurface. Wes, Nick and Mara hustle to bring ArakNet street cred against slim odds. Ronald goes down a dangerous road he’s long avoided.

title: Opportunity Cost
synopsis: After Ronald suggests a game-changer for Araknet, he struggles to live up to the team’s expectations of him. The Russians hit Araknet hard in an underhanded move, leaving Nick and Izzy to plot swift retaliation.

title: Leverage
synopsis: As Araknet celebrates a huge win, Ronald struggles to repair his life before it’s too late. The Russians extend a tainted olive branch, causing dissent within the company and throwing Izzy into inner turmoil. Just as Araknet is poised to make a controversial move, an unforeseen enemy strikes.

title: Soul Proprietor
synopsis: Izzy reaches out to Rask with a proposition. Tamara gives Ronald the push he needs to change his life for good. Nick makes a sickening discovery while Izzy executes a devastating plan to decimate Araknet’s enemies.

title: Whatever You Want
synopsis: As Steve's insensitivity upsets Regina, Romeo and Bullethead square off over a beautiful classmate; Cedric falls in love for Regina's new assistant.

title: Somebody’s Sleepin’ In My Bed
synopsis: Upset with Lovita's constant presence, Steve asks Cedric to move.

title: Bully Call
synopsis: Romeo tries to avoid having to take a tough girl to a school dance; Regina is upset after losing to Steve at Scrabble.

title: Don’t Quit Your Day Job
synopsis: Steve talks Romeo into joining the choir, into to regret it soon afterwards; Cedric coaches Bullethead on how to handle a bully.

title: Fool And The Gang
synopsis: When Steve agrees to entertain at a school fund-raiser, Cedric is upset when he asks Regina to sing a duet; Steve inadvertently convinces Bullethead to drop out and get a job.

title: Let’s Talk About Sax
synopsis: Steve's audition for a job with singer Teddy Riley is jeopardized when Romeo pawns his saxophone; Cedric quickly regrets giving Lovita a key to his apartment.

title: Steve’s Gotta Have It
synopsis: Steve must choose between a romantic evening with Regina and attending a banquet with his Little Brother.

title: When The Funk Hits The Rib Tips
synopsis: Steve and Cedric face off against a pair of former Hi-Tops at a nightclub audition; Bullethead develops a crush on Regina.

title: I’m Not A Chauvanist, Piggy
synopsis: Regina's display of her self defense skills threatens Steve's manhood.

title: Big Daddy Meets The Man Of Steele
synopsis: An old suitor returns to woo Regina.

title: The Adventure Begins
synopsis: While working undercover for the Street Fighter operation, Guile discovers Bison has just stolen a biological virus.

title: Strongest Woman In The World
synopsis: Bison commandeers a nuclear facility in China  which is coincidentally situated near Chun-Li‘s own birthplace which Bison had destroyed years prior.

title: Chunnel Vision
synopsis: Dee Jay relays to Escher and Chun-Li that he and Guile were ambushed by Bison and Zangief and that Guile himself was captured.

title: Getting To Guile
synopsis: Sagat uses his vast army to wage war on a U.S. embassy in Shadaloo  all the while a young boy named Kip is trapped in the building while it‘s being evacuated.

title: The Hand That Feeds You
synopsis: Bison steals a top secret military plane that can turn invisible at the push of a button  so it‘s up to Guile  Dee Jay  Cammy  and Blanka to get it back.

title: Demon Island
synopsis: Escher receives word that a new military laser was stolen by the female cyborg, the Satin Hammer and her cohort, T. Hawk.

title: Dark Heart
synopsis: The millennium comet is on its scheduled 1000-year voyage in the skies over Earth, but Bison uses his magnetic chi powers to redirect the comet towards the planet and threatens to rip apart the continent of the United States.

title: Eye Of The Beholder
synopsis: A Street Fighter tournament is being held in India and Escher sends Guile and the rest of the Street Fighters to compete.

title: Medium Is The Message
synopsis: Word comes in that a scientist in Hawaii is concocting a serum that could help Blanka revert into his human form.

title: No Way Out
synopsis: Ryu‘s cousin  Sachi goes missing in Hong Kong while the Street Fighters are investigating a local drug operation.

title: Desert Thunder
synopsis: A small city near Shadaloo is in chaos as rare diamonds have been found to be rich in the region.

title: Keeping The Peace
synopsis: Bison finally gets captured at the hands of Cammy‘s former British teammates  Delta Red.

title: Strange Bedfellows
synopsis: A mysterious warrior starts destroying both Bison‘s strongholds as well as those under Street Fighter jurisdiction.

title: The Hammer Strikes
synopsis: Needing the help of the Street Fighters, Dhalsim summons them to his remote mountain temple causing Blanka considerable mental pain.

title: Cammy and the Bachelor
synopsis: A crime wave has taken over London, and Bison is thought to be the one responsible for it.

title: New Kind of Evil
synopsis: Chun-Li is attacked by mysterious mutant assailants, as well as having her TV crew kidnapped.

title: The World‘s Greatest Warrior
synopsis: While visiting their master Gouken, Ryu and Ken are challenged by the evil Akuma, who claims to have stolen Gouken‘s chi and will do the same thing to them.

title: So, You Want to be in Pictures
synopsis: Ryu and Ken are asked to help Fei Long with his latest movie project.

title: Face of Fury
synopsis: Guile and Blanka take a trip to the Middle East to cool hostilities between the Arabs and the Israelis  but Blanka‘s temper gets the best of him  and he attacks them all.

title: Cammy Must Die!
synopsis: Bison charges Cammy and his cybernetic creation La Lupa to steal a priceless Kali statue for him.

title: The Flame and the Rose
synopsis: The mystical psychic known as Rose senses that many powers in the world are fluctuating wildly out of control.

title: The Warrior King
