synopsis: The powerful Warrior King has defended his country from the evil Mages for years, but when his Orb of Power is flung into a vortex, he follows it as well.

title: The Beast Within
synopsis: Blanka searches the jungle for a mysterious healing plant that could revert him back to his normal form.

title: Second to None
synopsis: Ryu is a legend in Shadaloo and Sakura is his most adamant admirer, but when Sagat patrols the streets making sure to burn down any building with posters of Ryu in it, Sakura leaps into action.

title: Final Fight
synopsis: The new Mayor of Metro City, Mike Haggar, finds himself in a tough situation when his daughter Jessica is kidnapped by a ruthless street gang known as Mad Gear.

title: Cammy Tell Me True
synopsis: Bison captures Delta Red in a brief battle and the British government are adamant about getting them back, as they know critical government secrets.

title: Home Is Where The Shart Is
synopsis: After helping the League of Freedom save the world, Dr. Devizo and his team of villains move into the Mansion as bona fide heroes. The team struggles with their new roommates as Robobot travels across the country in search of the elusive Swine Kampf.

title: Masters Of Lex
synopsis: When Lex starts dating the vigilante anti-hero Max Penalizer, Titanium Rex and Dr. Devizo team up to break them up. As the villains of the mansion set their eyes on bedding Cooch, Robobot learns the dangers of telling humans little white lies.

title: My Cousin Kitty
synopsis: When Cooch's former owner Claudette returns with a shady lawyer demanding her cat back, Robobot represents Rex in the trial of the century (his words, not ours.) Meanwhile, The Groaner searches for the true origin of Black Saturn's name.

title: Iliga Their Own
synopsis: Ivan Whiff returns to help the League refurnish their Mansion with items from his Swedish Furniture store. While Whiff tries to recruit Robobot onto his new team, Black Saturn tries to lure Bugula into a hero/nemesis relationship.

title: Brokeback Saturn
synopsis: When Cooch's claims that Leprechauns are attacking Storm City turn out to be true, the League of Freedom is drawn into a battle with assorted mythical creatures. The injured Black Saturn recruits Courtney to join the fight in a mechanized suit.

title: The Long Chaun
synopsis: To save former member Zenith, the League of Freedom travels to the Godsrealm to fight her evil Uncle Ridan. Robobot learns what it means to be a real boy as Rex must prove to be a hero true in order to wield the Sword of Azimuth.

title: Groaner’s Wild
synopsis: After damaging a national monument, the League of Freedom gets called before Congress and investigated by military accountant Sgt. Agony.  Black Saturn embarks on a showdown with his nemesis, the Groaner. Robobot investigates his origins while the team struggles to solve its budget crisis.

title: They Shoot Omega Pets, Don‘t They?
synopsis: When Titanium Rex’s old colleague Omega Ted is found dead, the League of Freedom must care for his orphaned Omega Pets. While Jewbot, Cooch, and Brad cope with pet ownership and a jealous Black Saturn, Rex and American Ranger investigate Ted’s mysterious death.

title: Let‘s Talk About Rex
synopsis: After an embarrassing encounter with the interstellar super villain Blazar (Ron Perlman, Hellboy), Titanium Rex resolves to salvage his public image. Black Saturn launches an investigation to find out who has been eating his food while Brad tries to take advantage of Cooch being in heat.

title: A Shop In The Dark
synopsis: American Ranger’s former sidekick and current Secretary of Defense Kid Victory (Scott Thompson, Kids in the Hall) joins the League for dinner at the mansion. Rex tries to secure more funding while Ranger struggles with Kid Victory’s lifestyle and the rest of the League goes grocery shopping.

title: Puss In Books
synopsis: When Sgt. Agony discovers Cooch is illiterate, the League of Freedom bands together to help her study for her GED. American Ranger embarks on a road trip in search of the American dream and Jewbot yearns to be an inspirational influence. Guest stars Breckin Meyer, Wes Studi, and and Jillian Bell.

title: Lex
synopsis: Titanium Rex is stunned when Lex Lightning shows up on his doorstep claiming to be his illegitimate daughter. While Rex grapples with fatherhood the smitten American Ranger, Black Saturn, and Brad start a rock band to impress Lex.

title: A Midsummer Night‘s Ream
synopsis: Black Saturn gets into the dating scene after a cat burglar breaks his heart and Rex, Ranger, and Brad try a sadistic new workout regimen with personal trainer Johnny Rabdo. Meanwhile Lex tries to get on Cooch’s good side as Jewbot struggles with gender identity.

title: Brad Medicine
synopsis: Brad’s nefarious origins are revealed and his checkered past catches up with him while the rest of the League looks for any kind of escape from Titanium Rex’s game night. American Ranger discovers the joys of the modern internet.

title: Unfortunate Son
synopsis: When Black Saturn is cut off financially  he confronts his rich parents and involves Lex in a bid to restart his allowance. Jewbot explores the life of a caregiver with Black Saturn’s little brother  Dudley  and Titanium Rex attempts to cancel the mansion‘s cable subscription.

title: Babes In The Wood
synopsis: Rex and Ranger’s peaceful camping trip does not go as planned when the rest of the League tags along. Rex waits for the perfect time to talk to reveal a dark secret to Ranger while Saturn hides his relationship with Lex. Jewbot goes offline and Cooch learns that she does not do well in nature.

title: The Inconceivable Escape of Dr. Devizo
synopsis: The League of Freedom prepares for the worst as the resourceful Dr. Devizo plans his escape from the mansion’s underground prison. Rex attempts to match wits with Devizo while Black Saturn goes undercover and American Ranger seeks retribution for Gloria’s betrayal.

title: Lexanity
synopsis: Billionaire defense contractor Ivan Whiff tries to lure Lex away from the League. Meanwhile, Jewbot administers routine physicals for the League, causing Ranger to disavow modern medicine and Brad to discover he may be allergic to Cooch.

title: Lex As A Weapon
synopsis: In the season finale, Dr. Devizo orchestrates a jailbreak of the League’s most dangerous villains. Rex’s past comes back to haunt him and the rest of the League’s worst fears are realized.

title: Virtual Reality Bites
synopsis: The League is still in turmoil after Dr. Devizo destroyed the SuperMansion and released all of the villains into Storm City. While American Ranger helps Cooch get over the death of Brad, Titanium Rex and Jewbot must stop a mysterious internet cult from leaking sensitive League information.

title: School Me Once
synopsis: To boost the League‘s dismal approval ratings  Rex seeks the help of TV host Portia Jones (Yvette Nicole Brown) at Champston University. As League members descend on the world of academia  each finds their college niche  but in the process unleash a campus villain.

title: The League Of Cheesedom
synopsis: The League’s newest member, Portia Jones (aka Zenith), unveils her plan for restoring public opinion of the League: a themed pizza restaurant and arcade. Rex and the team try to make the best of the embarrassing new venture, and Jewbot has an existential crisis.

title: I Don’t Even Have To Use My J.K.
synopsis: When actor J.K. Simmons (J.K. Simmons) expresses interest in playing Rex in a movie, the League invites him to the mansion and Rex is starstruck. Lex and the other villains regroup in their lair, Devizo reveals that Simmons’s visit to the mansion plays right into his sinister plan.

title: Black to the Future
synopsis: A Black Saturn from the future travels to present-time Storm City to stop an event that will trigger a global apocalypse: Zenith and Ranger having sex. While the older Black Saturn helps The League stop Zenith’s goddess mating ritual, present-day Saturn is sent to a hellscape future.

title: Blazarmageddon
synopsis: The League is called upon to stop an enormous space alien from obliterating planet Earth. With the help of NASA, the League embarks on their mission, but Rex and team prove dangerously ill-suited for the stresses of space travel.

title: The Gurman Files
synopsis: After Black Saturn resigns from the League, he takes on his first solo case: a string of kidnappings, all women who used to model for a famed ’70s photographer. As Saturn tries to track down the photog, Titanium Rex’s old secret identity comes back to haunt him.

title: We Need to Talk about Liplor
synopsis: After years of searching, Rex’s brother, Titanium Dax (Dax Shepard), becomes the second Subtopian ever to breach Earth’s surface. He and his rock monster slave, Liplor, are thrilled to find Rex alive, but their reunion is soured when Dax threatens to reveal a secret about Rex’s origins.

title: Logs Day Journey Into Night
synopsis: To protect the League, Rex has gone into hiding, working as a lumberjack far from civilization. While Rex tries to cope with his new identity as a regular joe, Robobot attempts to get a downtrodden League of Freedom back together to take on a dire threat to Storm City.

title: Titanium Lex
synopsis: With the Subtopian army now on the Earth’s surface, their enslavement of the human race has begun. To stand a chance against the invasion, the League of Freedom must join forces with the villains of the Injustice Club. But Rex, Lex, and Dr. Devizo cannot set aside their differences.

title: Summer Vacation Special
synopsis: It's the SuperMansion Summer Break Spectacular! The team heads to Hawaii where Rex runs into a vacationing former President, Black Saturn and Lex teach Cooch how to swim, and Ranger attempts to perform in a USO show while an evil threat brews under the sea.

title: Drag Me To Halloween
synopsis: Rex tries to prepare the SuperMansion for Halloween  a stressful holiday when evil taunts the world‘s superheroes. Despite Rex‘s best efforts  Robobot gets possessed  Ranger goes on a date with a ghost (Lake Bell)  Cooch wages war on a bad trick-or-treat house  and Saturn tries to get laid.

title: War On Christmas
synopsis: The League of Freedom must band together to save Christmas when an interstellar imp, Mr. Skibumpers (Jim Parsons, The Big Bang Theory), unleashes a real-life Santa Claus (Gary Anthony Williams, The Boondocks), who experiences an existential crisis and runs amok.

title: The World of Swords
synopsis: Sword Art Online (SAO) has generated worldwide buzz, and on its official launch day, one player, Kirito, immerses himself in its virtual world.

title: Beater
synopsis: It‘s been one month since the players have been locked in the game. 2000 people have died; the first floor hasn’t been cleared yet.

title: Red-Nosed Reindeer
synopsis: Kirito has finally joined a guild made up of close friends in reality. Everything is going well until a tragic accident changes Kirito completely.

title: The Black Swordsman
synopsis: After quarreling with her party, the young beast tamer Silica storms off and loses her way in the forest, where she runs into monsters.

title: Murder in the Safe Zone
synopsis: A player has been killed inside a safe zone by an unknown means. Asuna and Krito take it upon themselves to find out how and why this is happening.

title: Illusionary Avenger
synopsis: Kirito and Asuna investigate a murder that should have been impossible to commit within the game, only to see a new victim perish before their eyes.

title: The Temperature of the Heart
synopsis: A customer arrives at the blacksmith Lisbeth‘s shop  requesting her to make him the best possible sword - with cost not being an issue.

title: The Sword Dance of Black and White
synopsis: After 2 years, people have become used to living in SAO, but with a dwindling front line it might be up to Kirito and Asuna to continue the charge.

title: The Blue-Eyed Demon
synopsis: Teaming up with Asuna, Kirito clears the dungeon on the 74th floor. They discover the Boss Room, but immediately flee once they lay eyes on the boss.

title: Crimson Killing Intent
synopsis: Kirito has agreed to a duel with the head of the Knights of the Blood Oath. If Kirito wins, Asuna is free to leave the Knights, but if he loses…

title: The Girl of Morning Dew
synopsis: The newly married couple is enjoying their time away from the front lines. But a new guest will take them all the way back to the beginning.

title: Yui‘s Heart
synopsis: Yulier, second in command of the Liberation Army, has approached Kirito and Asuna for help saving her friend and her guild.

title: Edge of Hell‘s Abyss
synopsis: While enjoying a fishing tournament, Kirito receives an urgent message from the leader of the guild requesting their return.

title: The End of the World
synopsis: November 2024. The battle against the Skull Reaper  boss of the 75th floor  is ferocious far beyond anyone‘s imagination.

title: Return
synopsis: Kirigaya is adjusting to life outside of SAO, but he hasn’t forgotten about Asuna. During a visit to see her in the hospital, he meets Sugou Nobuyuki.

title: Land of the Fairies
synopsis: A new MMO allows users to fly and encourages player killing. Kirito joins in search of Asuna and is pleasantly surprised with what he finds.

title: Captive Queen
synopsis: As Kirito learns about the game from Leafa and the hatred between the races, Asuna learns the truth of her role from the Fairy King.

title: To the World Tree
synopsis: Leafa is making enemies by leaving to team up with Kirito. On the way to neutral Territory, they speak more of the rules and areas of ALO.

title: The Legrue Corridor
synopsis: Something isn’t right; Recon has sent Leafa a cryptic message. What does he mean and will Leafa and Kirito have the time to figure it out?

title: General of the Blazing Flame
synopsis: Kirito’s plan to prevent a war between races might work, if he can manage to survive a fight against the Salamander’s General Eugene.

title: The Truth of ALfheim
synopsis: At last, Kirito and the others have reached Central Arun, the largest city in ALfheim, located at the foot of the World Tree.

title: The Grand Quest
synopsis: Kirito’s determination to save Asuna borders on insanity. His recklessness is brought to a halt when Leafa suddenly logs out.

title: Bonds
synopsis: Even though a wall has been built between Kirito and Sugu, he must save Asuna. The next time he challenges the final dungeon he won’t be alone.

title: Gilded Hero
synopsis: Kirito, Asuna and Yui are reunited, but the locks on Asuna are unbreakable. Before they can come up with a plan, the Fairy King makes his entrance.

title: The World Seed
synopsis: Kazuto Kirigaya has beaten death twice, but there is one more thing he must do before he can finally see Asuna in the real world.

title: Episode #001
synopsis: When a new game called Gun Gale Online proves lethal in real life, the government asks Kazuto to join the game and investigate the incidents.

title: Episode #002
synopsis: Inside the Gun Gale Online gaming world, a squadron led by an elite sniper named Sinon takes on an unexpectedly robust foe.

title: Episode #003
synopsis: Sinon‘s controller  Shino  recalls a traumatic gun-related incident from her past. Meanwhile  Kirito tells Asuna of his plans to join Gun Gale Online.

title: Episode #004
synopsis: Now inside Gun Gale Online  Kirito plans to smoke out Death Gun by joining Bullet of Bullets  a tournament to determine the game‘s best gunman.

title: Episode #005
synopsis: Realizing that they may have to fight each other in the Bullet of Bullets, Sinon and Kirito vow to go all-out if they end up in a faceoff.

title: Episode #006
synopsis: Kirito recalls the trauma of the Sword Art Online incident. He fights Sinon but stubbornly refuses to beat her despite his superior skills.

title: Episode #007
synopsis: Suguha confronts Kazuto about his activities in the online world as he grapples with having killed people in the Sword Art Online incident.

title: Episode #008
synopsis: Believing that Death Gun will reveal himself during the Bullet of Bullets, Kirito and Sinon set an ambush while the melee rages around them.

title: Episode #009
synopsis: Death Gun reveals himself, and Kirito and Sinon decide to join forces to take him down before there are any more casualties.

title: Episode #010
synopsis: After Kirito saves Sinon from Death Gun‘s bullet at the last moment, the two flee on mechanical horses and take refuge in a cave to regroup.

title: Episode #011
synopsis: Having escaped Death Gun‘s trap  Kirito and Sinon theorize how he can kill people in real life while slaying their avatars within Gun Gale Online.

title: Episode #012
synopsis: As the Bullet of Bullets tournament reaches its climax, Kirito and Sinon target Death Gun, but another contestant throws a wrench into the works.

title: Episode #013
synopsis: Death Gun overpowers Kirito, putting him in danger. Sinon looks on and desperately tries to find a way to save him.

title: Episode #014
synopsis: Kyuoji attacks Sinon, hoping to kill her and then kill himself, but Kazuto manages to save her, putting himself in great danger in the process.

title: Debriefing
synopsis: Shino takes a look back at the story so far, including the Bullet of Bullets tournament and the foiling of Death Gun, both inside the game and out.

title: Episode #016
synopsis: When the legendary sword Excalibur is rumored to be in an icy dungeon in Alfheim Online, Kirito, Sinon and their friends set out to find it first.

title: Episode #017
synopsis: Kirito and company take on a giant in their quest to uncover Excalibur -- and learn that failing their task will trigger an in-game apocalypse.

title: Episode #018
synopsis: The fight against the powerful ice giant guarding Excalibur proves to be more than the friends can handle. Freyja tells Kirito how to defeat him.

title: Episode #019
synopsis: Floors 21-30 are unlocked, and Asuna, Kirito and Yui hope to live together on Floor 22 ... if they can get past the boss on Floor 21.

title: Episode #020
synopsis: After sparring with her mother over her future in the real world, Asuna takes on a brilliant challenger.

title: Episode #021
synopsis: Asuna agrees to help the Sleeping Knights guild defeat a powerful floor boss, but a rival guild jeopardizes the success of their mission.

title: Episode #022
synopsis: While Kirito battles the rival guild, the Sleeping Knights take on the floor boss. Asuna makes a request and is met with surprising resistance.

title: Episode #023
synopsis: Back in the real world, Kazuto helps Asuna locate Yuuki, who reveals her tragic story and asks Asuna to meet with her again in Alfheim Online.

title: Episode #024
synopsis: After helping Yuuki realize her dream of attending school, Asuna begins to repair her fractured relationship with her mother.

title: Episode #025
synopsis: Yuuki‘s real-world condition worsens  and Asuna discovers a surprising connection to the Sword Art Online incident.

title: Pilot
synopsis: In the series premiere, again facing relentless Terminators that will stop at nothing until John, the future leader of the resistance, is eliminated, Sarah Connor stops running and starts fighting back against fate and the machines that are out for her son.

title: Gnothi Seauton
synopsis: Sarah makes contact with an old friend to ask a favor, while John decides to pay a visit to Sarah's ex (recurring guest star DEAN WINTERS - "Rescue Me," "Oz"), and Cameron makes a new friend.

title: The Turk
synopsis: Sarah pays a visit to Miles Dyson's widow looking for Skynet's creators.

title: Heavy Metal
synopsis: When Sarah, Cameron and John track down stolen cargo, John becomes separated, leading him to discover the future isn't as safe as he had hoped.

title: Queen’s Gambit
synopsis: When Sarah's friend Andy (recurring guest star BRENDAN HINES) submits his computer into a chess competition, she revaluates his computer's capabilities and worries where it could all lead.

title: Dungeons and Dragons
synopsis: While fighting for his life and moving in and out of consciousness, the stranger (recurring guest star BRIAN AUSTIN GREEN) remembers life in the future and his personal battle against the machines.

title: The Demon Hand
synopsis: Agent Ellison's discovery of a cyborg arm puts him in danger.

title: Vick’s Chip
synopsis: After a damning accusation of Cameron by Derek (recurring guest star BRIAN AUSTIN GREEN), John defends her and finds himself at odds with Derek.

title: What He Beheld
synopsis: Sarah finds herself in a business transaction with a mysterious business man.

title: Samson and Delilah
synopsis: In the second season premiere, rocked by the Jeep explosion on his 16th birthday, John is forced to confront the reality of his destiny alone.

title: Automatic for the People
synopsis: Sarah and Cameron explore a nuclear power plant. John withdraws from school but opens up to a new friend. Weaver adds a piece to her project. BUSY PHILLIPS guest stars.

title: The Mousetrap
synopsis: Sarah and Derek must outwit Cromartie after Charley's (recurring guest star DEAN WINTERS) wife is kidnapped. John finds himself caught between Cameron and Riley.

title: Allison from Palmdale
synopsis: A software glitch causes Cameron to forget who she is. A social worker uncovers some of her distant memories. Meanwhile, Catherine Weaver meets with Agent Ellison.

title: Goodbye to All That
synopsis: John and Derek infiltrate a military academy to protect an integral member of the future resistance. Meanwhile, Weaver's first assignment for Ellison takes an interesting turn.

title: The tower Is Tall but the Fall Is Short
synopsis: Sarah, John and Cameron track down another name on their list and wonder why a T-1001 would need a doctor. Meanwhile, a woman from Derek's past surprises him in the present.

title: Brothers of Nablus
synopsis: The Connors are on alert after their house is robbed. One Terminator terrorizes Ellison, while another gets dangerously close to John. Derek and Jesse continue to get reacquainted.

title: Mr. Ferguson Is Ill Today
synopsis: John and Riley's impromptu trip to Mexico results in deadly consequences. Meanwhile, Sarah and Ellison finally come face to face.

title: Complications
synopsis: Sarah's nightmares creep into her real life, but what do they mean? Derek and Jesse (recurring guest star STEPHANIE JACOBSEN) investigate a possible Skynet conspirator.

title: Strange Things Happen at the One-Two Point
synopsis: Sarah's obsession with the three dots leads her to a company she thinks may have the Turk. Jesse's (STEPHANIE JACOBSEN) plans complicate things. And Weaver makes an introduction.

title: Self Made Man
synopsis: Cameron never sleeps, so what does she do at night? Her surprising, secret life is revealed. Plus, history is forever changed when a Terminator is sent back to the wrong time.

title: Alpine Fields
synopsis: The past, present and future collide. Sarah and Cameron work to save a family on the list with a connection to Derek in the future. Meanwhile, Jesse's (recurring guest star STEPHANIE JACOBSEN) life hangs in the balance.

title: Earthlings Welcome Here
synopsis: Sarah's obsession with the three dots intensifies when she tracks down a blogger with an intimate knowledge of the symbol. Riley gets closer to John and faces off with Cameron.

title: The Good Wound
synopsis: An injured Sarah is guided by the image of John's father, Kyle Reese (JONATHAN JACKSON), and Weaver makes a move that has deadly consequences. STEPHANIE JACOBSEN appears as Jesse.

title: Desert Cantos
synopsis: Sarah, John, Cameron and Derek investigate the town connected to the destroyed factory, while Weaver sends her own man into town in search of a potential survivor.

title: Some Must Watch, While Some Must Sleep
synopsis: Haunted by nightmares of the man she killed in the factory, Sarah checks in to a sleep clinic. When suspicious things begin happening, Sarah suspects Skynet may be using the facility for brain mapping.

title: Ourselves  Alone
synopsis: Cameron's defect returns. Riley fears her secret is exposed.

title: Today is the Day pt.1
synopsis: Sarah and John make their escape.

title: Today is the Day pt.2
synopsis: Jesse's (STEPHANIE JACOBSEN) mission takes a fatal turn.

title: To the Lighthouse
synopsis: A darker side of John Henry is revealed.

title: Adam Raised a Cain
synopsis: The Connors close in on Skynet and battle lines are drawn.

title: Born To Run
synopsis: Fate is changed forever in the explosive season finale.

title: The Tick: Pilot
synopsis: A mild mannered accountant leaves hiss boring life behind to become a superhero under the tutelage of The Tick.

title: The Terror
synopsis: A superhero known as The Tick recruits an amateur sleuth for his fight against crime.

title: Arthur, Interrupted
synopsis: After his family commits Arthur to a deprogramming facility, it's up to The Tick to rescue him.

title: The License
synopsis: The need for a superhero license reveals that The Tick doesn't know anything about his past.

title: Arthur Needs Space
synopsis: Arthur's chances at dating an old high school classmate are jeopardized by The Tick; Captain Liberty struggles to stop some nude photographs of her from being published.

title: Couples
synopsis: A dysfunctional superhero/sidekick team leads Arthur to question his relationship with The Tick.

title: The Funeral
synopsis: When a famous superhero dies during their sexual tryst, Captain Liberty enlists Batmanuel to don his costume.

title: The Tick Vs. Justice
synopsis: The Tick, Arthur and Batmanuel are all called to testify at the trial of an evil and intimidating supervillain.

title: The Big Leagues
synopsis: When the Tick and Arthur are invited to join the Legion of Heroes, Captain Liberty sues the exclusive club for discrimination.

title: Epic Fails
synopsis: Countdown of the top 10 "epic fails".

title: Epic Wins
synopsis: Travis and the crew count down the top 10 moments in the show and on tour.

title: Hong Kong
synopsis: Dragon Boat racing; Kung Fu; handling king cobras; a typhoon hits as the guys are about to board a ferry

title: Macau
synopsis: The crew arrives on Macau, and is surrounded by distractions in the world's largest hotel.

title: New Zealand
synopsis: The crew does a few shows in New Zealand.

title: Pastranaland
synopsis: Travis hosts an event in the middle of the world tour.

title: Moscow
synopsis: The cast must do something that the production team promised would not happen again; Russia.

title: St. Petersburg
synopsis: The guys take on Chess Boxing, search for love and try local cuisine.

title: Boston; New York
synopsis: The tour performs for a crowd in the United States for the first time ever.

title: Philadelphia; Pastranaland
synopsis: While in Philadelphia, Crum and Sheeny receive boxing lessons and remake the iconic scene from Rocky.

title: Canada; Detroit
synopsis: The Circus travels to Canada for the first time ever. Jolene performs for her audience in Ontario.

title: Cleveland; Salt Lake City
synopsis: Travis suffers a surious injury during the tour's stop in Cleveland.

title: Las Vegas; California; Arizona
synopsis: The crew hits the West Coast. "Streetbike" Tommy strips down for the "Thunder Down Under."

title: Scandinavia
synopsis: The tour arrives in Scandinavia, immersing themselves in Nordic culture. Extreme sports not found in the U.S..

title: England
synopsis: The tour invades Britain and performs six shows in six nights.

title: Scotland; Amsterdam
synopsis: A surprise performance from Danny MacAskill, the Scottish mountain biker.

title: Pilot
synopsis: A sudden move from Vice to Homicide to investigate the murder of a fellow cop lands NYPD Detective Casey Shraeger in the middle of an investigation that could expose rampant police corruption.

title: Boorland Day
synopsis: A legendary and hapless criminal family unleashes a crime spree on New York City in an effort to raise money to save their ailing patriarch.

title: One Man Band
synopsis: As Delahoy and Banks investigate a store that helps its customers commit murder, Casey’s favor for Davis Dixon ends up freeing a hit and run suspect from jail.

title: Crime Slut
synopsis: As a pawnshop armed robbery forces Beaumont to keep a secret from Walsh, Delahoy worries about what his future holds as he and Cole search for a brain cancer victim who has left a hospital after being declared dead.

After Frank Lutz’s attempt to silence Walsh seriously injures Beaumont, Cole decides to stop his tormentor once and for all; Banks looks to prevent a psychic’s prediction of her own death from coming true.

title: The Circle Line
synopsis: Despite Casey’s doubts, Walsh sets out to exonerate a detective suspected of murder; Banks discovers his identity has been stolen after he is reported to have died in a liquor store robbery.

title: The Tape Delay
synopsis: As Casey and Walsh investigate the disappearance of a wealthy man they were assigned to protect, Delahoy and Banks differ over how to handle an 82-year-old nursing home resident who has embarked on a crime spree.

title: The Dentist
synopsis: Alvarez falls prey to a pair of clever con men who steal some important evidence in an accomplice’s drug trial; Banks’ paranoia makes it hard for him to convince Delahoy that he witnessed a neighbor’s murder.

title: The Apology Line
synopsis: As the detectives look to solve a naked man’s murder, the theft of confidential answering machine tapes exposes the grim truth about a hiker’s death.

title: The E.I.D.
synopsis: Emotional involvement leads Casey to try to solve a notorious ten-year-old assault; the detectives search for a mystery pornographer who is using apartments as film sets without their owners’ knowledge.

title: Badge Of Honor
synopsis: Walker and Trivette stop in a small town while transporting a likable prisoner. The sheriff rules the town with strict laws, harsh enforcement, and promotes racism with his deputies.

title: Branded
synopsis: Rustlers are stealing cattle and selling them. A cattle inspector tracks the group down, but is killed when he tries to arrest them. Walker and Trivette pick up the investigation of the rustlers and find the one who killed the inspector.

title: Silk Dreams
synopsis: A new designer drug is on the market and highly priced for rich teenagers. When teens start dying after taking the Silk drug, the rangers must find the source and stop its spread.

title: Mustangs
synopsis: A man contacts Alex about a problem but is killed before giving details. His last words are to save the horses. The rangers investigate the man's last days and find a plot to kill the wild mustangs on a range to make way for a development.

title: Till Death Do Us Part
synopsis: After a woman's car is forced off the road by a hit-and-run, Walker makes a daring rescue of her and her daughter. He is injured and falls into a coma in the hospital. Trivette and others search for the driver of the hit-and-run car.

title: Rainbow Warrior
synopsis: An elderly Indian Chief dies. He learns that Chief Six Feathers was killed because he would not sign over his land for development. The chief's relative gets into trouble investigating the death. Walker and Trivette help.

title: The Road To Black Bayou
synopsis: Walker, Trivette, and CD take a vacation together. While there to fish, some men think they are there to find his drug operation. This places the rangers in danger as they are hunted down.

title: Line Of Fire
synopsis: A policeman learns a few other policemen are stealing drugs from the evidence room in order to sell them. He is killed to keep him from telling Alex and Walker. The rangers investigate his death to find the dirty cops.

title: Payback
synopsis: Car thieve steal a specially adapted van used by a disabled boy. Walker is determined to find it for him. In the process of looking for it, Walker kills one of the thieves - a young boy whom Walker knows. Later Walker learns that someone has placed a million price on his head.

title: Tiger’s Eye
synopsis: The daughter of a wealthy Texas businessman is kidnapped by a Japanese gang. The ransom request is for the businessman to turn over his security chief who had been a cop in Japan and was responsible for capturing many of the gang members.

title: Big Bingo Bamboozle
synopsis: The leaders of a money laundering operation at a bingo hall are captured and put on trial. The accountant is asked to testify against her bosses. Walker and Trivette have to take her to court, but she keeps escaping them for her own agenda.

title: Money Train
synopsis: Alex gets Walker and Trivette assigned to a movie being filmed as technical advisers. While on the set, Walker overhears several stuntmen talking about a train robbery they are planning.

title: Mean Streets
synopsis: The homeless are being beaten by a group of teens who film their attack. Walker poses as a homeless man to see if he can catch them in the act.

title: Cowboy
synopsis: A group of men kidnap a wealthy business man, and take others who were standing near. Alex is one of the people kidnapped. While the kidnappers are arranging for ransom, Alex manages to call Walker with information to help him find them.

title: War Zone Part I
synopsis: Men dressed as clowns are robbing banks at gunpoint. During one heist, an ex-partner of Walker's is killed. Walker and Trivette are determined to find the ruthless group. Walker helps the dead ranger's children cope with their loss.

title: War Zone Part II
synopsis: Men dressed as clowns are robbing banks at gunpoint. During one heist, an ex-partner of Walker's is killed. Walker and Trivette are determined to find the ruthless group. Walker helps the dead ranger's children cope with their loss.

title: Trust No One
synopsis: The rangers attempt to capture counterfeiters. They escape, but the rangers take the fake money into evidence. When $5 million is missing, Trivette is accused. Walker must clear Trivette's name and find the real criminals.

title: Blue Movies
synopsis: When a judge is murdered, Walker captures the hit-man and finds out that D.L. Dade ordered the hit. Since Alex has no evidence against Dade for murder, Walker gathers evidence for Dade to get him in jail.

title: Flashback
synopsis: A geologist is killed after he claims to have found the lost treasure of Hayes Cooper, a Wild West Texas Ranger. Walker tells Trivette the story of the treasure as they investigate. Walker gets bit by a rattlesnake and has dreams of Cooper.

title: On Sacred Ground
synopsis: Walker returns to the Indian Reservation when some Cherokees are accused of stealing pieces from an art gallery, claiming the pieces are really artifacts from a Native American region.

title: Case Closed
synopsis: While on a drive, Walker and Alex find a child walking alone on the back road. She says her father was taken by men from space. The rangers and Alex investigate the strange lights and sounds despite being warned off by the Air Force.

title: Standoff
synopsis: The rangers help a Mexican security team protect a political candidate from an assassin.

title: Ad Man Micelli
synopsis: Tony's sleepless night at Samantha's noisy slumber party is compounded by Angela's unexpected return home, forcing them to pose as husband and wife since Samantha passed him off as the successful head of the household.

title: Thanksgiving At Mrs. Rossini’s
synopsis: Tony takes Angela and the kids on a pilgrimage to Brooklyn for Thanksgiving, but Angela's not so grateful when the feast includes a heavy helping of male chauvinism.

title: The Prodigal Father-In-Law
synopsis: Samantha is devastated to learn her Grandpa Nick is not on a Florida vacation but doing time in a local penitentiary -- or so Tony, Angela and Mona thought.

title: Tony The Matchmaker
synopsis: Angela battles her emotions after rejecting Tony's recently divorced and less-than-perfect friend -- only to discover she's in for a war when the "always-ready-to-boogie" Mona sets her sights on the man.

title: It Happened One Summer, Part I
synopsis: While retrieving a homesick Jonathan from summer camp, Angela wistfully reminisces about her romantic awakening there some twenty years ago, but is shocked to realize that it may have been Tony with whom she had her brief encounter at "kissing rock."

title: It Happened One Summer, Part II
synopsis: Tony and Angela's teenage summer camp encounter at "kissing rock" creates unexpected friction when a sudden thunderstorm thrusts them together again -- this time in a secluded motel room.

title: The Heiress
synopsis: Tony and Angela rummage through the attic and Mona's past "affairs" after she is mysteriously named in the will of an eccentric billionaire -- and they unexpectedly unveil a skeleton in her closet.

title: Hunk Of The Month
synopsis: Angela's scandalized when Tony decides to pose for Mona's charitable "Hunk of the Month" calendar, but she may be willing to turn the other cheek when she encounters "Mr. March."

title: The Graduate
synopsis: Upon her graduation from college, Mona goes undercover to apply for work at a shoe company that's known for age discrimination, and she's fit to be tied when she discovers that Tony and Angela had to pull strings just so she could get her foot in the door.

title: Custody, Part I
synopsis: When Jonathan's chosen best man for his father's upcoming wedding in Beverly Hills, Tony and Mona convince Angela that they all should leave cold Connecticut to attend the ceremony, but things really heat up when it appears Jonathan's visit may be more than temporary.

title: Custody, Part II
synopsis: Angela's fit to be tied when her ex-husband, on the eve of his wedding, requests joint custody of Jonathan, but it may be Tony who has to be roped into accepting the idea.

title: Jr. Executive
synopsis: The high cost of drill team uniforms leads Samantha to become Angela's girl "Saturday," but when work interferes with weekend fun, Sam's friends cheer her on to "lose that job."

title: The Unnatural
synopsis: Tony's out to prove that he can still make the big play when his old baseball rival challenges him to a game -- but he strikes out with Angela when his desire to win forces her off the "home" team.

title: Tony The Nanny
synopsis: Tony gets an offer he can't refuse when his Italian uncle entrusts him with engaged cousin Anna, but her arranged marriage may be "rubbed out" after Angela, Mona and Samantha "Americanize" her.

title: Jonathan Plays Cupid
synopsis: Two timely blind date proposals help soothe the Valentine's Day blues for both Tony and Angela -- until they discover that it's Jonathan who's shooting Cupid's arrow.

title: Gotta Dance
synopsis: Samantha's "discovered" talents as a ballerina has Tony ready for them both to pirouette up the ladder of success - until Mona steps on his toes and suggests he hang up his tutu before becoming an overhearing stage parent.

title: Educating Tony
synopsis: Tony hopes to be teacher's pet in advertising class, but his "dirty" idea for soap commercial fails to make the grade when he offends "Professor Angela."

title: The Babysitter
synopsis: Samantha gets her first shot at babysitting Jonathan when Tony and Angela must attend a PTA matting -- but her hopes of proving herself trustworthy go down the drain when she disobeys Tony by inviting a boyfriend over to help unclog the sink.

title: When Worlds Collide
synopsis: Angela's dealt a full house when she agrees to host Tony's poker party with one condition -- that he keeps his roughneck buddies away from her "seemingly" prudish friend.

title: Losers And Other Strangers
synopsis: Angela experiences the agony of defeat when she strikes out in her bid for an advertising award and Tony gloats over his kingpin status as bowling champion.

title: Tony For President
synopsis: Tony becomes embroiled in a mudslinging campaign when he accepts the nomination for Fairfield School PTA president, but it's manager Angela's reputation that takes the beating when Tony publicly defines their "relationship."

title: Not With My Client You Don't
synopsis: When a perfume heiress is sent by her father to secure an advertising deal, executive Angela goes all-out to court the account, but little does she know that the sophisticate is doing some courting of her own -- with an unsuspecting Tony.

title: Angela’s New Best Friend
synopsis: When a sexy but spoiled neighbor is jilted by her husband, she seeks solace in the comfort of the Bowler home -- but Tony threatens to move out when the bored housewife begins making the moves on him.

title: There’s No Business Like Shoe Business
synopsis: Personnel counselor Mona advises a disgruntled shoe employee to chase his dreams and pursue an acting career, but when he chases it out to Hollywood, his wife is forced to retrieve him -- leaving Tony to act as surrogate father to the couple's eight-month-old son.

title: The Anniversary Show
synopsis: Angela plans a special home-cooked ceremony in honor of Tony and Samantha's two-year anniversary at the Bower house, but when everyone has other plans, Tony and Angela are forced to celebrate alone.

title: Charmed Lives
synopsis: Angela jets out to the West coast to deliver an ethnic-looking spokesmodel to a national Italian food company, but she finds her choice usurped by a beautiful blonde who unsuspectingly walks into the job -- forcing the two models to reach a unique compromise.
